- A lot of basic blocks and devices can be built without having to be unlocked. 
- If you think you are missing something in the template folder of your Constructor, have a look at the Techtree if it has been unlocked already!
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：科技树（F3键）是什么？[/i]
- 当你在游戏中（单人和多人模式）取得进展时，通过执行某些操作你会获得经验值。每次升级都会为你提供一些解锁点。使用这些点在科技树中解锁更高级的内容。
- 许多基本的方块和设备可以在没有解锁的情况下建造。
- 如果你认为在你的建造机的模板文件夹中缺少了某些东西，检查一下科技树，看看它是否已经被解锁了！

English:
[i]Q: How does the Offline Protection work?[/i]
- If you have equipped a Capital Vessel or a BA with the Offline Protection Device, and your Base or Capital Vessel is either set to your faction, this will activate a shield when you leave the server. Your BA or Capital Vessel does NOT need to be powered and it does not use up fuel packs! 
- The OP has a timer that can be set by the Admin. Default setting is 48 real-time hours (2 days). 
- For factions with more than one member, the OP activates only if ALL faction members have left the server.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：离线保护（OP）是如何工作的？[/i]
- 如果你装备了一个主力舰或基地建筑（BA）带有OP设备，并且你的基地或主力舰设置为你的派系，当你离开服务器时，这将激活一个护盾。你的基地建筑或主力舰不需要供电，它也不会消耗燃料包！
- OP有一个可以由管理员设置的计时器。默认设置是48小时（2天）。
- 对于有超过一名成员的派系，只有当所有派系成员都离开服务器时，OP才会激活。

English:
[i]Q: How to use the ALT-look Mode?[/i]
- Hit V to switch to the 3rd Person view. Then hit ALT only ONCE and the camera view gets undocked from your Player Avatar or Vessel. Use the mouse to move the camera view. Use the mouse wheel to zoom in and out
- You can still walk/fly by using the Arrow-Keys and the WASD +Q/E commands
- The ALT-look mode also works in 1st Person, for example when sitting in a Cockpit!
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：如何使用ALT视角模式？[/i]
- 按V键切换到第三人称视角。然后仅按一次ALT键，摄像头视角就会从你的玩家角色或飞船上脱离。使用鼠标移动摄像头视角。使用鼠标滚轮来放大和缩小。
- 你仍然可以通过使用方向键和WASD + Q/E命令来行走/飞行。
- ALT视角模式也在第一人称视角下有效，例如当你坐在驾驶舱内时！

English:
[i]Q: What is the difference between PvP and PvE planets/orbits?[/i]
When you open the map (M) you can see a list of planets and orbits. Click on one of them and you'll notice a green PvE or red PvP. This is more relevant for Multiplayer, though. 

- [u]PvE:[/u] No other players can damage you or your vessel or base with weapons or tools. Only Alien drones and Alien creatures can do so. Vice-versa: you can destroy Alien bases with your weapons (but NOT with tools!) and any wildlife.

[u]There is only one exception:[/u] As soon as you destroy the Core of an Alien POI and/or swap it with your own Base Core, the blocks of the structure are becoming immune to weapon fire. You need to work on this former Alien POI with the Remove & Repair tool.

- [u]PvP:[/u] Anything goes. You or your structures are NOT protected in any way as long as you are online. Build an Offline Protection device to protect your PvP-Bases and Capital Vessels while you are offline.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：PvP和PvE星球/轨道之间有什么区别？[/i]
当你打开地图（M）时，你可以看到星球和轨道的列表。点击其中一个，你会注意到绿色的PvE或红色的PvP。这只对多人游戏有关。

- [u]PvE:[/u] 其他玩家不能使用武器或工具对你或你的飞船或基地造成伤害。只有外星人无人机和外星生物才能这样做。反之亦然：你可以用你的武器（但不是工具！）摧毁外星人基地以及任何野生动物。

[u]只有一个例外：[/u] 一旦你摧毁了外星人POI的核心和/或用你自己的基地核心替换它，结构的方块就会对你的武器或派系火力免疫。由于它现在是你的了，你将需要使用多功能工具处理前外星人POI。

- [u]PvP:[/u] 什么都行。只要你在线，你或你的建筑就不会受到任何保护。建造一个离线保护（OP）设备，以在你离线时保护你的PvP基地和主力舰。
全球游戏机制--第二部分

English:
[i]Q: What is the Registry?[/i]
The Registry is a repository of all your vessels, bases and more 

[i]Q: Where do i find the Registry[/i]
Open your inventory and find the Registry-button in the icon row on the top.
[i][/i]
[i]Q: What is the purpose of the Registry?[/i]
You can manage your Vessels and Bases from remote if you are in the same playfield.
- You cannot use all base features. For example you cannot access Constructors or Turrets from remote.
-You can set a persistent WAYPOINT to mark the targeted vessel or base on your HUD. This is persistent when leaving the playfield or game

[i]Q:Which structures are listed in the Registry?[/i]
- Your private structures and vessels.
- Structures and vessels of your faction.
- and many more
Chinese (simplified):
[i]Q: 什么是注册表？[/i]
注册表是您所有飞船、基地等的存储库。

[i]Q: 我在哪里可以找到注册表？[/i]
打开您的库存，您可以在顶部的图标行中找到注册表按钮。

[i]Q: 注册表的目的是什么？[/i]
如果您在同一游戏场地内，您可以远程管理您的飞船和基地。
- 您不能使用所有基地功能。例如，您不能远程访问建造机或炮塔。
- 您可以设置一个持久的航点，以在您的HUD上标记目标飞船或基地。这是在离开游戏场地或游戏时仍然保持的。

[i]Q: 注册表中列出了哪些结构？[/i]
- 您的私人结构和飞船。
- 您派系的结构和飞船。
- 以及更多

English:
[i]Q: What are map markers?[/i]
A1: You can set notifications freely on your map. Just RMB on a spot on the MAP and give it a name. This will add your marker to your personal list.
 A2: When you open the MAP, you will find your Map Markers in the upper right tab.

[i]Q: How do i add a map marker?[/i]
1. Press M
2. RMB on any place on the map
3. Add a name
4. ACCEPT

[i]Q: What is the WAYPOINT checkbox doing?[/i]
If you check this box, the marker will change to orange and will give you a direction. The marker can be seen through the playfield terrain.

[i]Q: What is REMOVE ON APPROACH checkbox doing?[/i]
If you only want to set a temporary marker, check this together with waypoint and the waypoint mode will be cleared from your Hud when approaching (~50m)

[i]Q: What are the 2-letter buttons on the right side doing?[/i]
PV = your private list of markers
PU = public list of markers. Use the SC button to share your PV marker to the PU list
SM = show marker on the map
ED = edit highlighted marker (you can also RMB the marker on the map)
RM = remove highlighted marker (also possible with RMB the marker on the map)
SC = Share marker to PU list

[i]Q: Can i also add a map marker in space?[/i]
Of course!
Chinese (simplified):
[i]Q: 地图标记（书签）是什么？[/i]
A1: 你可以在地图上自由设置通知。只需在地图上的某个地方右键点击并给它一个名字。这将把你的标记添加到你的个人列表中。
A2: 当你打开地图时，你会在右上角的标签中找到你的地图标记。

[i]Q: 如何添加地图标记？[/i]
1. 按下 M
2. 右键点击地图上的任何地方
3. 添加一个名字
4. 确认

[i]Q: 路标复选框是做什么的？[/i]
如果你勾选这个框，标记会变为橙色，并且会给你指示方向。标记可以通过游戏场地的地形看到。

[i]Q: 接近时移除复选框是做什么的？[/i]
如果你只想设置一个临时标记，勾选这个选项和路标，当你接近（大约50米）时，路标模式会从你的HUD中清除。

[i]Q: 右侧的两个字母按钮是做什么的？[/i]
PV = 你的私人标记列表
PU = 公共标记列表。使用 SC 按钮将你的 PV 标记分享到 PU 列表
SM = 在地图上显示标记
ED = 编辑高亮的标记（你也可以在地图上右键点击标记）
RM = 移除高亮的标记（也可以通过在地图上右键点击标记）
SC = 将标记分享到 PU 列表

[i]Q: 我也可以在外太空添加地图标记吗？[/i]
当然可以！

English:
[i[Q: What do the 2x3 number blocks aka environmental info below the radar minimap want to tell me?[/i]
A1: The upper block is the TEMPERATURE. The big number on the left is the temperature at your CURRENT POSITION. The small upper number is your current BODY TEMPERATURE. The small lower number is only shown if you are inside a base or vessel. This is telling you the OUTSIDE TEMPERATURE. If you are outside a base or vessel, this is of course the same as the CURRENT LOCATION temp (and thus removed from the HUD to reduce confusion)
A2: The lower block is the RADIATION. The big number on the left side is the radiation level on your CURRENT POSITION. The small upper number is your BODY RADIATION level. The small lower number is the OUTSIDE RADIATION. Same principle as with temperature: The latter is only shown when you are inside a vessel or a base and is removed if you are outside.

[i]Q: How does Temperature work in general?[/i]
A1: Each Planet has a MAX and MIN temperature. The max temperature is reached at 5 pm and the min temperature at 5 am. If you go higher up in the air, the temperature will decrease. Your suit will protect you from extreme temperatures - depending on its Temp MIN/MAX protection. (Can be enhanced by Boosters).
A2: Space always has -270°C for most orbits (except a few) and is not suitable for ANY of the current suits for a longer stay (unboosted)

[i]Q: Am i protected from high/low temperatures inside a base or vessel?[/i]
If it is activated, yes. If a station or vessel is powered, the temperature is heated up to 22-25° (Same for enclosed cockpits for SV and HV). So you are fine even with your interior suit. BUT this will not happen instantly! If your base is cooled to space temperature, it might take quite a while to heat up to a suitable temperature! No instant-heat-up!

[i]Q: What happens if i am outside with a suit that cannot protect me from high/low temperatures?[/i]
A1: If the temperature is higher or lower as your protection level, your body temp will slowly rise (or fall) towards the temperature at your current position. At a certain temperature, you will start to feel cold/heated up.
A2: If it is too cold or hot outside, just go back into your base or vessel. This will heat up/cool down your body temp. BUT THIS DOES NOT HAPPEN INSTANTLY. If this takes too long, you'll of course die.
A3: Tip: there are some foods and beverages that increase/decrease body temperature!

[i]Q: Does a hull breach lead to the temperature dropping inside a base or vessel?[/i]A: Yes!
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：HUD雷达迷你地图下方的2x3数字方块，也就是环境信息，告诉我什么信息？[/i]
答1：上面的方块代表温度。左侧的大数字是你当前位置的温度。上面的小数字是你当前的体温。下面的小数字只有在你在一个基地或飞船内部时才会显示。这告诉你外面的温度。如果你在基地或飞船外面，这当然和当前位置的温度是一样的（因此在HUD上省略，以减少混淆）。
答2：下面的方块代表辐射。左侧的大数字是你当前位置的辐射水平。上面的小数字是你身体的辐射水平。下面的小数字是外面的辐射。和温度的原则一样：后者只有在你在一个飞船或基地内部时才会显示，如果你在外面则会被省略。

[i]问：温度的工作原理是什么？[/i]
答1：每个行星都有一个最高和最低温度。最高温度在下午5点达到，最低温度在早上5点。如果你在高空，温度会降低。你的宇航服会保护你免受极端温度的影响——这取决于它的温度最低/最高保护。（可以通过助推器增强）。
答2：太空的温度总是-270°C（除了少数例外），对于目前所有未经增强的宇航服来说，长时间停留都不合适。

[i]问：我在基地或飞船内部时，能免受高/低温的影响吗？[/i]
如果是激活状态，是的。如果一个站点或飞船有电，温度会被加热到22-25°（对于SV和HV的封闭驾驶舱也是如此）。所以即使你只穿内层宇航服，也是没有问题的，但这不是瞬间发生的！如果你的基地冷却到太空温度，可能需要相当长的时间才能加热到适宜的温度！没有即时加热，所以做好准备！

[i]问：如果我在外面，而我穿的宇航服不能保护我免受高/低温的影响，会发生什么？[/i]
答1：如果温度高于或低于你的保护等级，你的体温会慢慢上升（或下降）到你当前位置的温度。在一定的温度下，你会感到寒冷或过热。
答2：如果外面太冷或太热，就回到你的基地或飞船内。这会提高或降低你的体温。但这不会立即发生。如果时间太长，你（当然）会死亡。
答3：提示：有些食物和饮料可以增加/减少体温！

[i]问：船体破裂会导致基地或飞船内部的温度下降吗？[/i]
答：是的！

English:
[i]Q: How does Radiation work in general?[/i]
Some of the planets and space has a certain amount of radiation. Radiation does not rise or decrease, it is constant for the whole playfield. The player armors have different protection values (which can be boosted). The interior suit does NOT protect you from any RAD level!

[i]Q: Am i protected from Radiation inside a base or vessel?[/i]
Yes, even if it's deactivated. (this might be subject to change in the future)

[i]Q: What happens if i am outside with a suit that does not protect me from the RAD level?[/i]
A1: Your body radiation (small upper number on the right environment info block) will pile up and lead to serious problems after short.
A2: Unlike with temperature, your BODY-RAD level will NOT automatically decrease if you return to a base or go back into your vessel. You need to use medication to reduce it ... or maybe take a shower? ;-)

[i]Q: Does a hull breach in an radiated area lead to the inside of the base/vessel to be contaminated?[/i]
Currently there is no permanent contamination. But if you stand at the position of the hull breach, your radiation level might rise (although you are inside the base).

[i]Q: Are there weather or environmental effects with radiation?[/i]
Yes! Occasional Radioactive Fog and Mist have been reported from some planets.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：辐射通常如何工作？[/i]
一些行星和太空有一定的辐射量。辐射不会上升或减少，对于整个游戏场地来说是恒定的。玩家的装甲有不同的保护值（可以增强）。内部服装不会保护你免受任何辐射水平的伤害！

[i]问：我在基地或飞船内部时，是否受到辐射保护？[/i]
是的，即使它被停用。（这在未来可能会改变）

[i]问：如果我穿着不能保护我免受辐射水平的服装在外面，会发生什么？[/i]
A1：你的身体辐射（环境信息块右侧的较小的上方数字）会累积，不久后会导致严重问题。
A2：与温度不同，你的身体辐射水平不会在你返回基地或回到你的飞船后自动降低。你需要使用药物来减少它...或者也许洗个澡？ ;-)

[i]问：在辐射区域的船体破损会导致基地/飞船内部受到污染吗？[/i]
目前没有永久性污染。但如果你站在船体破损的位置，你的辐射水平可能会上升（尽管你在基地内部）。

[i]问：有没有辐射的天气或环境效果？[/i]
是的！一些行星报告了偶尔的放射性雾和雾气。

English: Temp and Rad for devices and blocks
Chinese (simplified): 设备和区块的温度和辐射

English:
[i]Q: Do devices also have temperature and radiation?[/i]
YES! Some of the devices will heat up or radiate the area around them, like Thrusters and Generators and Warp Drives.

[i]Q: Can other blocks have temperature and radiation as well?[/i] Yes. For example the green Alien Building blocks are radioactive.

[i]Q: Does the heat 'flow' into the room?[/i]
Currently there is no 'transition zone'. For devices, the radiation/temperature is limited to a fixed perimeter of ONE block around them. This is subject to change in the future.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：设备也有温度和辐射吗？[/i]
是的！一些设备会加热或辐射周围的区域，比如推进器、发电机和翘曲引擎。

[i]问：其他方块也有温度和辐射吗？[/i] 是的。例如，绿色的外星建筑方块具有放射性。

[i]问：热量会'流入'房间吗？[/i]
目前没有'过渡区'。对于设备，辐射/温度仅限于它们周围一个方块的固定范围。这在未来可能会改变。

English:
[i]Q: Is the weather dynamic?[/i]
Yes. Weather will change during day and night between the weather-options, given in the yaml of the planet.

[i]Q: Which weather types are currently available?[/i]
A: Open console and type in 'help weather' > all available settings are visible there. You can also trigger a weather change there as admin or in Single Player.

[i]Q: Does weather affect the player like with temperature or radiation increase/decrease?[/i]Absolutely! You should go inside if a blizzard starts (if you are not equipped good enough) or if radioactive fog is rising.

[i]Q: Does weather effects like meteors or lightnings damage player or structures?[/i]
A: A player can get harmed by sudden temperature rise/drops and radioactivity and by acid rain or fire rain/meteor fire storm. There is currently no effect on bases or vessels (yet).
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：天气是动态变化的吗？[/i]
是的。在星球的游戏场地yaml文件中定义的天气选项之间，白天和夜晚的天气会发生变化。

[i]问：目前有哪些天气类型可用？[/i]
答：打开控制台，输入'help weather'，所有可用的设置都在那里可见。作为管理员或在单人游戏中，你也可以在那里触发天气变化。

[i]问：天气会影响玩家，比如通过温度或辐射的增加/减少吗？[/i]
绝对会！如果暴风雪开始（如果你没有足够的装备），或者放射性雾气上升，你应该进去躲避。

[i]问：天气效果，如流星或闪电，会损害玩家或建筑物吗？[/i]
答：玩家可能会因为突然的温度上升/下降和放射性以及酸雨或火雨/流星火灾风暴而受到伤害。目前对基地或船只还没有影响（还没有）。

English:
[i]Q: What do i need to oxygenate a base or vessel?[/i]
A1: You need an O2 tank and a ventilator. And your base needs to be powered.
A2: Place the ventilator in each room that you want to be oxygenated and add some O2 to the O2 tank. Open the control panel. Activate the base and tick the checkbox 'O2'. This will fill up all the rooms with a ventilator with O2 - given your O2 capacity is high enough. The ventilator needs to be 'active' of course.
A3: Use the DEBUG MODE in the Build Helper Menu (N) to visualize O2.
A4: If your O2 capacity/filing status is too low to oxygenate your base, the process will fail. Add more O2 Tanks or O2.

[i]Q: How long does it take for a large room to be filled with O2?[/i]
This happens pretty instant (maybe a second or two)

[i]Q: How do i know how much O2 i need to fill all the rooms that are connected?[/i]
Look for the OXYGEN stats in the STATISTICS tab of the Control Panel. There are three values given to indicate demand, tank size and current fillstate of the base.
- If a hull breach happens, the O2 in this room is lost, BUT the vents will not try to refill the affected room! So the ventilator is still active, but will not waste precious O2.

- If you deactivate your base and your O2 tanks are full, the O2 in your base is lost.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]Q: 我需要什么来为基地或飞船供氧？[/i]
A1: 你需要一个氧气罐、一个通风器和氧气。基地或飞船需要供电。
A2: 将通风器放置在你想要供氧的每个连续密闭区域，并在氧气罐中加入一些氧气。打开控制面板，激活基地，并勾选'O2'复选框。这将用氧气填满所有装有通风器的区域——前提是你的氧气容量足够高。当然，通风器需要是'激活'状态。
A3: 使用建筑辅助菜单（N）中的DEBUG MODE来可视化氧气。
A4: 如果你的氧气容量/填充状态太低，无法为基地供氧，供氧过程将失败，你需要添加更多的氧气，可能还需要增加氧气罐以提高容量。

[i]Q: 一个大房间充满氧气需要多长时间？[/i]
这几乎瞬间发生（也许一两秒钟）

[i]Q: 我怎么知道需要多少氧气来充满所有相连的房间？[/i]
查看控制面板STATISTICS（统计）标签下的OXYGEN（氧气）数据。给出了三个值来指示需求、罐子大小和基地当前的填充状态。
- 如果发生船体破裂，隔舱中的氧气会丢失，但是通风口不会尝试重新填满受影响区域！所以通风器仍然活跃，但不会浪费宝贵的氧气。
- 如果你停用基地并且你的氧气罐是满的，基地中多余的氧气会被排放并丢失。

English:
[i]Q: Are oxygenated rooms available for all vessels and structures?[/i]
Yes!

[i]Q: Do i consume less O2 when i am in an oxygenated room with helmet off compared to helmet equipped?[/i]
Yes! But you even use up your suit O2 less fast if your helmet is still unfolded in an oxygenated base.

[i]Q: Are there different pressure levels?[/i]
No. The atmosphere in a room either has O2 or not.

[i]Q: Which blocks are airtight?[/i]
A: Have a look at the block info panel for infos about airtight value. Most of the doors are airtight for example - but not all. Airtight doors have a blue containment field active while sealing a room

[i]Q: Can i switch off the containment field of a door to let O2 flow?[/i]
Not yet.

[i]Q: What happens if i open a door? Will O2 flow in the next room?[/i]
Basically no. There are non-airtight doors that do not hinder the flow of O2 either open or closed. All other doors (including hangar doors, shutter doors) have a sealing field to keep the O2 inside. This field cannot (yet) be deactivated per manually, but depends on the global on/off status of the base.

[i]Q: Does O2 get lost if i open a hangar door and deactivate the base?[/i]
No. If you deactivate your base, a decompressing sequence is run and all the O2 is moved back into the tanks (if there is enough room. If not, the excess is lost).

[i]Q: Does O2 get lost if someone blasts a hole in may base / If i remove a block thats leading to a hole in the wall?[/i]
A1: IF this is a 'hull breach' to the non-O2 outside world or space either by damage or by removing the 'wrong block' the O2 in the room is lost.
A2: In this case, the Ventilator is not shut down, but it also will not try to refill the room. So no additional O2 is lost after the hull breach happens.

[i]Q: Do players in my base use up the O2 in the tanks?[/i]
A: YES! If you are in your base (helmet off) you and any other player will use up a certain amount of O2 over time (reducing the total amount > T )
Chinese (simplified):
[i]Q: 所有飞船和建筑都有供氧房间吗？[/i]
是的！

[i]Q: 当我不戴头盔在供氧房间里时，比起戴头盔，我会消耗更少的氧气吗？[/i]
是的，但如果你的头盔装备了一个供氧基地，你的宇航服氧气消耗会更慢。

[i]Q: 有不同的压力级别吗？[/i]
没有。房间里的气氛要么有氧气，要么没有。

[i]Q: 哪些方块是密闭的？[/i]
A: 查看方块信息面板，了解特定方块或设备是否密闭。例如，大多数门是密闭的 - 但并非全部。密闭门在密封房间时会激活一个蓝色的隔离场。

[i]Q: 我可以关闭门的隔离场以让氧气流动吗？[/i]
目前还不可以。

[i]Q: 如果我打开门，氧气会流入下一个房间吗？[/i]
基本上不会。有些非密闭门无论是开启还是关闭，都不会阻碍氧气流动。所有其他门（包括机库门、百叶门）都有一个密封场来保持氧气在内。这个场目前还不能手动关闭，但取决于基地的全局开关状态。

[i]Q: 如果我打开机库门并关闭基地，氧气会丢失吗？[/i]
不会。如果你关闭你的基地，会运行一个减压序列，所有的氧气都会被转移回储罐（如果有足够空间。如果没有，多余的就会丢失）。

[i]Q: 如果有人在我的基地上炸一个洞，或者我移除了导致墙上出现洞的方块，氧气会丢失吗？[/i]
A1: 如果这是对非氧气外界或太空的“船体破损”，无论是由于损坏还是移除了“错误的方块”，房间里的氧气就会丢失。
A2: 在这种情况下，通风机会关闭，但它也不会尝试重新填充房间。所以船体破损发生后，不会有额外的氧气丢失。

[i]Q: 我的基地里的玩家会消耗储罐里的氧气吗？[/i]
是的！如果你在你的基地里（不戴头盔），你和其他任何玩家都会随时间消耗一定量的氧气（减少总数量 > T）。
玩家装甲-增强器-耐久性-修复

English:
[i]Q: Which player armors are currently available?[/i]
Light, Medium, Heavy. If you do not equip any suit, you are still wearing your Interior Suit'. This one has no protection from Temperature and Radiation, no Jetpack, no booster slots - but also is not limited in movement, jump height and other parameters.

[i]Q: Can I build all of them?[/i]
Currently not. You can only build the LIGHT ARMOR. You need to find the MEDIUM and HEAVY suits in POIs/in loot.

[i]Q: Do I lose a player armor if i die?[/i]
No. You spawn with your last-used player armor equipped.

[i]Q: How can I change my player armor?[/i]
You need to go to an Armor locker. Access the device and change suits or add/remove boosters

[i]Q: Can I repair my player armor?[/i]
Yes. You need a REPAIR STATION. Just place the item in the inventory and click REPAIR.

[i]Q: Can I store my armors in the Armor Locker?[/i]
A: Yes!
Chinese (simplified):
[i]Q: 目前可用的玩家装甲有哪些？[/i]
轻型，中型，重型。如果你没有装备任何装甲，你仍然穿着你的“内部装甲”。这种装甲没有温度或辐射的保护，没有喷气背包，没有推进器插槽，也没有光源 - 但同样在移动、跳跃高度或其他参数上不受限制。

[i]Q: 我能否建造所有的装甲？[/i]
目前不可以。你只能建造轻型装甲。你需要在POIs中作为战利品找到中型和重型装甲或从商人处购买。

[i]Q: 如果我死亡，我会丢失玩家装甲吗？[/i]
不会。你会在你最后一次使用的装甲装备中重生。

[i]Q: 我如何更换我的玩家装甲？[/i]
对于轻型装甲，你可以在你的玩家背包（TAB）中更换。对于中型和重型装甲，你需要去装甲寄存器。访问设备并更换装甲或添加/移除推进器。

[i]Q: 我可以修理我的玩家装甲吗？[/i]
可以。你需要一个修理站。只需将物品放入修理台的库存中，然后点击修理。

[i]Q: 我可以在我的装甲寄存器中存放我的装甲吗？[/i]
A: 是的！

English:
[i]Q: Which types of boosters are available at the moment?[/i]
Armor, Jetpack, Temperature, Radiation, O2, Mobility, Multi, EVA.

[i]Q: How many boosters can i use simultaneously?[/i]
Depends on the slots available. This is different for each Player Armor. Interior Suit has no booster slots.

[i]Q: Are there limitations how many boosters of the same kind i can use simultaneously?[/i]
No. You can for example stuff all of the slots with Armor Boosters...but you might also pile up the penalties each of the boosters has.

[i]Q: Can i build all of the boosters?[/i]
No, boosters need to be found or traded. You cannot build them (yet).

[i]Q: Where do i get boosters?[/i]
Boosters are available from loot. More possibilities will be added in the future.

[i]Q: Do i lose boosters if i die?[/i]
Currently not. You are respawned in your last equipped player armor incl. the boosters that were added to this player armor

[i]Q: How can i change / apply boosters?[/i]
You need to go to a Armor locker. Access the device and change suits or add/remove boosters

[i]Q: Do i need to re-add boosters every time i change the player armor?[/i]
NO! The boosters are saved to your Player Armor slots. So you can stuff several player armors with a variation of boosters and just need to swap the player armor to have the setup re-applied!
Chinese (simplified):
[i]Q: 目前有哪些类型的助推器可用？[/i]
装甲，喷气背包，温度，辐射，氧气，机动性，多功能，EVA。

[i]Q: 我可以同时使用多少助推器？[/i]
取决于可用的插槽数量，每种装甲的插槽数量都不同。内部服装没有助推器插槽。

[i]Q: 我可以同时使用多少相同类型的助推器？[/i]
没有限制。例如，你可以将所有的插槽都填满装甲助推器...但你也会增加每个助推器都有的附加惩罚。

[i]Q: 我可以建造所有的助推器吗？[/i]
不可以，助推器需要被发现或者交易获得。除了EVA助推器，你还不能建造它们（目前）。

[i]Q: 我在哪里可以获得助推器？[/i]
助推器可以从战利品和商人那里获得。未来会增加更多的可能性。

[i]Q: 我死亡时会失去助推器吗？[/i]
目前不会。你会在你最后一次装备的玩家装甲中重生，包括添加到这个玩家装甲的助推器。

[i]Q: 我如何更换/应用助推器？[/i]
这取决于装甲助推器。[c][ffffff]检查它们的悬停信息！[-][/c]对于轻型装甲，你可以从玩家库存（TAB）中装备这些。对于其他装甲，你需要去一个装甲储物柜。访问设备并更改服装或添加/移除助推器。

[i]Q: 每次更换装甲时我都需要装备助推器吗？[/i]
不需要！助推器保存在你的玩家装甲插槽中；如果你有助推器和装甲，你可以配置多种玩家装甲，随时更换所需的助推器！

English:
[i]Q: Which items are affected by durability?[/i]
T2 Weapons and Suits. (Basic weapons and tools currently have no durability: pistol, shotgun, assault rifle, sniper).

[i]Q: How does durability work for weapons?[/i]
 A: When you shoot the weapon there is a chance that durability is reduced.

[i]Q: How does durability work for suits?[/i]
Durability is reduced when you get hit by a weapon. There is no 'idle degradation' for just using the armor or standing around, only damage.

[i]Q: Can i repair my suit?[/i]
Yes. You need a REPAIR STATION. Just place the item in the inventory and click REPAIR.

[i]Q: Can i repair my weapons?[/i]
Yes. You need a REPAIR STATION. Just place the item in the inventory and click REPAIR.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：哪些物品会受耐久度影响？[/i]
答：T2 武器和防护服。（基础武器和工具目前没有耐久度：手枪、霰弹枪、突击步枪、狙击步枪）。

[i]问：武器的耐久度是如何工作的？[/i]
答：当你射击武器时，有几率会减少耐久度。

[i]问：防护服的耐久度是如何工作的？[/i]
答：当你被武器击中时，耐久度会减少。仅在受到攻击时才会减少耐久度，仅仅穿着护甲或站立时不会有“闲置退化”。

[i]问：我可以修复我的防护服吗？[/i]
答：是的。你需要一个 REPAIR STATION（修理站）。只需将物品放入库存并点击 REPAIR（修复）。

[i]问：我可以修复我的武器吗？[/i]
答：是的。你需要一个 REPAIR STATION（修理站）。只需将物品放入库存并点击 REPAIR（修复）。

English:
[i]Q: Are Instances limited for a number of players or by time?[i]
Depends on how the creator has set it up. Can be done in the playfield.yaml of the instance. Instance:
[b]Time: 100 # minutes until this instance has to be completed and players are kicked
MaxPlayers: 3 # portal closes after his amount of players entered
PortalOpen: 120 # seconds the portal is open
Cooldown: 90 # seconds the portal is closed after it was open (cooldown time)[/b]

[i]Q: Can i re-enter my instance?[i]
A1: Yes. The portal to your instance is shown purple in this case.
A2: Re-entering an instance is possible as long as the instance is 'alive' (TIME setting)

[i]Q: Can other players follow me into the instance?[i]
A1: Basically yes. They can follow you as long as a) there is more than 1 player allowed and b) in this case as long as the portal is open.

[i]Q: Do i have to wait until a player or group has 'finished' the instance?[i]
No, there can be multiple parallel instances.

[i]Q: Can i use the blueprint library in an Instance?[i]
Can be set on/off by the creator in the yaml of the playfield.

[i]Q: What happens when the time runs out on a instance and i am still inside?[/i]
You get teleported outside the instance and either keep your stuff or lose all your stuff. This can be adjusted by the creator in the playfield.yaml
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：实例是否限制玩家数量或有时间限制？[/i]
取决于创建者如何设置。可以在实例的playfield.yaml中进行设置。实例：
[b]时间：100 # 这个实例必须在多少分钟内完成，否则玩家会被踢出
最大玩家数：3 # 达到这个数量的玩家进入后传送门会关闭
传送门开启时间：120 # 传送门开启的时间（秒）
冷却时间：90 # 传送门关闭后的冷却时间（秒）[/b]

[i]问：我可以重新进入我的实例吗？[/i]
A1：是的。在这种情况下，通往你实例的传送门会显示为紫色。
A2：只要实例是“活跃”的（根据TIME设置），就可以重新进入实例。

[i]问：其他玩家可以跟随我进入实例吗？[/i]
A1：基本上可以。只要a)允许超过1名玩家进入，并且b)在这种情况下，只要传送门是开启的，他们就可以跟随你。

[i]问：我是否需要等待一个玩家或团队“完成”实例？[/i]
不，可以有多个并行实例。

[i]问：我可以在实例中使用蓝图库吗？[/i]
创建者可以在playfield的yaml中设置开启或关闭。

[i]问：当实例时间耗尽而我还在里面时会发生什么？[/i]
你会被传送到实例外面，要么保留你的物品，要么失去所有物品。这可以通过创建者在playfield.yaml中进行调整。

English:
Here are a few basic SI rules you need to take into account: 

1. Only blocks that are touching the ground will be 100% stable (does not depend on the material used) 

2. You can only achieve 100% stability for a vertical row of blocks, if the lowest block is touching the ground. If you have a 100% stable block, a so called 'anchor block', you can build a vertical pillar on top of it as high as the sky. There is no vertical limit (yet). 

3. If you add blocks to such a 100% stable pillar in any horizontal direction, so each block that is attached in a row, any additional block will have a lower stability - until the row reaches a breaking point. The maximum range or breaking point for a horizontal, floating, not supported beam made out of any of the four base materials is 12 blocks. Note: The anchor block will keep its stability, as there is no such thing as shear force (yet)! [u]Tip:[/u] if your line or area of blocks is showing weak spots, just build a supporting pillar! 

4. Do not put heavy materials or devices on top of an already weak beam or weak foundation. You might risk the construction to collapse and your devices will be destroyed.
Chinese (simplified):
以下是一些您需要考虑的基本SI规则：

1. 只有接触地面的方块才会100%稳定（与使用的材料无关）。

2. 您只能通过接触地面的最底层方块实现100%的稳定性。如果您拥有一个100%稳定的方块，即所谓的“锚方块”，您可以在其上建造一个垂直柱子，高度可至天空。目前还没有垂直限制。

3. 如果您在这样的100%稳定柱子的任何水平方向上添加方块，即每个连接成一排的方块，任何额外的方块都会拥有较低的稳定性——直到这一排达到断裂点。任何四种基础材料制成的水平、悬浮、无支撑梁的最大范围或断裂点是12个方块。注意：锚方块将保持其稳定性，因为目前还没有剪切力这回事！[小提示]：如果您的方块线或区域显示出弱点，只需建造一个支撑柱即可！

4. 不要将重的材料或设备放置在已经薄弱的梁或薄弱的基础上。您可能会冒险导致建筑倒塌，您的设备将被摧毁。

English:
[i]Q: My base has suddenly broken apart. What did i do wrong?[/i]
- If you started a blueprint from Pre-Alpha, first start a creative game, switch off SI (Open Console with Tabulator button, enter 'SI off') and make a new blueprint. This will fix most of the problems – except a non-SI conform design.
- Hold N and select the SI Overlay to visualize the structural integrity of your base while building. 
- Technical note: The SI is recalculated with every new block you are adding or removing - not in advance!
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：我的基地突然破裂了。我做错了什么？[/i]
- 如果你从Pre-Alpha开始了一个蓝图，首先开始一个创意模式的游戏，关闭SI（用制表符键打开控制台，输入'SI off'）并制作一个新的蓝图。这将修复大多数问题——除了不符合SI的设计。
- 按住N并选择SI覆盖层，在建造时可视化你的基地的结构完整性。
- 技术说明：每当你添加或移除新的方块时，SI都会重新计算——而不是提前计算！

English: [i]Q: Can I deactivate SI?[/i]\nYes, but only for Single Player. Open the Console (TAB by default) and type in 'SI off'.
Chinese (simplified): [i]问：我可以关闭SI吗？[/i]\n是的，但仅限于单人游戏。打开控制台（默认为TAB键）并输入'SI off'。

English:
[i]Q: Which building materials are available in the game?[/i]
You can choose from four different materials: 
- [u]Wood:[/u] easy to acquire in large numbers from all trees (use Chainsaw or Harvester Module), but very low HP and Armor.
- [u]Concrete:[/u] a good and durable alternative to steel and very easy to craft in high numbers. You only need rock dust.
- [u]Steel:[/u] not changed.
- [u]Hardened Steel:[/u] the most durable material in the game, twice the hit points compared to steel – but also needs twice the time and resources to produce.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：游戏中有哪些建筑材料可用？[/i]
你可以选择四种不同的材料：
- [u]木头：[/u] 很容易从所有树木（使用链锯或收割模块）大量获取，但生命值和护甲非常低。
- [u]混凝土：[/u] 是钢铁的良好耐用替代品，非常容易大量制作。你只需要岩石粉尘。
- [u]钢铁：[/u] 没有变化。
- [u]硬化钢：[/u] 游戏中最耐用的材料，生命值是钢铁的两倍——但生产所需的时间和资源也是钢铁的两倍。

English:
[i]Q: How do i access the shapes for the building blocks (SURVIVAL & CREATIVE)?[/i]
Move a building block to your toolbelt. Highlight it and hit RIGHT-MOUSE button. This will open the new block-manager with all the shapes.

[i]Q: Which of the building blocks are organized in such 'block families', available with the new block-shapes menu?[/i]
Currently the following building blocks are organized that way: Basic Building Block Materials (wood, concrete, steel, hardened steel), Windows, Truss, Stairs, Walkways, Deco (beds etc.), Consoles (Deco), Artificial Indoor Plants and Alien Blocks (for creative only).
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：我如何访问用于建筑方块的形状（生存模式 & 创造模式）？[/i]
将一个建筑方块移动到你的工具带中。高亮它并点击右键鼠标按钮。这将打开新的方块管理器，里面包含了所有形状。

[i]问：哪些建筑方块是以“方块家族”的形式组织的，可以通过新的方块形状菜单获得？[/i]
目前，以下建筑方块是以这种方式组织的：基础建筑方块材料（木头、混凝土、钢铁、硬化钢铁）、窗户、桁架、楼梯、走道、装饰品（床等）、控制台（装饰品）、人造室内植物和外星方块（仅限创造模式）。

English:
[i]Q: How does the block rotation work?[/i]
You can rotate blocks BEFORE and AFTER you have placed them: 

[u]BEFORE:[/u] If you want to place a new block, you might notice a green line sticking out from the block. This is the ROTATION AXIS. Change with INSERT or DELETE (Default). If you use HOME or END (default), the block will rotate around the Axis line clockwise or counter-clockwise! Use PAGE UP and PAGE DOWN buttons to move the block up and down vertically! 

[u]AFTER:[/u] If you placed a block and would want to rotate it afterwards, you need to equip the Multitool and use its Rotation-Mode (Select via RMB). Aim at a block and you will see the ROTATION AXIS. From here, rotating the block works like when placing a new block (INS/DEL to change Axis, HOME/END to rotate the block).
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：方块旋转是如何工作的？[/i]
你可以在放置方块之前和之后旋转方块：

[u]之前：[/u]如果你想放置一个新的方块，你可能会注意到从方块伸出的一条绿线。这是旋转轴。使用插入或删除键（默认）进行更改。如果你使用主页或结束键（默认），方块会围绕轴线顺时针或逆时针旋转！使用页面上和页面下按钮垂直上下移动方块！

[u]之后：[/u]如果你放置了一个方块，之后想要旋转它，你需要装备多功能工具并使用其旋转模式（通过右键选择）。瞄准一个方块，你将看到旋转轴。从这里开始，旋转方块的方式就像放置一个新的方块一样（INS/DEL更改轴，HOME/END旋转方块）。

English: [i]Q: Is it possible to place blocks as a line or in a larger plane?[/i]\nYES! HOLD the left mouse button to drag a line of blocks. Hold STRG+left mouse button to create a plane area of blocks. Important Tip: when creating a plane, make sure your stand is higher than the area you want to place. This makes it a lot easier to drag the plane from the start- to the end-point without getting in trouble with your view. And: you cannot place an endless line or an endless plane.
Chinese (simplified): [i][/i]问：是否可以将积木放置成一条直线或一个较大的平面？按住鼠标左键拖动一条积木线。按住 STRG+ 鼠标左键可以创建一个积木平面区域。重要提示：创建平面时，确保您的支架高于要放置的区域。这样可以更容易地将平面从起点拖到终点，而不会影响视图。还有：不能放置无尽的线或无尽的平面。
移动线框图 / 清除污垢

English:
[i]Q: Do I need to flatten the terrain ahead of placing a base starter block?[/i]
No. You can move the preview- wireframe UP and DOWN ahead of placing it. Please have a look in the Options menu to which keys this action is currently bound to (Default Page Up and Page down).

[i]Q: I have built my base into a hill and need to remove the dirt. Does the drill or flatten mode of the Multi Tool damage my base blocks?[/i]
No.

[i]Q: How do i remove blocks without using the Multi Tool Tool in CREATIVE?[/i]
Use SHIFT-Right Mouse click (This has been changed from pre-alpha as right-click also brings up the block-manager now)

[i]Q: The night is so dark – what can I do?[/i]
Place some work lights! 

[u]Tip:[/u] The Player Drone (F5) can do ALL of the building tasks as well!
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：在放置基地起始方块之前，我需要平整地形吗？[/i]
不需要。你可以在放置之前上下移动预览线框。请查看选项菜单，了解当前这个动作绑定到了哪些键位（默认是Page Up和Page Down键）。

[i]问：我把基地建在了山坡上，需要移走泥土。生存工具的钻头模式会损坏我的基地方块吗？[/i]
不会。

[i]问：在创意模式下，我如何在不使用多功能工具的情况下移除方块？[/i]
使用SHIFT-右键点击（这与预阿尔法版本有所不同，因为现在右键点击也会调出方块管理器）

[i]问：夜晚太黑了，我能做些什么？[/i]
放置一些工作灯！

[u]提示：[/u]玩家无人机（F5）也能完成所有建筑任务，并且内置了光源！

English: [i]Q: Can I use a mirror mode when building?[/i]\nYes. Open the Build Helper Menu (N) and select the mirror plane you want to use. Click on a block of your vessel that should serve as the 'mirror axis'. . A mirror plane will be shown. A second click will move the mirror plane between CENTER and EDGE.You can only use one mirror plane at a time.
Chinese (simplified): 问：建造时可以使用镜像模式吗？\n答：可以。打开建造助手菜单（N键），选择你想要使用的镜像平面。点击你的飞船上的一个方块，它将作为‘镜像轴’。将会显示一个镜像平面。第二次点击将在中心和边缘之间移动镜像平面。一次只能使用一个镜像平面。

English:
[i]Q: Is it possible to paint devices like stairs or generators?[/i]
Yes!

[i]Q: Is it possible to apply a texture or a paint to a whole block?[/i]
Yes. Just tick the 'apply to all sides' button in the paint/texture menu.

[i]Q: Why do the available textures change in my tool while pointing at different blocks?[/i]
The available textures are split in two sections: 
1. Common textures that are available for all block materials. 
2. Special textures that are only available for certain materials.

The Special Textures are automatically loaded to the menu when pointing at a block with the texture tool!
Chinese (simplified):
[i]Q: 可以给楼梯或发电机这样的设备上色吗？[/i]
是的！

[i]Q: 可以给整个方块应用纹理或油漆吗？[/i]
可以。只需在油漆/纹理菜单中勾选“应用到所有面”按钮即可。

[i]Q: 为什么当我指向不同的方块时，工具中的可用纹理会变化？[/i]
可用纹理分为两节：
1. 通用纹理适用于所有方块材质。
2. 特殊纹理仅适用于某些材质，并且在使用纹理工具指向具有该纹理的方块时，会自动加载到菜单中！

English: [i]Q: How can I switch the opacity of the standard windows?[/i]\nEquip the Multi Tool and set to Rotate mode via RMB. Then aim at the window and left-mouse-click to swap the opacity (this does not work for the windows with blinds!)
Chinese (simplified): [i]问：我如何切换标准窗户的透明度？[/i]\n装备多功能工具，并通过右键点击将其设置为旋转模式。然后瞄准窗户并左键点击以切换透明度（这不适用于有百叶窗的窗户！）

English:
[i]Q: Do I need to walk up to any of my devices to adjust their settings, for example for changing the color of lights?[/i]
There are several ways how you can work on the devices of a base or vessel
1. Walk up to a device, aim the crosshair at it and hit P. The Control Panel will open the device detail page! (You need to be in physical touch with the base or vessel!) 
2. Open the Control Panel (P) and use the list on the left to open the detail page
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：我需要走近我的设备来调整它们的设置吗，例如改变灯光的颜色？[/i]
有几种方法可以操作基地或飞船上的设备：
1. 走到设备旁边，将准星对准它，然后按P键。控制面板将打开设备详细信息页面！（你需要与基地或飞船物理接触！）
2. 打开控制面板（P），并使用左侧的列表来打开详细信息页面。

English:
[i]Q: Can I rename a base or vessel?[/i]
Yes. Open the Control Panel (P) and change the name of your base in the lower right corner of the info screen. Hit ENTER to save the name.

[i]Q: Can I rename the devices of a base or vessel?[/i]
Yes. You first need to add them to a group manually or by using the auto-group feature. Then open the detail page of a device by selecting it from the list. Change the name in the top-middle box (next to NAME). Hit ENTER to save the name! 

[u]Please note (current limitations): [/u] 
- Ungrouped devices cannot be renamed. 
- Using auto-group a second time after having renamed devices will reset the renamed devices to standard name!
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：我可以重命名一个基地或飞船吗？[/i]
是的。打开控制面板（P），在信息屏幕右下角更改你的基地名称。按ENTER键保存名称。

[i]问：我可以重命名基地或飞船的设备吗？[/i]
是的。你首先需要手动或使用自动分组功能将它们添加到一个组中。然后通过从列表中选择设备来打开设备的详细信息页面。在顶部中间的框（在NAME旁边）更改名称。按ENTER键保存名称！

[u]请注意（当前限制）：[/u]
- 未分组的设备无法重命名。
- 在重命名设备后再次使用自动分组将把已重命名的设备重置回标准名称！

English: [i]Q: I am dying from a lack of O2 while sitting in a cockpit![/i]\nYou need to add an O2 tank, filled with O2 bottles to your vessel. Otherwise you'll use up your suit O2. This also applies to Passenger Seats in any vessel.\nNOTE: This only applies to a non-O2 environment. You will NOT die from a lack of O2 if your vessel is in an O2-rich environment (oxygenized Hangar or Planet)
Chinese (simplified): [i]问：当我坐在驾驶舱里时，因为缺少氧气，我快要死了！[/i]\n您需要在飞船上添加一个氧气罐，里面装满氧气瓶。否则，你就会用光衣服上的氧气。这也适用于任何船只上的乘客座位。如果你的飞船处于富含氧气的环境（含氧机库或行星）中，你不会因为缺乏氧气而死亡。
CV 只会非常缓慢地转动

English: [i]Q: My Capital Vessel turns very slow and I hate dragging the mouse for hours?[/i] \nEither add more RCS or use the ARROW KEYS for turning your Capital Vessel! Combine both and steering a large Capital Vessel will become much easier!
Chinese (simplified): [i]问：我的主力舰转向非常慢，我讨厌拖动鼠标好几个小时！[/i]\n\n要么增加更多的RCS，要么使用方向键来转向你的主力舰！两者结合使用，操控大型主力舰将变得更加容易！

English:
[i]Q: Can I add more than one cockpit to my vessel?[/i]
Of course! But remember: 
- The player that enters any cockpit AT FIRST will be the pilot of the ship. 
- If this cockpit is 90° or 180° to your mounted weapons, this pilot will not have the mounted weapons on this toolbelt/at his disposal. 
- Only players that sit in a cockpit parallel to the alignment of any mounted weapon can use them.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：我可以在我的飞船上增加多个驾驶舱吗？[/i]
当然可以！但请记住：
- 首先进入任何一个驾驶舱的玩家将成为飞船的飞行员。
- 如果这个驾驶舱与你的安装武器成90°或180°，那么这个飞行员将无法在工具栏上使用这些安装武器。
- 只有坐在与安装武器对齐平行的驾驶舱中的玩家才能使用它们。

English:
[i]Q: Can I dock a Small Vessel or a Hover Vessel to a Capital Vessel?[/i]
Yes, but the to-be-docked vessels need to be in the same faction as the Capital Vessel you want to dock it to. Exception: if the Capital Vessel is set to public, any private vessel can dock.

[i]Q: How does docking work in particular?[/i]
Your Vessel needs to be equipped with docking pads or landing gears attached BELOW the vessel corpus. Adding docking pads on the sides or on the top will not dock the vessel to the Capital Vessel! 

Move your Small Vessel or Hover Vessel onto the Capital Vessel. Lower the vessel with C and the Vessel will dock itself. There is no Docking-Key. Just have a look at the info screen on the right. It will show you a 'docked: ' with YES or NO. To undock, just hit SPACE and fly away.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：我可以将小型飞船或悬浮飞船停靠到主力舰上吗？[/i]
是的，但要停靠的飞船需要与您想要停靠的主力舰属于同一派系。例外情况：如果主力舰设置为公共的，任何私人飞船都可以停靠。

[i]问：具体的停靠操作是怎样的？[/i]
您的飞船需要装备有停靠垫或着陆装置，并且这些装置必须安装在飞船主体的下方。在飞船的侧面或顶部添加停靠垫是无法实现停靠到主力舰的！

将您的小型飞船或悬浮飞船移动到主力舰上。使用C键降低飞船高度，飞船将自动停靠。没有停靠键。只需查看右侧的信息屏幕，它会显示“已停靠：”以及是或否的状态。要脱离停靠，只需按下空格键并飞离。
在飞行中访问设备/炮塔

English: [i]Q: Can I reload my turrets or manage my constructors while flying around?[/i]\nYou can access a turret or any device from a cockpit or a passenger seat! You can also reload your ammo containers or manage your constructors while sitting in the cockpit or passenger seat in mid-flight. Simply open the Control Panel (P) and use the ACCESS button of the device – or just double-click on it! Use the BACK button to return to the Control Panel or use T (default) to exit the view.
Chinese (simplified): [i]问：我可以在飞行中重新装填我的炮塔或管理我的建造机吗？[/i]\n你可以从驾驶舱或乘客座位访问炮塔或任何设备！你也可以在飞行中途坐在驾驶舱或乘客座位时重新装填你的弹药容器或管理你的建造机。只需打开控制面板（P），使用设备的接入按钮——或者直接双击它！使用返回按钮回到控制面板，或者使用T（默认）退出视图。

English:
[i]Q: How do I warp with a ship?[/i]
Warping is currently only possible with Capital Vessels. 
1. Add a warp drive and a warp tank to the vessel. Search for the blue crystals, turn them to Pentaxid (in a Constructor) and put them into the warp tank. Each jump will use up a given amount of Pentaxid, but Blue Crystals can be found all over the Solar System. (See Chapter 'Harvesting and Resources') 
2. To do a warp jump, fly to space, open the Space Map (M) and click the Solar System Tab. You will see a list of jump destinations on the left. Select a destination from the left and click on 'LOCK TARGET' on the bottom right. 
3. A blue crosshair will appear in your view or on the side of your helmet. Turn your vessel towards the blue rectangle, accelerate to at least 60 m/s and hit K (default) to jump.

[i]Q: Can my passengers take a seat in a docked vessel while warping?[/i]
NO! Your passengers need to take a seat in a passenger seat in your Capital Vessel when warping, when flying to space or back to a planet. Otherwise they might get dropped out and will be left behind.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：我如何用飞船进行翘曲？[/i]
翘曲目前只可能通过主力舰实现。
1. 给飞船添加一个翘曲引擎和一个翘曲燃料箱。寻找蓝色水晶，将它们在建造机中转化为翘曲水晶（原料），然后放入翘曲燃料箱。每次跳跃会消耗一定量的翘曲水晶（原料），但蓝色水晶可以在太阳系的任何地方找到。（参见“收获与资源”章节）
2. 要进行翘曲跳跃，飞向太空，打开太空地图（M）并点击太阳系标签。你会在左侧看到一个跳跃目的地列表。从左侧选择一个目的地，然后点击右下角的'锁定目标'。
3. 你的视野中或头盔侧面会出现一个蓝色十字准星。将你的飞船转向蓝色矩形，加速至至少60米/秒，然后按K键（默认）进行跳跃。

[i]问：翘曲时，我的乘客可以在对接的飞船中坐下吗？[/i]
不可以！翘曲时，你的乘客需要在你的主力舰中的乘客座位上坐下，无论是飞向太空还是返回行星。否则他们可能会被甩出去，被留在后面。

English: [i]Q: The range of the weapons says XX meters, but it does not seem to hit anything![/i]\nCheck the EFFECTIVE RANGE info on the bottom right! On a planet, the range will be much lower, depending on the density of the atmosphere.
Chinese (simplified): [i]问：武器的射程显示为 XX 米，但似乎打不到任何东西！[/i]\n检查右下角的有效射程信息！在行星上，射程会小得多，这取决于大气层的密度。

English: [i]Q: Does the Multi Tool, Harvester or the Chainsaw Damage own or enemy blocks or enemies at all?[/i]\nNo, with one exception: the chainsaw can be used for close combat fights.
Chinese (simplified): 问：多功能工具、收割机或链锯会对我自己的方块或敌人的方块或敌人造成伤害吗？\n不，有一个例外：链锯可以用于近战战斗。

English: [i]Q: Can Enhanced Weapons be crafted?[/i]\nYes, but you will need the appropriate Weapon Kit, which cannot be crafted, but only be found or traded.
Chinese (simplified): [i]Q：强化武器可以制作吗？ [/i]\n是的，但你需要相应的武器套装，这些套装无法制作，只能通过寻找或交易获得。

English:
[i]Q: How do I reload / add ammo to my guns and turrets?[/i]
- You need to build an ammo box and add it to your base or vessel. Then find out which ammo your guns need and just put it in the ammo box. The ammo box does not need to be near the turret. Keep it in a save place
- Turrets will reload themselves from the ammo box. Fixed guns on Small Vessel/Hover Vessel and Capital Vessel will also reload automatically if you keep the fire button pressed. 
- You can access a turret or any device from a cockpit or a passenger seat! You can also reload your ammo containers or manage your constructors while sitting in the cockpit or passenger seat in mid-flight. Simply open the Control Panel (P) and use the ACCESS button of the device – or just double-click on it! Use the BACK button to return to the Control Panel or use F (default) to exit the view. 
- You can enter a turret and reload or shoot it manually! 
- You cannot warp or fly to space or down to a planet while sitting in a turret!
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：我如何为我的枪械和炮塔重新装填/添加弹药？[/i]
- 你需要建造一个弹药箱并将其添加到你的基地或飞船中。然后找出你的枪械需要哪种弹药，只需将其放入弹药箱中。弹药箱不需要靠近炮塔，所以可以将它放置在安全的位置。
- 炮塔会自动从弹药箱中重新装填。小型、悬浮或主力舰上的固定炮塔，如果你保持开火按钮按下状态，也会自动重新装填。
- 你可以从驾驶舱或乘客座位访问炮塔或任何设备！你还可以坐在驾驶舱或飞行中的乘客座位时重新装填你的弹药容器或管理你的建造机。只需打开控制面板（P）并使用设备的接入按钮——或者直接双击它！使用后退按钮返回到控制面板或使用F（默认）退出视图。
- 你可以进入炮塔手动重新装填或射击！
- 当你坐在炮塔中时，你不能翘曲飞行或飞向太空或下降到星球！

English:
[i]Q: How do I access a turret for a Hover Vessel and Capital Vessel?[/i]
Enter the cockpit or a passenger seat. Open the Control Panel (P) and find the turret in the list on the left. Then, either select the turret and use the ACCESS on the top right screen OR just double-click the turret to activate the gunnery HUD. Use F (default) to exit the turret.

[i]Q: How do I access a turret in a Base?[/i]
Use the Control-Panel as described above OR stand next to a turret and hit F (default) to enter it.

[i]Q: How does turret targeting work? (Base/Capital Vessel/Hover Vessel?[/i]
Turrets are AI-controlled guns that will shoot on any target that is set in their detail screen. To change their target behavior, open the Control Panel and select the turret from the list. You can activate/deactivate or change the targeting parameters in the 'Attack' overview. 
- Other Factions = anyone that does not belong to YOUR faction (Private is also a faction!) 
- Alien = Alien Drones, Soldiers and Crawlers
- Predator = Fauna that will attack you without being provoked (like Wood Walkers or Plant Monsters). Also includes the Talon on Akua (despite they do not attack when not provoked)
- Prey = Fauna that will not attack you (unless being provoked).

Q: Can I apply the targeting settings to a turret group?
A: Yes. In the device list, group the turrets, then click on the header of the group. On the right side you will get all the targeting settings. Set the checkboxes and use APPLY to group.
A: Orange checkbox = not all of the turrets in the group share the same setting on this targeting option.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：我如何进入悬浮飞船和主力舰的炮塔？[/i]
进入驾驶舱或乘客座位。打开控制面板（P），在左侧列表中找到炮塔。然后，要么选择炮塔并使用右上角的ACCESS，要么直接双击炮塔以激活炮手HUD。使用F（默认）退出炮塔。

[i]问：我如何在基地中进入炮塔？[/i]
按照上述方法使用控制面板，或者站在炮塔旁边并按F（默认）进入它。

[i]问：炮塔目标定位是如何工作的？（基地/主力舰/悬浮飞船）[/i]
炮塔是AI控制的炮，会射击它们视野范围内的任何有效目标。要改变它们的目标行为，打开控制面板并从列表中选择炮塔。你可以在“攻击”概览中激活/停用或更改目标参数。请注意，只有当你的声望为不友好/敌对时，炮塔才会向派系NPC/POI开火！

问：我可以将目标设置应用到炮塔组吗？
答：是的。在设备列表中，将炮塔分组，然后点击组的标题。在右侧，你将获得所有目标设置。设置复选框并使用APPLY来分组。
答：橙色复选框 = 组中的不是所有炮塔都共享这个目标选项上的相同设置。

English:
[i]Q: How does the Player Drone work (F5)?[/i]
The drone is a building helper. It can use all building features including placing blueprints and using the Remove & Repair tool. It cannot use ALL tools or weapons yet. 

Hit F5 to spawn the Player drone. It does not cost you resources or energy to do so, but it has a limited range. If you keep going farther away, the view will get distorted and finally be cut off. Your drone is lost. You can recall it using F5. 

If the drone is destroyed by other players or just lost, you will not lose its inventory, as the inventory or blocks in the toolbelt are technically still in your players inventory/toolbelt.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：玩家无人机如何工作（按F5键）？[/i]
无人机是建筑和采矿的助手。它可以使用所有建筑功能，包括放置蓝图，使用多功能工具的移除和修复功能，以及使用手持钻/链锯来获取资源，但它不能使用所有的工具或武器。

按下F5键来召唤玩家无人机。这样做不会消耗你的资源或能量，但它的有效范围有限。如果你继续远离，视图会变得扭曲，最终会被切断。如果你的无人机丢失了，你可以使用F5键来召回它。

如果无人机被其他玩家摧毁或丢失，你不会丢失它的库存，因为工具腰带中的库存或方块从技术上讲仍然在你的库存/工具腰带中。

English: [i]Q: How to create or join a faction?[/i]\n- Open your inventory and click the Faction button. Just create one as you see fit. \n- You can join an existing faction or manage your faction (candidates) from the same screen
Chinese (simplified): [i]问：如何创建或加入派系？[/i]\n- 打开你的背包并点击派系按钮。按照你的想法创建一个。\n- 你可以加入一个现有的派系或者在同一屏幕上管理你的派系（候选人）。

English: [i]Q: Is it possible to revert the faction status of a vessel or base back to public or private?[/i]\nYes, but only the Faction owner can do that.
Chinese (simplified): [i]问：有可能将一艘飞船或基地的派系状态恢复为公共或私人吗？[/i]\n是的，但只有派系所有者才能做到这一点。

English: [i]Q: Does the Offline Protection also protect all our faction structures in PvP?[/i]\nOf course, but for factions the Offline Protection only activates, if no one of your faction members is on the server anymore!
Chinese (simplified): [i]问：离线保护是否也会在PvP中保护我们派系的所有结构？[/i]\n当然会，但对于派系来说，只有当没有任何派系成员在服务器上时，离线保护才会激活！
将单个设备设置为公用

English: [i]Q: Can I set specific devices like passenger seats for public use?[/i]\nYes! Just access the device via Control Panel and set a lock code. For public access use 0000
Chinese (simplified): [i][/i]问：我可以将乘客座位等特定设备设置为公用吗？只需通过控制面板访问设备并设置锁定密码。对于公共访问，请使用 0000

English: [i]Q: Is there a way to mark a faction as a 'friendly ally' allowing them to use our devices?[/i]\nYES! You can send an alliance request to a befriended faction!
Chinese (simplified): 问：有没有办法将一个派系标记为“友好盟友”，允许他们使用我们的设备？\n答：是的！你可以向已经成为朋友的派系发送结盟请求！

English:
[i]Q: Is it possible to access Containers or Constructors from remote, other than standing next to them?[/i]
Yes! Open the Control Panel (P) and use the ACCESS button for devices like Turrets, Constructors, Containers and more! You can also DOUBLE-CLICK on the device! Use the BACK button on the top left corner of the screen to get back to the Control Panel or use F (default) to exit the view.

[i]Q: I cannot open any turret on my Hover Vessel or Capital Vessel when standing next to them and using F?[/i]
For turrets on vessels you need to use the ACCESS button from the Control Panel as they cannot be accessed directly when standing next to them.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：除了站在它们旁边之外，是否还可以远程访问容器或建造机？[/i]
是的！打开控制面板（P），并使用访问按钮来操作像炮塔、建造机、容器等设备！你也可以直接双击设备！使用屏幕左上角的返回按钮回到控制面板，或者使用F（默认）退出视图。

[i]问：为什么我站在飞船或主力舰的炮塔旁边并使用F键时，无法打开任何炮塔？[/i]
对于飞船上的炮塔，你需要从控制面板使用访问按钮，因为它们不能在站在它们旁边时直接访问。

English:
[i]Q: Can I rename a base or vessel?[/i]
Yes. Open the Control Panel (P) and change the name of your base in the lower right corner of the info screen. Hit ENTER to save the name.

[i]Q: Can I rename the devices of a base or vessel?[/i]
Yes. You first need to add them to a group manually or by using the auto-group feature. Then open the detail page of a device by selecting it from the list. Change the name in the top-middle box (next to NAME). Hit ENTER to save the name! 

[u]Please note (current limitations): [/u] 
- Ungrouped devices cannot be renamed. 
- Using auto-group a second time after having renamed devices will reset the renamed devices to standard name!

[i]Q: There is a STATISTICS TAB in the Control Panel?[/i] 
This provides more in-detail info about your vessel or base. For vessels, you'll get an expanded view with torque diagrams and other useful details!
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：我可以重命名基地或飞船吗？[/i]
是的。打开控制面板（P），在信息屏幕右下角更改基地的名称。按ENTER键保存名称。

[i]问：我可以重命名基地或飞船的设备吗？[/i]
可以。你首先需要手动或使用自动分组功能将它们添加到一个组中。然后通过从列表中选择设备来打开设备的详细页面。在顶部中间的框（名称旁边）中更改名称。按ENTER键保存名称！

[u]请注意（当前限制）：[/u]
- 未分组的设备不能重命名。
- 在重命名设备后再次使用自动分组将使重命名的设备名称重置为默认名称！

[i]问：控制面板中有一个统计标签吗？[/i]
这个标签提供了关于你的飞船或基地的更详细的信息。对于飞船，你将获得一个扩展视图，包括扭矩图和其他有用的详细信息！

English:
[i]Q: I noticed I can group devices in the Control Panel of a base or a vessel – are there more features available here?[/i]
Yes. For example: If you group all of your forward and rear facing thrusters into separate groups, you can activate and deactivate them individually.

[i]Q: Are these group-setting functions available with all device groups?[/i]
Not yet.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：我注意到我可以在基地或飞船的控制面板中对设备进行分组——这里还有其他可用的功能吗？[/i]
是的。例如：如果你将所有面向前方和后方的推进器分成不同的组，你可以分别激活和停用它们。

[i]问：这些分组设置功能对所有设备组都可用吗？[/i]
还没有。

English:
[i]Q: Where can I set my vessel or base to private or faction?[/i]
Open the Control Panel (P) and select your faction from the dropdown on the bottom right. 
- Public = anyone can use/work on it with tools
- Private = only Owner can use / work on it with tools
- Faction = only Faction members can use /work on it with tools 

[u]Note:[/u] Private or Public are also counted as a 'faction' (technically)
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：在哪里可以将我的船只或基地设置为私人或派系？ [/i]
打开控制面板（P），从右下角的下拉菜单中选择你的派系。
- Public = 任何人都可以使用工具在上面使用/工作；
- Private = 只有所有者可以使用工具在上面使用/工作；
- Faction = 只有派别成员可以使用工具在上面使用/工作；
n[u]注意：[/u] Private 或 Public 也算作一个 '派别'（技术上）。

English:
[i]Q: What is the effect of the HOME selection in the Control Panel ?[/i]
You can make one of your Bases or Capital Vessels your HOME. This will open up a new Respawn-option in the Respawn menu. The difference to all other options: Even if you die in a remote place (like on another planet or in space with no possibility to escape), the HOME option will teleport you back to this Capital Vessel or BA – even if it is not in the same playfield! 

[u]Note:[/u] Build either a Medic Bay (Level 7) or a Clone Chamber (Level 1) for setting the Respawn point more precisely

[i]Q: What is the Clone Chamber all about?[/i]
If you tagged on of your BA or Capital Vessel as HOME without having a Clone Chamber or Medic Bay built, you will teleported back close to your HOME. With a Clone Chamber (or Medic Bay) you will spawn exactly where this device is located at!

[i]Q: Can I tag more than one BA or Capital Vessel as HOME?[/i]
No. Only on Capital Vessel or BA of yours can be set to HOME at any time.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：控制面板中HOME选项的效果是什么？[/i]
你可以将你的一个基地或主力舰设为HOME。这将在重生菜单中打开一个新的重生选项。与所有其他选项的不同之处在于：即使你在遥远的地方死亡（比如在另一个星球或在无法逃脱的太空中），HOME选项会将你传送回这个主力舰或基地——即使它不在同一个游戏区域内！

[u]注意：[/u] 建造医疗舱（7级）或克隆室（1级）以更精确地设置重生点

[i]问：克隆室是做什么用的？[/i]
如果你在没有建造克隆室或医疗舱的情况下，将你的基地或主力舰标记为HOME，你就不能在基地重生。有了克隆室（或医疗舱），你将精确地在这台设备的所在地重生！

[i]问：我可以标记多个基地或主力舰为HOME吗？[/i]
不可以。任何时候，你只能将一个主力舰或基地设为HOME。
触发器 - 传感器 - 信号逻辑

English:
[i]Q: What are 'triggers'?[/i]
A1: In 6.0 we added a range of sensors that can send a signal to devices, thus changing their operation parameters. For example: pull a lever and have a door closed or a light switched off.
 A2: Current triggers / sensors: Trigger plate, Light barrier, Motion sensor, Lever..

[i]Q: Are there different types of sensors?[/i]
A: Yes! The lever has a defined On/Off status. If you move it into ON position, the signal is sent constantly to the device. Most of the other sensors are 'switches'. They only send the signal as long as a player or the vessel is in their detection range. See more details in EXAMPLES in 'How to setup'.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]Q: “触发器”是什么？[/i]
A1: 在6.0版本中，我们增加了一系列的传感器，它们可以向设备发送信号，从而改变它们的操作参数。例如：拉动一个杠杆，让门关闭或者灯熄灭。
A2: 当前的触发器/传感器：触发板，光束障碍，运动传感器，杠杆

[i]Q: 有不同类型的传感器吗？[/i]
A: 是的！杠杆有一个明确的开/关状态。如果你将其移动到开的位置，信号就会持续发送给设备。大多数其他传感器是“开关”。它们只在玩家或飞船在它们的检测范围内时才发送信号。在“如何设置”中的“示例”中查看更多详细信息。

English:
[i]Q: What can we do with basic triggers / sensors in the moment?[/i]
Basically create simple logics: Activate devices, Open / close devices, Lock / unlock devices. Different devices may offer some, all or a selection of these actions (Depending on what the device can do)

[i]Q: Can i create more complex circuits?[/i]
Yes, see the chapter about SIGNAL LOGIC!

[b]EXAMPLES (for easy sensor-trigger builds)[/b]

= Modes =

1. FOLLOW
 Lever: Move handle to ON = ON. OFF = OFF
Switch: Enter the trigger area = ON, Leave the trigger area = OFF

2. TOGGLE
Lever: Do not use with lever (works, but you might need to pull the handle 2x to get an effect)
 Switch: Enter and leave the trigger area = switches the status of the device (to ON if OFF, to OFF if ON)

3. ON and OFF
Lever: Do not use (makes no sense)
Switch: sets status of the device to a dedicated ON or OFF status (not using its previous state!) Triggering the trigger again will not have an effect (ON-TIME-change)

= How to SETUP =

1. Place a trigger (let's use a trigger plate)
2. Face the Trigger Plate and hit P
3. If the Trigger Plate is highlighted in CP, you'll notice a new text below the device list: Tx Signal [field]
4. Enter TEST to the field and hit return
5. Place a Light
6. Face the Light and hit P
7. If the Light is highlighted in the CP, you'll notice a new entry ON/OFF as well as two dropdowns and a checkbox with an ' I ' below the device list
7a: Expand the first dropdown and you'll find your TEST command. Select the TEST command to connect the Light to your Trigger Plate
7b: Expand the second dropdown > You can use FOLLOW, TOGGLE, ON and OFF to trigger the Explosives.

Now ...
- IF you want a Player to have the light switched to ON or OFF when he touches the trigger plate, use either ON or OFF
- IF you want the light to switch to OFF if it was ON (or vice versa), use TOGGLE
- IF you want the light to only shine as LONG as the player is on the plate, use FOLLOW
- IF you want the light to dim as LONG as the player is on the plate, use FOLLOW and toggle INVERT ( I checkbox)
Chinese (simplified):
[i]Q: 目前我们能用基本的触发器/传感器做什么？[/i]
基本上可以创建简单的逻辑：激活设备，打开/关闭设备，锁定/解锁设备。不同的设备可能会提供这些动作中的一些、全部或选择性的动作（取决于设备能做什么）

[i]Q: 我能创建更复杂的电路吗？[/i]
是的，请参见关于信号逻辑的章节！

[b]示例（易于传感器触发器构建）[/b]

= 模式 =

1. 跟随
 杠杆：将手柄移动到ON = 开启。OFF = 关闭
 开关：进入触发区域 = 开启，离开触发区域 = 关闭

2. 切换
杠杆：不建议与杠杆一起使用（可以工作，但你可能需要拉动手柄两次以获得效果）
 开关：进入并离开触发区域 = 切换设备的状态（如果之前是关闭的则设置为开启，如果之前是开启的则设置为关闭）

3. 开启和关闭
杠杆：不建议使用（没有意义）
开关：将设备的状态设置为专用的开启或关闭状态（不使用其之前的状态！）再次触发触发器将不会有效果（ON-TIME-change）

= 如何设置 =

1. 放置一个触发器（我们使用触发板）
2. 面对触发板并按P
3. 如果触发板在CP中被高亮显示，你会在设备列表下方注意到一个新的文本：Tx信号[字段]
4. 在字段中输入TEST并按回车
5. 放置一盏灯
6. 面对灯并按P
7. 如果灯在CP中被高亮显示，你会在设备列表下方注意到一个新的条目ON/OFF以及两个下拉菜单和一个带有' I '的复选框
7a: 展开第一个下拉菜单，你会发现你的TEST命令。选择TEST命令将灯连接到你的触发板
7b: 展开第二个下拉菜单 > 你可以使用跟随、切换、开启和关闭来触发爆炸物

现在...
- 如果你想让玩家在触摸触发板时将灯切换为开启或关闭，使用开启或关闭
- 如果你想让灯在开启时切换为关闭（反之亦然），使用切换
- 如果你想让灯只有在玩家在板上时才亮起，使用跟随
- 如果你想让灯在玩家在板上时变暗，使用跟随并切换反转（I复选框）

English:
[i]Q: Can i trigger several devices from the same sensor?[/i]
YES! Just use the SAME signal name in each of the devices. This way it is possible to - for example - switch a range of lights on or off with only one button/sensor

[i]Q: Can i trigger a device from several sensors?[/i]
Yes, just use SIGNAL LOGICs!

[i]Q: Can i trigger the NPC spawners (for POI design)?[/i]
Yes! Place the NPC spawner and switch it OFF in the Control Panel. Then just connect your sensor. If a player triggers the sensor, the NPCs will be spawned.

[i]Q: Can i trigger the PORTAL (for Instances)?[/i]
Of course!

[i]Q: Can i adjust the range and area of sensors?[/i]
For some sensors like motion sensor and light barrier, this is possible. Just access the sensor (aim at it and hit P) and you'll see its range and a range slider.

[i]Q: Do sensors only trigger for players and vessels?[/i]
A1: Yes, sensors trigger for both player avatars and vessels.
A2: Please note: Motion Sensor and Light Barrier are active as long as a player or vessel is in their field of view. They do NOT deactivate if you just stand still at your position!
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：我可以从同一个传感器触发多个设备吗？[/i]
是的！只需在每个设备中使用相同的信号名称。这样，例如，你可以只用一个按钮/传感器来开关一系列灯光。

[i]问：我可以从多个传感器触发一个设备吗？[/i]
是的，只需使用信号逻辑！

[i]问：我可以触发NPC生成器（用于兴趣点设计）吗？[/i]
可以！放置NPC生成器并在控制面板中将其关闭。然后只需连接你的传感器。如果玩家触发了传感器，NPC就会被生成。

[i]问：我可以触发传送门（用于实例）吗？[/i]
当然可以！

[i]问：我可以调整传感器的范围和区域吗？[/i]
对于某些传感器，如运动传感器和光束障碍传感器，这是可能的。只需访问传感器（瞄准它并按下P键），你将看到它的范围和一个范围滑块。

[i]问：传感器是否只对玩家和飞船触发？[/i]
A1: 是的，传感器对玩家化身和飞船都会触发。
A2: 请注意：只要玩家或飞船在它们的视场内，运动传感器和光束障碍传感器就会保持活跃。如果你只是在它们的激活区域内静止不动，它们不会停止激活！

English:
[b]Note: Signal Logic is an extension of the Signal/Trigger mechanic, offering new ways on how to connect sensors and triggers in certain, more elaborate ways. Hit the SIGNAL LOGIC button on top of the Control Panel to access.[/b]

[i]Q: What is the purpose of SIGNAL LOGIC circuits?[/i]
They allow you to do things that the standard device-based signal-dropdown would not allow you to do, like connecting different sensors to a several other devices.

[i]Q: How do I use it?[/i]
Pretty much the same as you would set up a sensor-trigger array..but with more parameters/options/gates, like AND, OR, XOR, Inverter, Delays (more planned).

[i]Q: How do I set it up?[/i]
Same as above: Have some sensors placed at your structure. Access them directly or via Control Panel and give them a unique signal name. Then open SIGNAL LOGIC, add a new circuit. Select your sensor signal on the left side. Add a name for the output signal on the right side. Got to the devices that you want to manage with the circuit and add the output signal to your devices signal dropdown.

[i]Q: What are the different gates do?[/i]
AND = All sensors added to the circuit need to trigger for the signal to be send. Example: If you have 2 trigger plates, the light will only be lit if both plates are triggered at the same time (one player standing on each)
OR = If one or more of the added sensors are triggered, the signal is send to the device. Example: A light is illuminated if you stand on one of the trigger plates, but also if both plates are triggered.
XOR = sends signal only if only ONE of the two attached sensors is activated. Does not trigger if both sensors are active. Example: the light will only illuminate if exactly one plate is triggered. If both are triggered, no signal is sent and the light remains dark.
 INVERTER = inverts the signal (f.ex. to OFF if an ON signal is sent). Example: A light is switched off if you step on a trigger plate. Also useful when you have two triggers and you need them both to be the same in order to pass an AND gate.
SET/RESET Latch = Use for two sensors: sensor A sets and sensor B resets if triggered.
DELAY = creates a simple delay modificator for a single-signal. Click on the button-box to add a value (seconds)

[i]Q: Can I combine the signals coming from a circuit and use it in a new circuit?[/i]
Of course! Just use the outgoing signal name and select it for the input side. You can create complex circuits this way. Of course you should not delete the underlying circuit for your enhanced circuit or it will break the queue.
Chinese (simplified):
[b]注意：信号逻辑是信号/触发器机制的扩展，提供了以更复杂的方式连接传感器和触发器的新方法。点击控制面板顶部的SIGNAL LOGIC按钮进行访问。[/b]

[i]Q: 信号逻辑电路的目的是什么？[/i]
它们允许你做一些标准基于设备的信号下拉菜单不允许做的事情，比如将不同的传感器连接到多个其他设备上。

[i]Q: 我该如何使用它？[/i]
基本上和你设置传感器触发器阵列的方式一样，但是有更多的参数/选项/门，比如AND, OR, XOR, Inverter, Delays（计划中更多）。

[i]Q: 我该如何设置它？[/i]
同上：在你的结构中放置一些传感器。通过直接访问或控制面板给它们一个唯一的信号名称。然后打开SIGNAL LOGIC并添加一个新的电路。在左侧选择你的传感器信号。在右侧添加输出信号的名称。转到你想要通过电路管理的设备，并在设备的信号下拉菜单中添加输出信号。

[i]Q: 不同的门都在做什么？[/i]
AND = 加入到电路中的所有传感器都需要触发，才会发送信号。示例：如果你有2个触发板，只有当两个触发板同时被触发时（每个板上站着一个玩家），灯才会亮起。
OR = 如果一个或多个加入的传感器被触发，信号就会被发送到设备。示例：如果你站在一个触发板上，灯就会亮起，但如果两个触发板都被触发，灯也会亮起。
XOR = 如果两个连接的传感器中只有一个被激活，就会发送信号。如果两个传感器都激活了，则不会触发。例如，只有当一个触发板被触发时，灯才会亮起。如果两个板都被触发，没有信号被发送，灯保持黑暗。
INVERTER = 反转信号（例如，如果发送了ON信号就变为OFF）。示例：如果你踩在一个触发板上，灯就会关闭。当你有两个触发器，并且需要它们都是相同的才能通过AND门时，也很有用。
SET/RESET Latch = 用于两个传感器：如果触发了传感器A，则设置，如果触发了传感器B，则重置。
DELAY = 在单个信号上创建一个简单的延迟修改器。点击按钮框添加一个值（秒）

[i]Q: 我可以将来自一个电路的信号组合起来并在新的电路中使用它吗？[/i]
当然可以！只需使用输出信号名称并将其选择为输入侧。你可以通过这种方式创建复杂的电路。当然，你不应该删除你增强电路的基础电路，否则它会使队列中断。

English:
[i]Q: How do I create a blueprint?[/i]
You need to be in touch with your vessel or at least quite close to it. Aim at it with the crosshair and hit right ALT+O (default). The Blueprint library will pop up and give you three options: SAVE AS, OVERWRITE or CANCEL. Use SAVE AS, type in a cool name and you are done! From now on you can always use your blueprint in and Single Player or Multiplayer game!

[i]Q: Why should I create a blueprint of my Base or Vessels?[/i]
There are several good reasons:
- The Game is still in Alpha, so your save game might get broken. If you blueprinted all your stuff, you can easily recover from a messed up situation! 
- Blueprints allow you to work on a design in Creative mode – and use the blueprint elsewhere (Multiplayer AND Single Player)
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：如何创建蓝图？[/i]
你需要与你的飞船保持接触或至少非常靠近它。用准星瞄准它并按下默认的右ALT+O键。蓝图库将弹出并给你三个选项：另存为、覆盖或取消。使用另存为，输入一个酷酷的名字，你就完成了！从现在开始，你可以在单人或多人游戏中随时使用你的蓝图！

[i]问：为什么我应该为我的基地或飞船创建蓝图？[/i]
有几个很好的理由：
- 游戏仍在Alpha阶段，所以你的游戏存档可能会损坏。如果你为所有东西都创建了蓝图，你可以轻松地从混乱的情况中恢复过来！
- 蓝图允许你在创造模式下工作（在构建过程中正常限制被取消）然后可以在其他地方使用蓝图（多人游戏和单人游戏）...当然，有些游戏领域可能会禁用蓝图作为他们挑战的一部分。

English:
[i]Q: How do I spawn a Blueprint / How does the FACTORY work?[/i]
The following applies to a standard Single Player- or Multiplayer Survival game. 
1. Open the Blueprint Library (F2). You'll see a list with all of your blueprints on the left and an info panel on the right. 
2. Select a Blueprint from the list and use the button TO FACTORY
3. Add resources to the Factory intake, until all slots of the resource list are green. 
[u]Tip:[/u] You can reduce the waiting time for the blueprint to be finished down to nearly zero if you add more complex blocks like devices instead of ingots! 
[u]Note:[/u] You cannot remove resources from the factory yet – but you can use it for the next blueprints as the resources are stored. 
4. Start the production and wait. You'll get notified when your blueprint is ready! 
5. If you see the message of your blueprint being finished, open the Blueprint Library again, scroll to the top of the list on the left and select the finished blueprint. 
6. Use the SPAWN button to place the blueprint in the world. 
NOTE: You need a base platform if you want to spawn CV, SV and HV. You can spawn SV and HV also on a CV.
[u]Tip:[/u]You can move the blueprint wireframe around ahead of placing it: use PAGE UP/DOWN and HOME/END! Please have a look in the Options menu to which keys this action is currently bound to (Default: Page Up / Page down). 

[b]Important:[/b] If you are playing on a server from different PCs, make sure all of the PCs have the same blueprints available in the /Blueprints folder!
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：我如何生成蓝图/工厂是如何工作的？[/i]
以下适用于标准的单人或多人生存游戏。
1. 打开蓝图库（F2）。你会在左侧看到一个包含你所有蓝图的列表，右侧是一个信息面板。
2. 从列表中选择一个蓝图，并使用按钮传送到工厂。注意：如果启用了，你可能需要在科技树中解锁设备才能启用这个功能！
3. 向工厂进料口添加资源，直到资源列表的所有槽都变绿。
[u]提示：[/u]如果你添加更复杂的方块，比如设备而不是锭，你可以将蓝图完成的等待时间减少到几乎为零！
[u]注意：[/u]你还不能从工厂移除资源——但你可以将其用于下一个蓝图，因为资源是存储起来的。
4. 开始生产并等待。你的蓝图准备好后会收到通知！
5. 如果你看到蓝图完成的消息，再次打开蓝图库，滚动到左侧列表的顶部，并选择完成的蓝图。
6. 使用生成按钮将蓝图放置在世界中。
注意：根据游戏选择的选项，如果你想生成主力舰、小型飞船和大型飞船，你可能需要一个基地平台。你可以在主力舰上生成小型飞船和大型飞船。
[u]提示：[/u]你可以在放置之前移动蓝图线框：使用PAGE UP/DOWN和HOME/END来改变高度或旋转结果结构！请查看选项菜单以确认这个动作当前绑定的是哪个键（默认：Page Up / Page Down）。
[b]重要：[/b]如果你是在不同电脑的服务器上玩，请确保所有电脑的/Blueprints文件夹中有相同的蓝图可用！

English:
[i]Q: Is there a shortcut /cheat to spawn my blueprint immediately?[/i]
Yes, there are two situations where you can skip the waiting time: 
1. In a Single Player Game (Survival) or as a Admin/Mod/Gamemaster on your server (Survival), open the Blueprint Library (F2), highlight the desired blueprint and click TO FACTORY. You do NOT need to add resources! Just open the Console (Tabulator by default) and enter 'finishbp'. 
2. When playing in a Creative Single Player- or Multiplayer Game, you just need to open the Blueprint library, select the desired Blueprint and hit SPAWN.
Chinese (simplified): [i]问：有什么快捷方式/作弊器可以让我立即生成蓝图？ [/i]是的，有两种情况可以跳过等待时间： \n1. 在单人游戏（生存）中或作为服务器上的管理员/模式/游戏管理者（生存），打开蓝图库（F2），选中想要的蓝图，然后点击 '进入工厂'。您无需添加资源！只需打开控制台（默认为后引）并输入 'finishbp '即可。\n2. 在创意单人或多人游戏中，您只需打开蓝图库，选择所需的蓝图，然后点击 SPAWN。

English:
[i]Q: How do I upload my Blueprint to the Workshop?[/i]
Just hit the PUBLISH button when having selected a blueprint from the list. A completion message will pop up on the top right if your Blueprint has been uploaded to the workshop.

[i]Q: Can I update a blueprint and have it replace my already published workshop item?[/i]
Of course. Spawn your Blueprint in a Survival or Creative game and make the changes you want to update. Then save the changes by OVERWRITING the original blueprint (right ALT+O -> select your blueprint -> OVERWRITE). Then hit the UPDATE button. It may take a few seconds until the blueprint is published/updated. A message on the top right will notify you about the upload process being completed.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：我如何将我的蓝图上传到工坊？[/i]
选择列表中的蓝图后，点击发布按钮即可。如果你的蓝图已经上传到工坊，右上角会弹出一条完成信息。

[i]问：我可以更新一个蓝图，并让它替换我已经发布的工坊物品吗？[/i]
当然可以。在生存或创造游戏中生成你的蓝图，并进行你想要更新的更改。然后通过覆盖原始蓝图（右ALT+O -> 选择你的蓝图 -> 覆盖）来保存更改。然后点击更新按钮。蓝图发布/更新可能需要几秒钟。右上角的消息会通知你上传过程已完成。

English:
[i]Q: I can't create a Blueprint?[/i] 
Do you own the building or vessel you are trying to blueprint? You can only blueprint structures that are either owned by you (Private) or by your faction.

[i]Q: My Base (placed from pre-Alpha blueprint) explodes when changing any block!?[/i] 
If you want to place a blueprint from Pre-Alpha, start a creative game first, switch off SI (Open Console and enter 'Si off') and save as a new blueprint. This will fix most of the problems – except a non-SI conform design.

[i]Q: Do I need to flatten the terrain ahead of placing a blueprinted base?[/i]
No. You can move the blueprint wireframe around ahead of placing it.Please have a look in the Options menu to which keys this action is currently bound to (Default Page Up and Page down).

[i]Q: I have placed my blueprint-base into hill and need to remove the dirt. Does the drill or the Filler & Flatten tool damage my base blocks?[/i]
No.

[i]Q: Will subscribing to a blueprint in the workshop while the game is running update it immediately?[/i]
Yes. It may take a few seconds, though.

[i]Q: Some of my Blueprints in the Library are RED. What does this mean?[/i]
This is either a result of the blueprint being not compatible with your current game version OR the blueprint contains forbidden blocks (like Alien Turrets, Alien Core, Monster Spawners, Loot Containers). You can load the blueprint in CREATIVE mode, remove the forbidden blocks, then save it and then you should have it available in Survival Mode again.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]Q: 我不能创建蓝图吗？[/i] 
你拥有你试图创建蓝图的建筑或飞船吗？你只能创建属于你（私人）或你的派系拥有的结构的蓝图。

[i]Q: 我从预阿尔法蓝图放置的基地在更改任何方块时都会爆炸！？[/i] 
如果你想放置一个来自预阿尔法的蓝图，首先启动一个创意模式游戏，关闭SI（打开控制台并输入'Si off'）然后保存为一个新的蓝图。这将修复大多数问题——除了一个不符合SI的设计。

[i]Q: 在放置蓝图基地之前我需要平整地形吗？[/i]
不需要。你可以在放置之前移动蓝图线框。请查看选项菜单中当前绑定到这个动作的键（默认为Page Up和Page Down）。

[i]Q: 我把我的蓝图基地放在了山坡上，现在需要移除泥土。钻头或填充和平整工具会损坏我的基地方块吗？[/i]
不会。

[i]Q: 在游戏运行时，我在工作坊订阅蓝图会立即更新吗？[/i]
是的。不过，可能需要几秒钟的时间。

[i]Q: 我的图书馆中的一些蓝图是红色的。这是什么意思？[/i]
这可能是因为蓝图与你当前的游戏版本不兼容，或者蓝图包含禁止的方块（如外星炮塔、外星核心、怪物生成器、战利品容器）。你可以在创意模式下加载蓝图，移除禁止的方块，然后保存，这样你应该又能在生存模式下使用它。

English: [i]Q: How do I remove blocks in Creative Mode?[/i]\n- Either use the Multi Tool or hold any block in your hands and use SHIFT-Right Mouse Click. \n- The R&R tool will not remove blocks on both sides of an active mirror plan. Only deleting blocks with the SHIFT-Right Mouse method will do so.
Chinese (simplified): [i]问：如何在创意模式中移除方块？ [/i]\n-使用多重工具（Multi Tool）或手持任何方块并使用 SHIFT 键-鼠标右键单击。\n- R&R工具无法删除活动镜像平面图两侧的图块。只有使用 SHIFT-鼠标右键方法删除图块才能做到这一点。

English: [i]Q: Can I use both the paint- and texture gun with the mirror mode?[/i]\nYes!
Chinese (simplified): [i][/i]问：我可以在镜像模式下同时使用油漆枪和纹理枪吗？

English: [i]Q: Do I need to harvest and gather materials in Creative?[/i]\nNo, you do not. Just click H (Default) and you have all blocks at your disposal (Single Player and Server)
Chinese (simplified): [i]问：我需要在创意中收获和收集材料吗？ [/i]\n不，不需要。只需点击 H（默认），您就可以使用所有的方块（单人游戏和服务器）。

English:
[i]Q: Can i create a POI in Creative Mode and use it in my custom game?[/i]
Yes, YOU CAN! 
1. Go to your In-game Blueprint library (F2) 
2. Double-click any BASE (Small Vessel/Hover Vessel/Capital Vessel won't work) 
3. Set a group name
4. Use the group name in your customized playfield.yaml

If you want creatures spawn in your base, create that base in CREATIVE and add the Monster-Spawners. Same applies for the Alien POI loot containers.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：我可以在创意模式中创建一个兴趣点（POI）并在我的自定义游戏中使用它吗？[/i]
是的，你可以！
1. 前往你的游戏内蓝图库（F2）
2. 双击任意一个基地（小型飞船/悬浮飞船/主力舰不适用）
3. 设置一个群组名称
4. 在你的自定义playfield.yaml中使用这个群组名称

如果你想在你的基地中生成生物，就在创意模式中创建那个基地，并添加怪物生成器。对于外星POI的战利品容器也是同样的操作。

English:
[i]Q: How do i use Console Commands in Single Player (Survival/Creative)?[/i]
- Just open the Console (see Options > Controls) and enter 'help'. This will show you all the commands that are available by now. 
- Type in 'help' and add a command to reveal its syntax and values. Like 'help faction' will show you everything you need to know about the faction command
- Console commands only work on a multiplayer server if you are either Admin, Moderator or Gamemaster!

 [i]Q: How to use Console Commands when playing on a (local) Dedicated Server (Creative/Survival)?[/i]
You can't. The owner or an admin of the server needs to promote you to the Gamemaster permission group at least.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：如何在单人游戏（生存/创造）中使用控制台命令？[/i]
- 只需打开控制台（参见选项 > 控制）并输入 'help'。这将显示当前所有可用的命令。
- 输入 'help' 并添加一个命令来显示其语法和值。比如 'help faction' 将显示你需要知道的关于派系命令的所有信息。
- 控制台命令只有在多人服务器上，并且你是管理员、版主或游戏管理员时才有效！

[i]问：在（本地）专用服务器（创造/生存）上游戏时如何使用控制台命令？[/i]
你不能。服务器的所有者或管理员需要至少将你提升到游戏管理员权限组。

English: [i]Q: How to destroy or delete a base from in-game (as admin)?[/i]\nEnter 'di' in the console and an overlay will be added on top of your screen. Go close to a base or a vessel and point at it. The overlay will tell you the ID of the Base/Vessel. Use the ID with the 'destroy' command.
Chinese (simplified): [i]问：如何在游戏内（作为管理员）摧毁或删除基地？[/i]\n在控制台输入 'di'，屏幕上会出现一个覆盖层。靠近一个基地或飞船并指向它。覆盖层会告诉你基地/飞船的ID。使用这个ID和 'destroy' 命令。

English:
[i]Q: How to make myself admin of my local Dedicated Server (self hosted)?[/i]
- Use TELNET (Microsoft Service included in Windows) and use the setrole command.
- Alternatively use the adminconfig.yaml example file available/explained here: http://bit.ly/EGSadminfile

[i]Q: How to make myself admin of my rented Dedicated Server?[/i]
Use telnet (via remote console) or talk to your hoster to update the adminconfig.yaml accordingly.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：如何将自己设置为本地专用服务器（自托管）的管理员？[/i]
- 使用TELNET（微软服务，包含在Windows中）并使用setrole命令。
- 或者，使用adminconfig.yaml示例文件，详见此处：http://bit.ly/EGSadminfile

[i]问：如何将自己设置为租用的专用服务器的管理员？[/i]
- 通过远程控制台使用telnet，或联系您的托管商更新adminconfig.yaml文件。

English: [i]Q: How to add players to a specific permission group?[/i]\nAs soon as you are promoted to Admin status, you can EITHER use Telnet OR the ingame-console to achieve that. Use 'help setrole' to learn the syntax and the values you can use.
Chinese (simplified): [i]问：我如何将玩家添加到特定的权限组？[/i]\n一旦你被提升到管理员状态，你可以使用Telnet或者游戏内的控制台来实现这一点。使用'help setrole'来了解语法和你可以使用的值。

English: [i]Q: Is it possible to deactivate the HUD-PDA Tasks shown on the right side of the screen?[/i]\nOf course. Open the PDA (F1) and deselect the 'Activate HUD' toggle.
Chinese (simplified): [i]问：有可能关闭屏幕右侧显示的HUD-PDA任务吗？[/i]\n当然可以。打开PDA（F1）并取消选择“激活HUD”切换按钮。

English: [i]Q: I got stuck in a PDA Task, what can I do?[/i]\nSome of the tasks can be completed manually. Just tick the checkbox in front of the task and it will be completed.
Chinese (simplified): [i]问： 我被 PDA 任务卡住了，怎么办？ [/i]（有些任务可以手动完成。只需勾选任务前面的复选框，任务就会完成。

English: [i]Q: Do you plan to expand the PDA with more features?[/i]\nOf course!
Chinese (simplified): [i]问：你有没有计划为个人资料助理（PDA）增加更多功能？[/i]\n当然！

English:
[i]Q: How to change my player name?[/i]
You need to change your player name over at steampowered.com or from within your Steam Client.

[i]Q: What is my Empyrion Steam Player ID? (often referred to as EGS Steam ID or EPD)?[/i]
Your Player ID is a string of numbers. If you need to know your EPD, open the explorer and go to one of your savegames PLAYER folder: ../Steam/steamapps/common/Empyrion - Galactic Survival/Saves/Games/YourSavegameName/Players/..

You'll find a file with the .ply ending there. The numbers are your EPD. 

[u]Note:[/u] Do not mix up the EPD with your Steam Account or Web ID. The EPD is a player ID unique to the game. The Steam Account/Web ID is the ID you are using on steampowered.com or other Steam-related topics (like for the webshops or login to websites).
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：如何更改我的玩家名字？[/i]
你需要在steampowered.com或者Steam客户端内部更改你的玩家名字。

[i]问：我的Empyrion Steam玩家ID是什么？（通常被称为EGS Steam ID或EPD）[/i]
你的玩家ID是一串数字。如果你需要知道你的EPD，打开文件浏览器，前往你的存档中的PLAYER文件夹：../Steam/steamapps/common/Empyrion - Galactic Survival/Saves/Games/YourSavegameName/Players/..

在那里你会找到一个以.ply结尾的文件。那些数字就是你的EPD。

[u]注意：[/u] 不要将EPD与你在steampowered.com上的Steam账户或网页ID混淆。EPD是游戏中独特的玩家ID。Steam账户/网页ID是你在steampowered.com或其他与Steam相关的主题（比如用于商店或网站登录）中使用的ID。

English:
[i]Q: How to report an issue with the game?[/i]
If the issue can be reproduced, head over to the forums at empyriononline.com and report your bug in the bug threads. 

Find advice on how to report bugs over there in the pinned threads.!
Chinese (simplified): [i]问：如何报告游戏中的问题？[/i]\n如果问题可以重现，请前往 empyriononline.com 上的论坛，在错误主题中报告您的错误。\n在固定主题中找到如何报告错误的建议！

English:
[i]Q: How does saving a game work?[/i]
 There are three ways: 
1. [u]AUTOSAVE:[/u] The game autosaves every time you leave an ongoing session (ESC -> Door symbol), overwriting the initial save game. 
2. [u]MANUAL SAVE:[/u] If you hit ESC you'll notice a SAVE button designed like a disk. When you hit the SAVE-button a new save game will be created with the extension _BACKUP. If you hit the button repeatedly, the _BACKUP extension will get added some numbers
3. [u]COPY SAVE:[/u] From the main menu, open RESUME GAME. Select a save game and use the COPY button. This will create a manual backup with a _COPY extension. 

[u]Please note:[/u] you cannot load a save game while in-game, yet.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]问：游戏保存是如何工作的？[/i]
有三种方式：
1. [u]自动保存：[/u] 当你每次退出进行中的游戏（ESC -> 门的符号），游戏会自动保存，覆盖初始的保存游戏。
2. [u]手动保存：[/u] 如果你按下ESC，你会注意到一个设计成磁盘形状的保存按钮。当你按下保存按钮时，将创建一个新的保存游戏，附加日期和时间扩展，格式为'-YYMMDD-HHMM'。
3. [u]复制保存：[/u] 从主菜单中，打开继续游戏。选择一个保存游戏并使用复制按钮。这将创建一个新的保存游戏，附加日期和时间扩展，格式为'-YYMMDD-HHMM'。

[u]请注意：[/u] 目前你还不能在游戏内加载保存游戏。

English: [i]Q: Do I need to use EAC (Easy Anti Cheat) for Single Player?[/i]\nNo. You can switch off EAC via the main menu. Go to MISC and set EAC to NO. But please note: With EAC deactivated, you cannot access any server that is EAC protected!
Chinese (simplified): [i]问：我需要在单人游戏中使用EAC（Easy Anti Cheat）吗？[/i]\n不。你可以通过主菜单关闭EAC。进入“杂项”并将EAC设置为“否”。但请注意：在EAC被禁用的情况下，你将无法访问任何受EAC保护的服务器！

English:
1. Play the TUTORIAL (Main Menu > Tutorial!)
2. The [c][ffff00]SURVIVAL TOOL[-][/c] has a DEFENCE mode! 
3. Use RIGHT-MOUSE button to set your weapons and tools to the correct WORKING MODE before using! 
4a. Plan AHEAD what you need to pick up and mind the VOLUME and MASS limit of your suit! 
4b. Try to build a Portable Constructor early on to store the surplus! 
5a. Deco Rocks will not hold any ore, but different amounts of Crushed Stones, which can again be made into some Ores! 
5b. Avoid getting trapped in a mine shaft by using your PERSONAL DRONE (F5) for mining. 
6. Cold and Heat can be countered either by the [c][ffff00]Portable Heater/Cooler[-][/c] (Survival Constructor) or Hot- and Cold Beverages/Juices! 
7. Do grab anything you run into, but mind that most of the edible items will SPOIL/Perish. 
7a. Craft higher tier items from your collected items asap! Those have an increased perish time and do not spoil that fast!
7b. Plants will regrow - if you find a rare plant, mark it on your minimap with a waypoint! [c][ffff00]Check Empyriopedia > Game Mechanics Q&A > Global Game Mechanics Part II[-][/c] for more info on how to do that! 
8. Remember, that other players cannot see your markers, even when they are in your faction!. You need to SHARE your markers on the MAP (M) and other players need to pick them FROM the MAP screen! 
9. The PORTABLE CONSTRUCTOR can build a LIGHT ARMOR in the PORTABLE CONSTRUCTOR, but you need a ARMOR LOCKER (in a vessel or your base) to equip it! The Locker is also craftable in the Portable Constructor 
[c][ff4444]10. Read the JOURNALS and GUIDES in the list on the left for MORE INFO about gameplay and environment![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
1. 玩教学模式（主菜单 > 教程！）
2. [c][ffff00]生存工具[-][/c]有一个防御模式！
3. 使用右键鼠标按钮，在您使用之前将您的武器和工具设置为正确的工作模式！提示：如果您想快速切换，请创建多个生存工具！
4a. 提前计划好你需要拾取的物品，并留意您的装备体积和质量限制！
4b. 尽早尝试建造一个便携式建造机来存储剩余物品！
5a. 装饰岩石不会持有任何矿石，但不同数量的基础矿石可以通过建造机从碎石中提取！
5b. 使用您的个人无人机（F5）进行采矿，以避免被困在矿井中。
6. 冷和热可以通过[c][ffff00]便携式加热器/冷却器[-][/c]（生存建造机）或热饮和冷饮/果汁来抵消！
7. 捡起你遇到的任何东西，但记住大多数可食用物品会变质/腐烂，有些需要准备以避免恶心和其他不良效果。
7a. 尽快从你收集的物品中制作更高级别的物品！那些有增加的保质期的物品不会那么快变质！
7b. 植物会重新生长 - 如果你发现了一个稀有植物，请在您的迷你地图上用航点标记它！[c][ffff00]查看Empyriopedia > 游戏机制问答 > 全局游戏机制第二部分[-][/c]，以了解更多如何做到这一点的信息！
8. 请记住，其他玩家即使在您的派系中也无法看到您的标记！你需要在地图（M）上分享您的标记，其他玩家需要从地图屏幕上挑选它们！
9. 便携式建造机可以建造轻型装甲，您可以从您的库存中装备。这样做不仅提供保护，还让你可以使用喷气背包，能够水下游泳，抵抗热和冷，以及可以使用L键启用的内置灯。
[c][ff4444]10. 阅读左侧列表中的日志和指南，以获取有关游戏玩法和环境的更多信息！[-][/c]

English: [i]When getting stranded in a remote place, it is always useful to know what diseases you could probably be faced with ...and how to cure them. [/i]Forel Mayne, MD UCH Medical Corps 2470 AD \n--- \n[c][ff4444]To show all topics of this guide, click the DROPDOWN ARROW of this chapters HEADLINE in the list on the left! Click the SUB-task to reveal the info contained. Make sure the PDA INFO button on the TOP RIGHT of the screen is selected![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i]当在偏远地区遇险时，了解你可能面临的疾病……以及如何治疗它们总是有用的。[/i]Forel Mayne, MD UCH Medical Corps 2470 AD \n--- \n[c][ff4444]要显示本指南的所有主题，请点击左侧列表中本章节标题的下拉箭头！点击子任务以显示包含的信息。确保屏幕右上角的PDA信息按钮被选中！[-][/c]

English: [c][ffff00]Click on the header of this chapter (10 Tips for GETTING STARTED) in the list on the LEFT to reveal the content of this chapter[-][/c] [c][ffff00]IF nothing is shown, make sure the button PDA INFO is highlighted in the TOP RIGHT![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00]点击左侧列表中本章标题（开始游戏的10个提示）以显示本章内容[-][/c] [c][ffff00]如果内容没有显示，请确保顶部右侧的PDA信息按钮被高亮显示！[-][/c]

English:
1. Cure a disease in its early stage, as any following stage will make it worse. 


2. All diseases can be cured with one of this medication classes: 
*Antibiotics 
*Antitoxin 
*Antiparasitic 
*Anti Radiation 
*Bones 

3. Exception: Effects that are related to outside temperature are cured f.ex. by going to a warmer or cooler place 

4. The diseases progress in stages. Each stage has a defined class of medical items to use: 
*Stage 1: Ointments (f.ex Antibiotic Ointment) 
*Stage 2: Pills (f.ex. Antibiotic Pills) 
*Stage 3: Injections (f.ex. Antibiotic Injections; Will also cure Stage 2) 

5. While medical items are effective only against a few diseases at the same time, [c][ff4444]Medikits and Medical Stations[-][/c] offer a much broader range of available cures! 

6. Food, Beverages or using furniture for sleeping, taking a shower and more are helping to get rid of some of the diseases or at least stop their progress! 
[c][ff4444][-][/c]
[c][ff4444]Open the DROPDOWN of the DOCTORS JOURNAL on the left to learn more about the diseases and their remedies![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
1. 在疾病的早期阶段进行治疗，因为任何后续阶段都会使其恶化。 


2. 所有疾病都可以通过以下药物类别之一治愈： 
*抗生素 
*抗毒素 
*抗寄生虫 
*抗辐射 
*骨骼 

3. 例外：与外部温度相关的效果可以通过例如前往更温暖或更凉爽的地方来治愈 

4. 疾病分为几个阶段进展。每个阶段都有定义的医疗物品类别可供使用： 
*第一阶段：药膏（例如抗生素药膏） 
*第二阶段：药片（例如抗生素药片） 
*第三阶段：注射液（例如抗生素注射液；也可以治愈第二阶段） 

5. 虽然医疗物品一次只对少数疾病有效，[c][ff4444]医疗包和医疗站[-][/c]提供了更广泛的可用治疗方法！ 

6. 食物、饮料或使用家具睡觉、淋浴等有助于摆脱一些疾病或至少阻止它们的进展！ 
[c][ff4444][-][/c]
[c][ff4444]打开左侧医生日志的下拉菜单，了解更多关于疾病及其治疗方法的信息！[-][/c]
