English: [i]We always assume that evolution in the universe follows the same rules, so there is a high chance that we do not see anything extraordinary when looking to the stars. Of course, the chances that we are wrong, are equally high. [/i]Ernest Jakkard, Sc.D UCH Xenobiological Research Facility 2468 AD \n--- \n[c][ff4444]To show all topics of this guide, click the DROPDOWN ARROW of this chapters HEADLINE in the list on the left! Click the SUB-task to reveal the info contained. Make sure the PDA INFO button on the TOP RIGHT of the screen is selected![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i]我们总是假设宇宙中的进化遵循相同的规则，所以我们在仰望星空时不太可能看到任何非凡的事物。当然，我们可能是错误的机会同样高。[/i] Ernest Jakkard, Sc.D UCH 异星生物研究设施 2468 AD \n--- \n[c][ff4444]要显示本指南的所有主题，请单击左侧列表中本章节标题的下拉箭头！单击子任务以显示包含的信息。确保屏幕右上角的PDA信息按钮被选中！[-][/c]

English:
[c][bcd3d4]Your suit will automatically test and categorize any biological and non-biological item according to similarities found with earth organisms with the built-in xenobiological testing procedure. [-][/c]
[c][bcd3d4][-][/c]
[c][bcd3d4]This means: Even if an item might look different or drop from a plant that does not even remotely look earth-like, anything you can harvest from a plant will be categorized into [-][/c][c][ffff00]Nutrition Groups[-][/c][c][bcd3d4] and displayed as: Plant Protein, Natural Sweetener, Grain, Berries, Fruit, Mushroom, Natural Stimulant, Vegetables, Spice, Buds.[-][/c] 
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Medical ingredients[-][/c][c][bcd3d4] are displayed as: Herbal Leaves, Confetti Moss Scrapings, Fire Moss Scrapings, Alien Tooth, Alien Parts, Alien Plasma T6, Alien Plasma ZR1, Alien Thorn[-][/c] 

Note: Eating ingredients or raw food has a risk of getting you an Indigestion!
Chinese (simplified):
[c][bcd3d4]你的宇航服将自动测试并根据与地球生物的相似性对任何生物和非生物物品进行分类，使用内置的异星生物测试程序。[-][/c]
[c][bcd3d4]
这意味着：即使一个物品看起来不同或从一个看起来一点也不像地球的植物上掉落，你可以从植物上收获的任何东西都将被归类为[-][/c][c][ffff00]营养组[-][/c][c][bcd3d4]并显示为：植物蛋白，天然甜味剂，谷物，浆果，水果，蘑菇，天然兴奋剂，蔬菜，香料，芽。

注意：食用成分或生食有患消化不良的风险！

English: [c][bcd3d4]Sprouts are created in the food processor from an item/crop of the plant and Nutrient Solution. Example: Plant Protein + Nutrient Solution will give you an Ahax Sprout.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][bcd3d4]芽苗是在食品加工器中由植物的物品/作物和营养液制成的。例如：植物蛋白+营养液将给你一个阿哈克斯芽苗。[-][/c]

English:
[c][bcd3d4]Oxygen: Always required [-][/c]
[c][bcd3d4]No O2 = [-][/c][c][ffff00]Plant will stop growing[-][/c][c][bcd3d4][-][/c]
[c][bcd3d4]Temperature: 15-35°C | lower 0 or higher than 50 = [c][ff4444]Plant will die[-][/c] [-][/c]
[c][bcd3d4]Radiation: 0[-][/c] | RAD higher than 3 = [c][ff4444]Plant will die[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][bcd3d4]氧气：始终需要[-][/c]
[c][bcd3d4]无O2 = [c][ffff00]植物将停止生长[-][/c][c][bcd3d4][-][/c]
[c][bcd3d4]温度：15-35°C | 低于0或高于50 = [c][ff4444]植物将死亡[-][/c] [-][/c]
[c][bcd3d4]辐射：0[-][/c] | 辐射高于3 = [c][ff4444]植物将死亡[-][/c]

English:
[c][bcd3d4]- Base / Vessel needs to be powered | No Power = [c][ffff00]Plant will stop growing[-][/c][-][/c] 
- Inside a base or Vessel you need a GROWING LIGHT. Place it on the ceiling with exactly 2 blocks in between the top side of the growing plot and the ceiling where the Growing Light is placed 
- A growing light can support 3x3 growing plots at max when placed at the ceiling in the center spot of this array. 
- If the outside conditions meet the Growing Conditions, you can set up a farm without a growing light on the outside. In this case OUTSIDE = open to the sky with no roof (includes NO windows)
Chinese (simplified):
[c][bcd3d4]- 基础/船只需要供电 | 无电力 = [c][ffff00]植物将停止生长[-][/c][-][/c] 
- 在基础或船内，你需要一个生长灯。将其放置在生长地块顶部与生长灯放置的天花板之间正好2个方块的距离 
- 一个生长灯最多可以支持3x3的生长地块，当放置在天花板的中心点时 
- 如果外部条件满足生长条件，你可以在外部设置一个农场，无需生长灯。在这种情况下，外部 = 露天，无屋顶（包括无窗户）

English: [c][bcd3d4]For most of the items, protocols allow to [-][/c][c][ffff00]alternatively craft them from different ingredients[-][/c][c][bcd3d4] as well. [-][/c]\n[c][bcd3d4][-][/c]\n[c][bcd3d4]For example: Milk, Meat, Plant Protein and most of the Medical ingredients like Scrapings, Alien Parts and Plasma can be converted from substitutes![-][/c]

[c][ff4444]要显示本指南的所有主题，请点击左侧列表中本章节标题的下拉箭头！点击子任务以显示包含的信息。确保屏幕右上角的PDA信息按钮被选中！[-][/c]

English:
1. All the faction-assignments below apply to wandering NPCs and Patrols at all times (does NOT depend on the faction territory!) 
2. If an NPC is spawned in a POI, the origin of the NPC is defined by the faction of the POI, EXCEPT the creator of the POI has set a different origin for the to-be-spawned NPC (what is possible in the NPC Spawn setup dialogue!) 
3. Turret targeting info, regarding NPC factions: 
- All NPC factions members ( Zrx, Pol, Tal) apply to the 'NPC Factions' checkbox, either in a POI or when wandering around! 
- Turrets will not attack Zrx, Pol and Tal if you are on NEUTRAL standing or better, even WHEN the checkbox for NPC factions is ticked! 
- LEGACY (Global 'Alien' Faction) creatures will be attacked only when PREDATOR checkbox is ticked, as Aln is not a real NPC faction (you cannot change your standing; always HOSTILE) 
- Prey and Predator are no NPC factions. That's why they have their own targeting setting.
Chinese (simplified):
1. 下面的所有派系分配适用于所有时间的游荡NPC和巡逻队（不依赖于派系领土！）
2. 如果NPC在POI中生成，NPC的来源由POI的派系定义，除非POI的创建者在NPC生成设置对话框中为即将生成的NPC设置了不同的来源（这是可能的！）
3. 关于NPC派系的炮塔目标信息：
- 所有NPC派系成员（Zrx, Pol, Tal）适用于'NPC派系'复选框，无论是在POI中还是四处游荡！
- 如果你处于中立或更好的立场，即使勾选了NPC派系复选框，炮塔也不会攻击Zrx, Pol和Tal！
- 遗留者（全球'外星人'派系）生物只有在勾选了掠食者复选框时才会被攻击，因为Aln不是一个真正的NPC派系（你不能改变你的立场；始终敌对）
- 猎物和掠食者不是NPC派系。这就是为什么他们有自己的目标设置。

English: States *Calm - walk slowly around, grazing *Low alert - stop walking, raise up (whole group) *High alert - run away from danger together Alerting factors *Noise - shooting a weapon / using items (drill) (max 50 meters) *Damage Vision *If they can see you, and you are moving. (max 90 meters) *not moving persons are not a threat, only if the person gets too close to the animals (20m) *Death of group member >> THE CLOSER THE ALERTING FACTOR IS, THE MORE WILL THE ANIMAL REACT
Chinese (simplified): 状态 *平静 - 慢慢走动，吃草 *低警戒 - 停止走动，抬起（整个群体） *高警戒 - 一起逃离危险 警戒因素 *噪音 - 射击武器/使用物品（钻头）（最大50米） *伤害视觉 *如果他们能看到你，而你在移动。（最大90米） *不动的人不构成威胁，只有当人离动物太近（20米） *群体成员死亡 >> 警戒因素越近，动物反应越强烈

English: [c][bcd3d4]*Has vision, alert, fear States *Calm, no player around - walks randomly *Calm, player around - walks around player, makes small roar animation *After small damage - goes to Rage Modifiers for 'Rage': *If far from player, will make big roar and charge the player *After the start of the charge, he will not make any turns, so it is possible to avoid. *If the charge is not avoided, the damage is deadly! As he is running he is giving damage periodically - so it is possible that he will damage the player multiple times *If the player is close, he will make close range attacks with probability of roars *If he is in rage and player goes to water, trice will stay out and mage angry roars[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][bcd3d4]*具有视觉、警戒、恐惧状态 *平静，没有玩家周围 - 随机走动 *平静，玩家周围 - 绕着玩家走动，做出小的咆哮动画 *受到小伤害后 - 进入狂暴状态，对“狂暴”的修饰符： *如果离玩家远，会发出大的咆哮并冲向玩家 *开始冲锋后，他不会转弯，所以可以躲避。 *如果冲锋没有被躲避，伤害是致命的！当他跑动时，会周期性地造成伤害 - 所以有可能多次伤害玩家 *如果玩家靠近，他会以咆哮的概率进行近战攻击 *如果他在狂暴状态下玩家进入水中，他会留在外边并发出愤怒的咆哮[-][/c]

English: [c][bcd3d4]MODE: Attack on sight ARMAMENT: Melee hit points: Low ATTACK SPEED: High[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][bcd3d4]模式：一见即攻击 武器：近战 生命值：低 攻击速度：高[-][/c]

English: [c][bcd3d4]MODE: Attack on sight ARMAMENT: Melee hit points: Medium ATTACK SPEED: Medium[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][bcd3d4]模式：一见即攻击 武器：近战 生命值：中等 攻击速度：中等[-][/c]

English: [c][bcd3d4]MODE: Attack on sight ARMAMENT: Ranged Attack hit points: Medium ATTACK SPEED: Very High[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][bcd3d4]模式：一见即攻击 武器：远程攻击 生命值：中等 攻击速度：非常高[-][/c]

English: Spiders will appear in a group, but they act more individually, they will share fear, and the more spiders is there together, the faster they will recover from fear States: *calm - walks around *low alert - angry gestures, walks towards player *hi alert - attacks player *alerted, but target not accessible(in water) *When player is in water > angry gestures, random walk Variants *when they see the player, they will attack him *they can get scared and run away, they will come back, once they 'shake off the fear' *the more spiders there is together, the less they fear Fear factors *proximity to player *noises (shooting, drilling) *damage - damage to one spider will create fear in the whole group *fear from death of a group member NOTE: - Spiders can be alerted, but without seeing the player, in this case it will run around 'searching' the source of the alert - The ability to scare the spider is to make the fight more dynamic, to give the player more breathing room and something interesting. The spider should not run away completely.
Chinese (simplified): 蜘蛛将以群体出现，但它们更倾向于单独行动，它们会共享恐惧，蜘蛛越多，它们从恐惧中恢复的速度就越快 状态： *平静 - 四处走动 *低警觉 - 生气手势，走向玩家 *高警觉 - 攻击玩家 *警报，但目标无法接触（在水中） *当玩家在水中 > 生气手势，随机走动 变体 *当它们看到玩家时，它们会攻击他 *它们可能会被吓跑，但一旦它们'摆脱恐惧'，它们会回来 *蜘蛛越多，它们就越不害怕 恐惧因素 *与玩家的接近程度 *噪音（射击，钻孔） *伤害 - 对一只蜘蛛的伤害会在整群中产生恐惧 *对群体成员死亡的恐惧 注意： - 蜘蛛可以在没有看到玩家的情况下被警报，这种情况下它会四处走动'寻找'警报源 - 吓跑蜘蛛的能力是为了让战斗更加动态，给玩家更多的喘息空间和一些有趣的事情。蜘蛛不应该完全逃跑。

English: Group *Has vision and fear *Acts as individual, shares fear in group States *Calm - walks around *Low alert + player nearby - keeps distance from player, but rotates towards him and makes gestures ..*Scared Modifier for 'Scared': *High probability of running away *Low probability of attacking the player - one attempt to hit, then run away
Chinese (simplified): 群体 *有视觉和恐惧 *作为个体行动，群体共享恐惧 状态 *平静 - 四处走动 *低警觉 + 玩家附近 - 与玩家保持距离，但向他旋转并做出手势..*恐惧 修饰符 '恐惧'： *高概率逃跑 *低概率攻击玩家 - 一次尝试击中，然后逃跑

English: [c][bcd3d4]MODE: Attack on sight ARMAMENT: Melee hit points: Medium ATTACK SPEED: Medium[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][bcd3d4]模式：一见即攻 武器：近战 生命值：中等 攻击速度：中等[-][/c]

English: Single *Has vision and alert States *Calm - walks around *Alerted - attacks the player with a projectile Modifiers for 'Alerted': *If the player is far, he will walk towards him *If he is too far from spawn position, it will return back to it *If the player is too close, it will keep distance *During the attack he will fire 1 - 3 projectiles, then change position
Chinese (simplified): 单个 *有视觉和警报状态 *平静 - 四处走动 *警报 - 用投射物攻击玩家 修饰符 '警报'： *如果玩家很远，他会走向他 *如果他离出生位置太远，它会返回 *如果玩家太近，它会保持距离 *在攻击期间他会发射1-3个投射物，然后改变位置

English:
Lakes, swamps, deep forests, oceans and vast open plains are the geographical characteristics of this temperate planet. It has a multitude of mountain ranges with snow-capped peaks, some formed by volcanic activity, others by glacial flow. The climate is moderate and the atmosphere breathable.

[u]Possible resources:[/u]
  Iron, Cobalt, Erestrum, Zascosium, Promethium
[u][/u]
[u]Possible weather effects:[/u]
  Rain (Heavy), Storm, Radiated Fog
[u][/u]
[u]Planet type data and possible variations:[/u]
  Life-bearing
  Atmosphere breathable: [c][00ff00]Yes[-][/c]
  Atmospheric O2 fraction: 10 - 40%
  Atmospheric density: 0.9 - 1.7 kg/m³
  Day temperature: -30 to 50°C
  Night temperature: -45 to 40°C
  Water abundant
  Radiation: 0 (approx. mean)*
  Gravity: 0.6 - 1.2 g
  Radiation: 3 - 6 Gy/d

Note: Planet has a chance for small, but highly irradiated biomes.
Chinese (simplified):
湖泊、沼泽、茂密森林、海洋和广阔的平原是这个温带星球的地理特征。它拥有众多山脉，有的山峰被雪覆盖，有些由火山活动形成，有些则由冰川流动形成。气候温和，大气层可呼吸。

[u]可能的资源：[/u]
铁、钴、锷、铡、钷

[u]可能的天气效应：[/u]
大雨（重度）、风暴、辐射雾

[u]星球类型数据及可能的变体：[/u]
有生命的
大气层可呼吸：[c][00ff00]是[-][/c]
大气中的氧气比例：10 - 40%
大气密度：0.9 - 1.7 kg/m³
日间温度：-30到50°C
夜间温度：-45到40°C
水资源丰富
辐射：0（近似平均）*
重力：0.6 - 1.2 g
辐射：3 - 6 Gy/d

注意：该星球有机会出现小范围的，但辐射程度极高的生物群落。

English:
Summary
The UCH was founded as a NGO back in the early 22nd century to research the predicted collapse of the Terran ecosystem. By the end of the 24th century, after the wars and catastrophic events leading into the 'dark 23th century' calmed down more and more, the UCH was re-founded as kind of a worldwide government by the surviving nations and local governments. Power was granted to the UCH authority to take care of the survival of the Terran civilization.

History
With the discovery of the alien ship in 2402 AD, the dark era for mankind ended all of a sudden. The UCH, founded nearly a century before, was able to use the find and retrieve most of the technological knowledge buried in the ice of Antarctica. This phase did not last very long as this new technology required some materials that were not obtainable in earth's solar system, but in the nearby Proxima Centauri system. Operation Phoenix, which was Earth’s last ditch effort to save itself from falling back in the dark age, was spearheaded by its flagship, the TITAN. The voyage was troubled by an unknown energetic effect, leading to the arrival in Andromeda, instead of the targeted Proxima Centauri. UCH vessels made first contact with a species known as the Zirax. Outgunned and caught off guard by the enemy, losses were abundant in the initial contact with this new species. Ships, crew members and materials were lost in an instant and Earth’s flagship the TITAN was destroyed and nearly all of the UCH’s leading officers were killed. The remaining ships, including the 2nd command ship GRAND, managed to retreat from the battle. They were able to hide in deep space, out of range of the Zirax Empire.  

Scientists are still gathering data and examining whether the term 'Empyrion' used loosely throughout history is a physical location or a spiritual/philosophical belief.
Chinese (simplified):
摘要
人类联合理事会（UCH）成立于22世纪初，作为一个非政府组织，研究预测的地球生态系统崩溃。到了24世纪末，在战争和导致'黑暗23世纪'的灾难性事件平息下来之后，越来越多的幸存国家和地方政府重新建立了UCH，作为一种全球性政府。授权UCH当局负责地球文明的生存。

历史
公元2402年，一艘外星飞船的发现突然结束了人类的黑暗时代。成立近一个世纪的UCH能够利用这一发现，从南极洲的冰层中检索出大部分被埋藏的技术知识。这一阶段并没有持续很长时间，因为这种新技术需要一些在地球太阳系中无法获得的材料，但在附近的比邻星系统中却能找到。凤凰行动是地球为避免再次陷入黑暗时代而做出的最后努力，其旗舰是泰坦号。这次航行受到了一种未知能量效应的困扰，导致他们抵达了仙女座，而不是目标比邻星。UCH飞船首次与一个被称为兹瑞克斯的物种接触。在与这个新物种的初次接触中，由于措手不及和火力不足，损失惨重。飞船、船员和材料瞬间丧失，地球的旗舰泰坦号被摧毁，几乎所有的UCH高级官员都被杀害。剩下的飞船，包括第二指挥舰大帝号，设法从战斗中撤退。他们能够隐藏在深空，远离兹瑞克斯帝国的射程。

科学家们仍在收集数据并检查历史上广泛使用的'Empyrion'一词是指一个物理位置还是一种精神/哲学信仰。

English: Summary\nThe Galactic Liberation and Defense group has strong relationships to the UCH. It is said that some of the personnel of the former Operation Phoenix fleet have joined their ranks. The purpose of the group is to support the Talon against the Zirax oppression. There are more but yet revealed reasons for this group to exist, though.
Chinese (simplified): 摘要\n银河解放与防卫组织与人类联合理事会有着密切的关系。据说，一些前凤凰行动舰队的人员已经加入了他们的行列。该组织的目标是支持泰隆对抗兹瑞克斯的压迫。然而，这个组织存在的原因尚未完全揭示。

English:
[c][bcd3d4]The Ziraxian Empire is a militarist oligarchy and the largest power in the galaxy Andromeda. It is ruled by a series of houses, each with a specific function or functions that relates to a sphere of influence. These houses each produce a representative at an, as yet, undiscovered time, and they form a council of elders. This production is facilitated by the Empress who publicly holds supreme power, but is possibly more a figure head.[-][/c]

[i][c][bcd3d4]Expand folder to read more[-][/c][/i]
[c][bcd3d4][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][bcd3d4]兹瑞克斯帝国是一个军国主义寡头政治，是仙女座星系中最大的力量。它由一系列具有特定功能或与势力范围相关的职能的家族统治。这些家族各自在尚未发现的时间产生一个代表，并组成长老议会。这一生产由女皇公开持有最高权力，但可能更多是一个象征性的角色。[-][/c]

English: [c][bcd3d4]The Talon are an astonishingly primitive society with little variation. They seem to have [-][/c][c][bcd3d4][c][bcd3d4]abandoned all technological advancements - for some unknown reason.[-][/c] The Zirax impose a heavy toll upon the Talon  – zealously sheltering them with drones and other restraints. This may indicate either the Talon pose a threat to them… or are kept hostages for some unknown reason.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][bcd3d4]泰隆是一个惊人的原始社会，变化很小。他们似乎 [-][/c][c][bcd3d4][c][bcd3d4]放弃了所有技术进步 - 出于某种未知的原因。[-][/c] 兹瑞克斯对泰隆施加了沉重的负担 - 热情地用无人机和其他限制来庇护他们。这可能表明泰隆对他们构成威胁……或者出于某种未知原因被当作人质。[-][/c]

English:
Parched mountains, rugged savanna and grueling plains, shriveled lake-beds with the remains of once thriving plant and animal life. This hot, dry and unrelenting planet has a thin atmosphere that is un-breathable by humans.
[u][/u]
[u]Possible resources:[/u] 
  Iron, Copper, Neodymium, Cobalt, Promethium, Titanium

  Atmospheric density: 0.9 - 1.5 kg/m³
  Day temperature: 3 to 70°C
  Night temperature: -23 to 60°C

English:
Water is quite common in the universe, as life-enabling liquid, or at least as ice or vapor. However, not every planet is gifted with water. Some worlds get scorched by their home star, or maybe their magnetic field is too weak to stem against the push of the stellar wind. But even this place of glaring sunshine has managed to keep some spots here or there...
[u][/u]
[u]Possible resources:[/u]

  Low chance of water

English:
Planets are born by the swirling, scattered ashes - the legacy of dead, exploded stars. Gravity will collect all this messy debris, and give it a new form. But a world's amount of rock and dust, slowly grinding, clumping together... will result in an enormous amount of friction. Which means, [b][i]heat[/i][/b].

This place is just a mere quarter billion years old, and struggles to radiate all this excess heat into space - The bigger the planet, the longer it takes.
In this liquid state, the planet resembles more a giant cooking pot, or lava lamp, or a blast furnace:Continents of less dense slag skim the surface, while the heavy, exotic metals sink into in planet's deep inner.

Yet, by thermal churning and stirring, some bits of that precious core will be again swept back out, in reach of the surface. For those who brave these temperatures, there will be great rewards.

[u]Possible resources:[/u]
  Magnesium, Erestrum, Promethium, Zascosium, Gold
[u][/u]
[u]Possible weather effects:[/u]
  Heat Wave, Meteor Rain, Fire Rain, Meteor Shower, Thunderstorm
[u][/u]
[u]Planet type data and possible variations:[/u]
  Traces of aggressive fauna detected. No flora.
  Atmosphere breathable: [c][ff0000]No[-][/c]
  Atmospheric O2 fraction: 0.5 - 0.9%
  Atmospheric density: 1.2 - 1.8 kg/m³
  Day temperature: 50 to 220°C
  Night temperature: 20 to 210°C
  Partially molten surface. No water.
  Radiation: 10 - 20 Gy/d
  Gravity: 1.0 - 1.2 g
Chinese (simplified):
行星诞生于旋转、散落的灰烬中——这是死去、爆炸的恒星遗留下来的遗产。重力将收集所有这些杂乱的碎片，并赋予它们新的形状。但是，一个世界所拥有的岩石和尘埃，缓慢地相互摩擦、聚集……将产生大量的摩擦。这意味着，热量。

这个星球仅有二十五亿年的历史，它努力将所有这些多余的热量辐射到太空中——星球越大，所需时间越长。
在这种液态状态下，这个星球更像是一个巨大的烹饪锅、熔岩灯，或者是一座炼钢炉：较轻的矿渣大陆漂浮在表面，而那些沉重的稀有金属则沉入星球深处。

然而，通过热力的搅拌和搅动，一些珍贵的核心物质将再次被扫回，达到表面。对于那些敢于面对这些温度的人来说，将会有巨大的回报。

[u]可能的资源：[/u]
镁、锷、钷、铡、金

[u]可能的天气效应：[/u]
热浪、流星雨、火雨、流星淋浴、雷暴

[u]星球类型数据及可能的变化：[/u]
探测到有攻击性动物的痕迹。没有植被。
大气可呼吸：[c][ff0000]否[-][/c]
大气中氧气比例：0.5 - 0.9%
大气密度：1.2 - 1.8 kg/m³
白天温度：50至220°C
夜晚温度：20至210°C
部分熔融表面。没有水。
辐射：10 - 20 Gy/d
重力：1.0 - 1.2 g

English:
[c][e0e020]WARNING:[-][/c]   [b]High gravity[/b]. Hostile. [c][808080][i]Don't get stranded down there.[/i][-][/c] 

A planet at the crossroads, shrouded in a thick cocktail of atmosphere:
Will it become a boiling, or a frozen world? Or something [i]just[/i] in between?
Will all the gases stay up in the sky, or condensate, to rain down? Will there be water? And how long will last, after all? Will it stay as oceans and lakes, or drift into space?

Even if this planet grows too hostile for life... that won't discourage the visitors. This is a young world. Expect rich ore deposits, a harsh climate, and laser shots from nowhere.

[u]Possible resources:[/u]
  Sathium, Gold, Pentaxid, Erestrum, Promethium, Zascosium
[u][/u]
[u]Possible weather effects:[/u]
  Meteor Rain, Fire Rain, Storm, Hail, Meteor Shower, Thunderstorm

[u]Planet type data and possible variations:[/u]
  Traces of aggressive fauna detected. No flora.
  Atmosphere breathable: [c][ff0000]No[-][/c]
  Atmospheric O2 fraction: 0.5 - 0.9%
  Atmospheric density: 1.5 - 2.0 kg/m³
  Day temperature: 40 to 100°C
  Night temperature: -20 to 50°C
  Partially molten surface. Water dissolved in atmosphere.
  Radiation: 5 - 8 Gy/d
  Gravity: 3.8 - 4.3 g
Chinese (simplified):
[c][e0e020]警告：[-][/c] [b]高重力[/b]。敌对环境。 [c][808080][i]不要被困在那里。[/i][-][/c]

这是一个处于十字路口的星球，被浓厚的大气层所笼罩：
它会成为一个沸腾的世界，还是一个冰冻的世界？或者只是[i]恰好[/i]在两者之间？
所有的气体都会留在天空中，还是凝结成雨滴降落？会有水吗？毕竟，它能持续多久？它会以海洋和湖泊的形式存在，还是飘散到太空中？

即使这个星球变得对生命太过敌对……那也不会阻止访客的到来。这是一个年轻的世界。预计有丰富的矿石储量，严酷的气候，以及来自未知之处的激光射击。

English:
[c][bcd3d4]Polaris Megacorp is a large multisystem corporation with reach that extends well beyond surveyed space. Most personnel is bipedal humanoid (metabolism seems to differ slightly from Terrans) but stems from any race in Andromeda, including the Zirax and the Kriel.[-][/c]

Fiels of engagement
[c][bcd3d4]- Primary provider of materials, tech and devices for different 3rd party companies (Bertram, InterWeap, Servant.) [-][/c][c][bcd3d4]
– Controls the majority of mining and refinery operations in surveyed space (UCH intel indicates a possible monopoly.) [-][/c]
[c][bcd3d4]– Relationship with Zirax unclear. Zirax installation infiltration suggests deep involvement with the empire, but this fact has yet to be confirmed. [-][/c]
[c][bcd3d4]- Same seems to be true for the Kriel Empire.[-][/c]

Other notes
[c][bcd3d4]The Polaris Megacorp has two subsidiaries: Polaris Space Industries (PSI) and Polaris Mining Company (PMC).

The Polaris Megacorp does not seem to be part of the much larger Traders Guild, but they both have tight relationships as spies report.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][bcd3d4]极星超级企业是一个大型的跨星系公司，其影响力延伸到了已勘测空间之外。大多数员工是双足人形生物（新陈代谢似乎与地球人略有不同），但源自安德洛梅达星系的本土种族，包括兹瑞克斯和克里尔。[-][/c]

领域涉及
[c][bcd3d4]- 为不同的第三方公司（伯特伦、国际武器、仆人）提供材料、技术和设备的主要供应商。[-][/c][c][bcd3d4]
- 控制着已勘测空间中大部分的采矿和精炼业务（联合商业情报显示可能存在垄断。）[-][/c][c][bcd3d4]
- 与兹瑞克斯的关系不明确。兹瑞克斯设施的渗透表明与帝国有深入的牵连，但这一事实尚未得到证实。[-][/c][c][bcd3d4]
- 对于克里尔帝国来说，情况似乎也是如此。[-][/c]

其他备注
[c][bcd3d4]极星超级企业有两个子公司：极星航天工业（PSI）和极星矿业公司（PMC）。
极星超级企业似乎不是更大的贸易者公会的一部分，但据间谍报告显示，他们之间有着紧密的关系。[-][/c]

English:
The KRIEL Empire is a growing superpower in Andromeda. The Kriel have seriously challenged the Zirax, as they both fight for the supremacy in this sector of Andromeda.Spies report, that the Kriel are organized like a bee hive, where the individual being is absolutely fungible on the one hand, but feeds the superorganism with valuable data at the same time. 

The Kriel technical capabilities are on the same level with the Zirax Empire.

[u]Origins[/u]
The Kriel seem to have evolved from insect-like creatures over millions of years on a planet that would be deadly to humans. In the last 10000 years they started getting more intelligent. It is believed they communicate via a hive mind and because of this are brutally efficient as they work as one. Despite the intelligence they have, they appear to have no emotion, including fear, and simply follow their instincts of conquering any other species they encounter, always in a quest for more resources expanding their colony. 

Most Kriel emplacements are found on inhabited, barren worlds - a result from the Kriel having stripped that worlds from all of their resources. Single Kriel stations found on lush temperate planets or other resource rich environments only mean that this planet is going to be 'harvested' soon.
Chinese (simplified):
克里尔（KRIEL）是仙女座中不断崛起的超级大国。克里尔与兹瑞克斯（Zirax）之间的竞争日趋激烈，双方都在为仙女座这个星区的霸权而战。据间谍报告，克里尔的组织结构类似于蜜蜂的蜂巢，个体在一方面可以完全替代，同时为他们的社会组织这个超级有机体提供有价值的数据。

克里尔的技术能力与兹瑞克斯帝国处于同一水平。

[u]起源[/u]
克里尔似乎是在过去百万年里从一个星球上类似昆虫的生物进化而来，这个星球对人类是致命的。在最近的10000年里，他们开始变得更加智能。人们相信他们通过蜂巢思维进行交流，因此他们在工作时极为高效，如同一个整体。尽管他们拥有智慧，但他们似乎没有情感，包括恐惧，只是简单地遵循他们征服任何遇到的其他物种的本能，始终在寻求更多的资源来扩张他们的殖民地。

大多数克里尔的据点都位于有人居住的贫瘠世界上——这是克里尔剥光了这些世界所有资源的结果。在肥沃的温带行星或其他资源丰富的环境中发现的单个克里尔站点，只意味着这个星球很快就要被“收割”了。

English: The Traders Guild is a millenia old congregation of traders and merchants. They dominate most of the trading and markets in this sector of Andromeda. They are neutral to all other factions, even Zirax and Kriel.\n\nThe Traders Guild seem to have tight relationships with the Polaris Megacorp, although the latter is not part of the organization as it seems.
Chinese (simplified): 贸易协会是一个千年老的商人和贸易者的集合。他们主导着仙女座这个星区的大部分贸易和市场。他们对所有其他派系保持中立，甚至是兹瑞克斯和克里尔。\n\n贸易协会似乎与极星超级企业有着紧密的关系，尽管后者似乎并不是该组织的一部分。

English: For the most part, the pirates do whatever pirates have done in other eras and places. Their crews stem from all species in Andromeda, including Zirax and Kriel.\n\nThe Pirates faction is split into several sub-groups and clans. There is no official command structure, but most of the clans follow the lead of a secret council.
Chinese (simplified): 在大多数情况下，海盗做的就是海盗在其他时代和地方所做的事情。他们的船员来自仙女座的所有物种，包括兹瑞克斯和克里尔。\n\n海盗派系分为几个小组和氏族。没有官方的指挥结构，但大多数氏族都跟随一个秘密委员会的领导。

English: The Talon and Zirax seem to fear that name. No other information given yet.
Chinese (simplified): 塔隆和兹瑞克斯似乎害怕那个名字。还没有给出其他信息。

English: A technological extremely advanced race, which has left a lot of traces in Andromeda. Other than that, no information is available yet.
Chinese (simplified): 一个技术极其先进的种族，在仙女座留下了许多痕迹。除此之外，还没有其他信息。

English: It is not entirely clear what the VOID are. They resemble black monoliths floating on planets without showing any interaction with their surroundings. They seem to be related to the TESCH and the PROGENITOR.
Chinese (simplified): 目前尚不清楚VOID是什么。它们类似于在星球上漂浮的黑色独石，没有显示出与周围环境的任何互动。它们似乎与TESCH和PROGENITOR有关。

English: The TESCH are no biological beings. They are basically AIs that are bound to certain structures, like datacenters. This fully digital lifeform is organized in semi-autark Nodes and Stations throughout their enormous territory closer to the center of the galaxy. Not a lot is known about its origin. They seem to be linked to the 'Progenitors' in some way and they have not shown a lot of interest in communications with the biologicals - except some trading for rare resources once and a while.
Chinese (simplified): TESCH不是生物实体。它们基本上是绑定到某些结构上的AI，如数据中心。这种完全数字化的生命形式在他们靠近银河中心的巨大领土上以半自给自足的节点和站点组织。关于它的起源知之甚少。它们似乎以某种方式与“先驱者”有关，并且除了偶尔为了稀有资源进行一些交易外，它们对与生物体的交流没有表现出太多兴趣。

English:
The Free Colonists are a mixed group of adventurers, explorers, runaways and other people that seek freedom or a new home outside of any faction controlled space for any imaginable reason or following the 'Galactic Colonization program', lead by Polaris Megacorp and the Traders Guild.

[u]GCP and New Eden[/u]
Reports indicate, the 'Galactic Colonization program', which started about 200-300 years ago and is still actively supported by Polaris Megacorp and the Traders Guild not out of  pure philanthropic thoughts, but to open new markets and build up a counterpart to the  increasingly controlled and regulated Zirax space. The program leaders claim, that 40% of the galaxy are already colonized due to their efforts.

The UCH scientific administration strongly recommends to take advantage of this program, internally referred to as 'New Eden'.
Chinese (simplified):
自由殖民者是由冒险家、探险家、逃亡者和其他寻求自由或在任何派系控制空间之外寻找新家的人组成的混合群体，出于任何可以想象的原因或跟随由极星超级企业和贸易协会领导的“银河殖民计划”。

[u]GCP和新伊甸园[/u]
报告显示，“银河殖民计划”大约在200-300年前开始，并且仍然得到极星超级企业和贸易协会的积极支持，并不是出于纯粹的慈善思想，而是为了开拓新市场和建立与日益受控和规范的兹瑞克斯空间相抗衡的对手。项目领导人声称，由于他们的努力，已经有40%的银河系被殖民了。

UCH科学行政部门强烈建议利用这个计划，内部称为“新伊甸园”。

English:
Resources are available from
1. Surface rocks
2. Underground deposits (use a detector to reveal their position)
5. Meteorites (falling on planets)
4. Asteroids (in space)

Note that 'crushed stone' is not only a byproduct of the mining process, but also is a viable resource as well. Either for creating concrete, but also to melt the rocks into other materials that possibly cannot be found on your position from surface rocks or deposits!

Crushed stone can be mined from any surface rock or (most of the time) by simply drilling into the ground.
Chinese (simplified):
资源可从以下来源获得：
1. 地表岩石
2. 地下矿藏（使用探测器揭示它们的位置）
5. 陨石（坠落在星球上）
4. 小行星（在太空中）

请注意，“碎石”不仅是采矿过程的副产品，也是一种可用的资源。无论是用于制造混凝土，还是将岩石熔化成其他可能在您所在位置的地表岩石或矿藏中找不到的材料！

碎石可以从任何地表岩石或（大多数时候）简单地钻入地面中开采。

English: Empyrion offers several different resources, ranging from metals to crystals. You can mine all resources  with the Survival Tool or any handheld or vessel-based mining drill. Some resources might take longer to mine per ore ingot, though.\n\n[i]For more detail and info, please, in the list on the left, click and open this chapters sub-headlines by [c][80ffff]clicking on their headline[-][/c] and/or by clicking the [c][80ffff]arrow-buttons [-][/c]next to them.[/i]
Chinese (simplified): Empyrion提供了多种不同的资源，从金属到晶体。你可以使用生存工具或任何手持或船载采矿钻头开采所有资源。不过，一些资源可能需要更长的时间来开采每个矿锭。\n\n[i]要获得更多详细信息，请在左侧列表中，通过[c][80ffff]点击他们的标题[-][/c]和/或点击旁边的[c][80ffff]箭头按钮[-][/c]来打开这些章节的小标题。[/i]

English: Base material required for crafting basic plating, construction materials and used in many low tech applications.
Chinese (simplified): 用于制作基础板材、建筑材料的基材以及在许多低技术应用中使用。

English: Base material. Used for silicon based building materials and simple computational applications and devices.
Chinese (simplified): 基础材料。用于基于硅的建筑材料和简单的计算应用和设备。

English: Base material. Used for all basic electronic devices and applications.
Chinese (simplified): 基础材料。用于所有基本电子设备和应用程序。

English: Material for alloys and required for certain technical applications.
Chinese (simplified): 合金材料，用于某些技术应用。

English: Used for more advanced electrical and computational devices. Replaces silicon in a lot of applications.
Chinese (simplified): 用于更先进的电气和计算设备。在许多应用中替代硅。

English: Replaces Titanium and Iron in most templates where a maximum of survivability is required, especially for military devices, plating and related applications.
Chinese (simplified): 在大多数需要最大生存能力的模板中替代钛和铁，特别是军事设备、镀层和相关应用。

English: Replaces iron in a lot of applications where more hitpoints, heat resistance and improved survivability is required.
Chinese (simplified): 在许多需要更多生命值、耐热性和提高生存能力的应用中替代铁。

English: Primarily used for lower tech weapons and explosives. \nCould be used for very lightweight materials and plating.
Chinese (simplified): 主要用于低技术武器和爆炸物。\n可用于制造非常轻的材料和镀层。

English: Used for lightweight construction materials and plating. \nReplaces iron in most non-military applications and devices.
Chinese (simplified): 用于轻质建筑材料和镀层。\n在大多数非军事应用和设备中替代铁。

English: Replaces Magnesium in most high end weapons and projectiles. \nAlso used in applications that require a highly reactive material (for example to build new alloys)
Chinese (simplified): 在大多数高端武器和弹药中替代镁。\n也用于需要高反应性材料的应用（例如建造新合金）

English: Replacing Neodymium for any high end computational device. Can also be refined into an alloy with highly protective properties.
Chinese (simplified): 使用钕替代任何高端计算设备中的元素。也可以精炼成具有高度保护性能的合金。

English: Radioactive compound used for fueling microreactors or used as addition for some ammo and charges.
Chinese (simplified): 用于为微型反应堆提供燃料或作为某些弹药和电荷的添加剂的放射性化合物。

English: Required for warp drives and exotic weapons and their ammo.
Chinese (simplified): 翘曲引擎和异域武器及其弹药所需的物资。

English: Used for a few technical applications, like Boosters.
Chinese (simplified): 用于一些技术应用，如助推器。

English: Can be harvested from asteroids and some other places as a temperature-stabilized resource. Can be melted into water.
Chinese (simplified): 可以从小行星和其他一些地方作为温度稳定的资源开采。可以融化成水。

English: Available in nearly any location, either intentionally or as a byproduct from drilling and mining.
Chinese (simplified): 几乎在任何地方都可获得，无论是故意的还是钻探和采矿的副产品。

English:
This barren rock carries its history on the surface: Completely solidified, and no atmosphere to remove tracks and shapes - All encounters will be remembered.

Possible resources: 
  Iron, Silicon, Copper, Cobalt, Magnesium, Titan, Pentaxid

Possible weather effects: 
n/a
Chinese (simplified):
这块贫瘠的岩石表面承载着它的历史：完全固化，没有大气层来抹去痕迹和形状——所有遭遇都将被铭记。

可能的资源：
  铁，硅，铜，钴，镁，钛，翘曲水晶
可能的天气效应：
  不适用

English:
This moon has a very thin atmosphere - It is shielded by an unusually large magnetic field of the nearby planet, and the moon is dense enough to keep some gases from drifting into space. By this it has accumulated extreme amounts of desert varnish.

Possible resources: 
  Iron, Silicon, Copper, Cobalt, Magnesium, Pentaxid, Promethium

Possible weather effects: 
n/a
Chinese (simplified):
这颗卫星有非常稀薄的大气层——它被附近行星异常大的磁场所保护，而且卫星密度足够大，能够防止一些气体飘散到太空中。因此，它积累了大量的沙漠漆。

可能的资源：
  铁，硅，铜，钴，镁，翘曲水晶（原料），钷
可能的天气效应：
  不适用

English:
A small temperate moon, with unusually thick atmosphere - Even bristling with life! [i]So many things[/i] need to come together for such a world to occur: Water, a still fluid metal core, a decent size, in the right distance to the star...

A superficial scan indicates, this moon is [i]resource poor[/i]. So there is not much interest in things that empires do - To claim, exploit, settle, or even just to visit. The drama of the universe continues elsewhere. While the canopies of the trees reach for sunlight. It is still a great spot if you want to get out of sight, or just to stretch your legs and wander.

Possible resources: 
  Iron, Silicon, Copper, Promethium, Pentaxid, Gold

Possible weather effects: 
Rain (Medium), Storm, Fog
Chinese (simplified):
一颗小型温和的卫星，拥有异常浓厚的大气层 - 甚至充满了生命！[i]要形成这样一个世界，需要许多因素的结合：水，一个仍然流动的金属核心，一个合适的大小，距离恒星的正确距离...

表面扫描表明，这颗卫星[i]资源贫乏[/i]。因此，帝国对此类事物没有太多兴趣 - 宣称，开发，定居，甚至只是访问。宇宙的戏剧在其他地方继续。而树木的树冠伸向阳光。如果你想要避开视线，或者只是想伸展双腿漫步，这仍然是一个绝佳的地方。

可能的资源：
  铁，硅，铜，钷，翘曲水晶（原料），金

可能的天气效应：
  雨（中等），风暴，雾

English:
An icy companion, with an ocean deep between its crust and rocky core. Faint organic substances leave colourful streaks on the surface. 

Possible resources: 
  Silicon, Cobalt, Magnesium, Iron, Promethium, Pentaxid

Possible weather effects: 
n/a
Chinese (simplified):
一个冰冷的伴侣，它的地壳和岩石核心之间有一个深邃的海洋。微弱的有机物质在表面留下彩色条纹。

可能的资源：
  硅，钴，镁，铁，钷，翘曲水晶（原料）

可能的天气效应：
  无

English:
Once upon a time, ... the planets were still forming. Gaining mass and changing their paths around their star. Gravitational disturbances swept through the whole system, hurtling planetesimals everywhere.This is a wanderer, born and expelled from a stellar asteroid belt. It got caught up by the nearby large planet. - Somehow avoiding to collide, or to be flung away.

But during those narrow, chaotic first passes, it experienced massive tidal forces. - Kneading it like dough, close to ripping it apart. Times are much calmer now.

And with that, all those scars make for impressive vistas, and stories of adventure. 

Possible resources: 
  Magnesium, Cobalt

Possible weather effects: 
n/a
Chinese (simplified):
从前，... 行星仍在形成中。它们在增加质量，改变围绕恒星的轨道。引力扰动席卷整个系统，将小行星到处抛射。这是一颗流浪者，诞生于恒星小行星带并被驱逐。它被附近的大行星捕获。- 以某种方式避免了碰撞，或被抛离。

但在那些狭窄、混乱的初次通过中，它经历了巨大的潮汐力。- 像揉面团一样塑造它，几乎要撕裂它。现在的时代要平静得多。

而那些伤痕，构成了令人印象深刻的景观，以及冒险的故事。

可能的资源：
  镁，钴

可能的天气效应：
  无

English:
A baby moon, with a not yet solid core, and faint traces of an atmosphere. Maybe it was born out of a stellar disc, or it is the remnant of a spectacular planetary collision.

Possible resources: 
  Iron, Silicon, Cobalt, Magnesium, Promethium, Pentaxid

Possible weather effects: 
n/a
Chinese (simplified):
一颗婴儿卫星，核心尚未固化，大气层只有微弱的痕迹。也许它诞生于恒星盘，或者是一次壮观的行星碰撞的残余。

可能的资源：
  铁，硅，钴，镁，钷，翘曲水晶（原料）

可能的天气效应：
  无

English:
This infant moon already lost its atmosphere by the relentless push of the stellar wind. Undisturbed, the last open lava seas crystallize in bizarre forms.

Possible resources: 
  Iron, Silicon, Cobalt, Magnesium, Promethium, Pentaxid

Possible weather effects: 
n/a
Chinese (simplified):
这颗新生的卫星已经失去了它的大气层，这是由于恒星风无情的推动。未受干扰的最后开放的熔岩海在奇异的形式中结晶。

可能的资源：
  铁，硅，钴，镁，钷，翘曲水晶（原料）

可能的天气效应：
  无

English:
A world in its youth: The atmosphere has cooled enough for it to rain. Last bits of the planetary neighbourhood crash into the surface, and violent jetstreams produce hail. But in all this chaos, first life develops in the tide pools - filling the water with the colour of early photosynthesis.

Possible resources: 
  Cobalt, Copper, Silicon, Erestrum, Zascosium, Pentaxid, Promethium

Possible weather effects: 
  Rain (Medium), Rain (Heavy), Storm, Snow (Heavy), Hail, Fire Rain, Acid Rain (Heavy)
Chinese (simplified):
一个年轻的世界：大气已经冷却到足以下雨的程度。行星邻近区域的最后一点碎片撞击到地表，剧烈的急流产生冰雹。但在所有这些混乱中，最初的生命在潮汐池中发展——用早期光合作用的颜色填满了水体。

可能的资源：
  钴，铜，硅，锷，铡，翘曲水晶（原料），钷

可能的天气效应：
  雨（中等），雨（重），风暴，雪（重），冰雹，火雨，酸雨（重）

English:

However, class M main-sequence stars (red dwarfs) have such low luminosities that none are bright enough to be seen with the unaided eye, unless under exceptional conditions. Typically, an M-type star's surface temperature is under about 4,000 K.

English:
A neutron star is the collapsed core of a giant star which before collapse had a total mass of between 10 and 29 solar masses. Neutron stars are the smallest and densest stars, excluding black holes, hypothetical white holes, quark stars and strange stars. Neutron stars have a radius on the order of 10 kilometres (6.2 mi) and a mass of about 1.4 solar masses. They result from the supernova explosion of a massive star, combined with gravitational collapse, that compresses the core past white dwarf star density to that of atomic nuclei.

Spectral Class: N
Type: Neutron Star
Galaxy Probability: 0.00625 
Size Class: 7
Surface Temperature: 10000000 - 100000000 K
Mass: 2x solar sun masses  
Radius: 0.00004x solar sun radii
Luminosity: n/a
Lifespan: 400 billion years  
Habitable zone:  109 - 144 AU

[i]Note: Currently it is not possible to fly into the atmosphere of any sun-type or other celestial bodies.[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
中子星是一个巨大恒星坍缩的核心，坍缩前总质量在10到29太阳质量之间。中子星是最小和最密集的恒星，不包括黑洞、假想的白洞、夸克星和奇异星。中子星的半径约为10公里（6.2英里），质量约为1.4太阳质量。它们是由一个巨大恒星的超新星爆炸，加上引力坍缩，将核心压缩超过白矮星密度到原子核的密度。

光谱类别：N

English:
A black hole is a region of spacetime exhibiting gravitational acceleration so strong that nothing—no particles or even electromagnetic radiation such as light—can escape from it. The theory of general relativity predicts that a sufficiently compact mass can deform spacetime to form a black hole. The boundary of the region from which no escape is possible is called the event horizon. Although the event horizon has an enormous effect on the fate and circumstances of an object crossing it, no locally detectable features appear to be observed.  

Spectral Class: BH
Type: Black Hole
Galaxy Probability: 0.003125
Size Class: n/a
Surface Temperature: n/a
Mass: n/a
Radius: n/a
Luminosity: n/a
Lifespan: 900 billion years  
Habitable zone:  109 - 144 AU

[i]Note: Currently it is not possible to fly into the atmosphere of any sun-type or other celestial bodies.[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
黑洞是一个时空区域，表现出如此强烈的引力加速度，以至于没有粒子甚至电磁辐射（如光）能够逃脱。广义相对论预测，足够紧凑的质量可以扭曲时空形成黑洞。从哪个区域无法逃脱的边界被称为事件视界。尽管事件视界对穿过它的物体的命运和情况有巨大的影响，但似乎没有可本地检测的特征。

English:
The Neptun-type planets are often called 'gas giants' but basically they are better categorized as 'ice giants' as one of their main components is water in a supercritical fluid state. They are also a different category of gas planets because, in opposite to Jupiter and Saturn types, their constituent compounds were solids when they formed. Some of those planets may still have a solid surface like other so called 'rocky planets'. Their atmosphere is a lot different to any of these planets of course.

Primary gases: water (supercritical fluid state), ammonia, methane
Solid terrain: possible
Solid core: likely

[i]Note: Currently it is not possible to land or fly into the atmosphere on any of the gas giants.[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
海王星类型的行星通常被称为'气体巨星'，但基本上它们更好地被归类为'冰巨星'，因为它们的主要成分之一是以超临界流体状态存在的水。它们也是气体行星的一个不同类别，因为与木星和土星类型相反，它们的组成化合物在形成时是固体。其中一些行星可能仍然有像其他所谓的'岩石行星'一样的固体表面。它们的大气层当然与这些行星有很大的不同。

主要气体：水（超临界流体状态）、氨、甲烷
固体地形：可能
固体核心：可能

- 金（0.5, 1-3）
- 冰（0.5, 1-2）
- 钛（0.6, 1-1）
翘曲到达/离开星区（恒星）

English:
An empty sector very close to the sun. Depending on which direction you came from, there are 6 possible exit points: front, back, up, down, left, right.

You will always exit your warp travel in one of them. 

[c][ff0000]Important[-][/c]: Make sure to NOT warp away leaving ships and vessels in your arrival sector - you will not be able to warp back from within the solar system to your arrival sector, due to gravitational and subspace effects!
Chinese (simplified):
一个非常靠近太阳的空旷星区。根据你来的方向，有6个可能的出口：前方、后方、上方、下方、左侧、右侧。

你将总是在其中之一退出翘曲旅行。

[c][ff0000]重要[-][/c]：确保不要在翘曲离开时留下飞船和舰船在你的到达星区 - 由于引力和亚空间效应，你将无法从太阳系内部翘曲回到你的到达星区！

English:
This barren, rocky planet, keeps nearest to its star... - Which is a bit too close for comfort. Its day side is heated near to the melting point, while the night side radiates into the vacuum of space. This constant temperature stress leaves deep scars in the surface, and fuels the growth of exotic crystals.

During youth, this world even had part of its crust boiled away - Placing the heavy mantle deposits in scanner range - ... But you will need all your calm, skill and experience to collect them. - Lest it becomes a greedy miner's grave: Slowly being cooked in your own, stuck vessel!

This galaxy is huge. - - There are plenty of easier worlds to exploit, or home shores to settle.People still attracted to such murderous places could be of the unstable, dangerous kind:

[i]The foolish, the violent, the crazy, the lawless...[/i]

Ducking away, underground or in the shadows- Escaping the glare of the day... while their bases crumble and groan by the stretching of metal.

[u]Possible resources:[/u] 
Iron, Ice, Copper, Titan, Promethium, Gold, Pentaxid, Sathium, Erestrum, Zascosium

[u]Possible weather effects:[/u] 
  Meteor Shower
[u]
Planet type data and possible variations:[/u]
Atmosphere breathable: [c][ffff00]No [-][/c]
  Atmospheric O2 fraction: n/a
  Atmospheric density: n/a
  Day temperature: 500°C
  Night temperature: 0°C
  No water
  Radiation: 3 - 6 Gy/d
  Gravity: 0.5 - 0.7 g
Chinese (simplified):
这个贫瘠多岩石的星球，距离它的恒星非常近…… - 近到让人感到不适。它的日照面接近熔点，而夜晚面则向太空的真空辐射热量。这种持续的温度压力在地表留下了深深的疤痕，并促进了奇异晶体的生长。

在年轻时期，这个世界甚至有部分地壳被煮沸殆尽 - 将重质地幔沉积物置于扫描范围内 - ……但你需要所有的冷静、技能和经验来收集它们。 - 否则它可能成为贪婪矿工的坟墓：慢慢地在你自己的、卡住的飞船里被煮熟！

这个星系是巨大的。 - - 有许多更容易开发的星球，或者更宜居的家园。仍然被这种致命地方吸引的人可能是不稳定的、危险的种类：

[i]愚蠢的、暴力的、疯狂的、无法无天的……[/i]

躲避在地下或阴影中 - 逃离白天的耀眼光芒……而他们的基地在金属的拉伸中崩溃和呻吟。

[u]可能的资源：[/u] 
铁、冰、铜、钛、钷、金、翘曲水晶（原料）、钑、铡、锷

[u]可能的天气效应：[/u] 
 流星雨

[u]星球类型数据和可能的变化：[/u]

English: It might be the birthplace of the Kriel as a race, but this dead planet is more a signal what the Kriel are up to: expand their territory at all cost.
Chinese (simplified): 这可能是克里尔作为一个种族的发源地，但这个死亡星球更像是克里尔的信号：不惜一切代价扩张他们的领土。

English: This swamp planet has only very few signs of any civilization. It is not clear why, but the Zirax stripped the planet of nearly all buildings, except the palace of the empress and a few monasteries. This is the sanctum planet. The spiritual and secular center of the Empire.
Chinese (simplified): 这个沼泽星球几乎没有文明的迹象。原因尚不清楚，但兹瑞克斯几乎摧毁了星球上的所有建筑，除了女皇的宫殿和一些修道院。这是圣殿星球。帝国的精神和世俗中心。

English: Three words: Never. Land. There.\n\nThis planet has been seized by the remains of the reactivated LEGACY. The entity uses the pentaxid in its crust to transform the surface into something no one knows what it should stand for... or do.
Chinese (simplified): 三个词：永远不要。在这里着陆。\n\n这个星球已经被重新激活的遗留者所占领。这个实体使用其地壳中的翘曲水晶将其表面转变成没有人知道它代表什么……或者做什么。
兹瑞克斯帝国（堡垒卫星）

English: Covered in wreckages and garbage of all kinds, these  moons are the dumping sites in most of the Kriel controlled systems.  They are not well guarded and the Kriel have a very low threshold for things that they would throw away.  The risk of being caught while digging through the junk sites might sometimes be worth the reward...
Chinese (simplified): 这些卫星上覆盖着各种类型的残骸和垃圾，它们是大多数克里尔控制的系统中的垃圾倾倒场。它们守卫不严，克里尔对于他们会扔掉的东西有非常低的门槛。在垃圾场挖掘时被抓住的风险有时可能值得奖励……

English: The Fortress Moons are the fleet bases and garrisons of the Zirax Empire space and ground forces. You can find them in most of the systems that are controlled by the Empire. Expect lots of troops, transporters and heavy combat vessels. Military operations in the sector (or for several sectors) are coordinated from those moons. The stations are said to be equipped with long-range teleporters to allow the Zirax troops to be quickly sent to any hotspot in a few light years distance. \n\nIt is not advised to land on such a moon without an ambassador's permission.
Chinese (simplified): 堡垒卫星是兹瑞克斯帝国太空和地面部队的舰队基地和驻军。你可以在帝国控制的大多数星系中找到它们。预计会有大量士兵、运输船和重型战斗舰艇。该星区（或几个星区）的军事行动是从这些卫星协调的。据称这些站点配备了远程传送装置，允许兹瑞克斯部队快速被派遣到几光年范围内的任何热点地区。\n\n不建议在没有大使许可的情况下登陆这样的卫星。

English: A small planetary patrol drone that has the capability to stun/disable biological beings and do a lot of damage to energy shields. It does no damage to armor and only has weak armor. The drone series was a concept of an energy-based non-lethal patrol drone, but development has ceased in favor of improved high-caliber projectile weaponry for drones and fighters.
Chinese (simplified): 一种小型行星巡逻无人机，有能力使生物体昏迷/失能，并对能量护盾造成大量伤害。它对装甲没有伤害，只有薄弱的装甲。无人机系列是一个基于能量的非致命巡逻无人机的概念，但开发已经停止，转而支持为无人机和战斗机改进大口径弹丸武器。

English: The miniguns of this planetary drone are a real danger for all ground troops, but not so much for armored vessels. Its armor is quite weak.
Chinese (simplified): 这种行星无人机的微型机枪对地面部队来说是一种真正的威胁，但对装甲舰艇来说就不那么危险了。它的装甲相当薄弱。

English: The 30mm projectiles of this planetary drone will do a lot of damage to light armored, slow moving vessels, but only minor to zero damage to shields. It is also slightly better armored than the minigun drones. Ground troops are in a real danger as well, although the rate of fire is low enough to be able to possibly outrun the drone.
Chinese (simplified): 这种行星无人机的 30 毫米弹丸会对装甲薄、移动缓慢的船只造成很大伤害，但对护盾几乎没有伤害。它的装甲也比微型无人机稍好一些。地面部队也会面临真正的危险，尽管射速很低，有可能会被无人机超越。

English: The (non-guided) rockets of this planetary drone deal a lot of piercing and splash damage including a small EMP effect component. They are a real danger for medium armored vessels, although shields will take only a fraction of the damage per rocket. Ground troops should be able evade the rockets if the distance is high enough and when moving quickly enough. The rocket drones have light to medium armor.
Chinese (simplified): 这种行星无人机的（非制导）火箭可造成大量穿透和溅射伤害，包括少量电磁脉冲效应。虽然护盾只能承受每枚火箭弹的一小部分伤害，但它们对中型装甲舰船来说确实是个威胁。如果距离足够远，移动速度足够快，地面部队应该能够躲避火箭弹。火箭无人机拥有轻型到中型装甲。

English: The minigun gunship class is geared to combat entire groups of hostile ground troops at the same time. It still uses the 15mm rounds, but due to modifications to the guns, it might deal some damage to smaller, unshielded vessels as well.
Chinese (simplified): 机枪炮飞船级专为同时对抗整群敌对地面部队而设计。它仍然使用标准的15毫米弹药，但由于对枪械进行了改装，它也可能对较小的、无盾飞船造成一定伤害。

English: The rocket gunship is heavily armed and uses a slightly larger rocket type than its smaller sibling. The damage to shields and armor plates has been further increased by weapon modifications and a higher rate of fire.
Chinese (simplified): 火箭炮艇装备了大量武器，使用的火箭类型比其较小的同级舰略大。通过武器改装和更高的射速，对护盾和装甲板的伤害进一步提高。

English: A heavily armed space fighter with good maneuverability, equipped with guided rockets. While the damage to armor has been improved, the rockets deal only slightly more damage to shields than the variant of the planetary drones.
Chinese (simplified): 一艘装备有制导火箭的重型武装太空战斗机，具有良好的机动性。虽然对装甲的伤害有所提高，但火箭对护盾的伤害只比行星无人机的变种略高。

English:
The Kiuvera-class cutter is a state-of-the-art multi-role attack craft designed in the last few years after the Zirax encountered the UCH from studying the wreckage left from the battle over Akua.
Unlike older model zirax crafts, the cockpit is further forward with a wide wing-like fore instead of a heavily armored prow that would typically be used for ramming. The wing-like front stabilizes the craft and reduces strain on the ship's frame while entering atmosphere instead of simply forcing atmosphere out of the way with brute force.
The secondary purpose of the downward-curved wings is to function as supports as a dropship, capable of lifting ground vehicles and supplies long distance in-atmo for minimal fuel.
Unlike the Korat, the Kiuvera has interchangeable equipment, being easily refitted on the fly for patrol, bombing, surveillance and cargo. Making it a preferred patrol vessel for many of the zirax houses.

Attack value: 
Defense value: 

Weapons: 4x Laser
Shield:
Drones:
Chinese (simplified):
Kiuvera级切割机是在过去几年兹瑞克斯遇到UCH后，通过研究Akua上空战斗留下的残骸而设计的最新型多角色攻击飞行器。
与旧型号的兹瑞克斯飞船不同，驾驶舱更靠前，有一个宽阔的翼状前部，而不是通常用于撞击的重型装甲船头。翼状前部稳定了飞行器，并在进入大气层时减少了对船体框架的应力，而不是简单地用蛮力将大气推开。
向下弯曲的翼的次要功能是作为空投船，能够在大气中长距离提升地面车辆和物资，以最小的燃料消耗。
与Korat不同，Kiuvera有可互换的设备，可以轻松地在巡逻、轰炸、监视和货物运输之间重新配置。这使得它成为许多兹瑞克斯家族的首选巡逻船。

攻击值：
防御值：

武器：4x激光
盾牌：
无人机：

English:
The poor armaments and expensive hulls of the existing planetary patrol vessels made them ideal targets, to the point that it was considered arming the enemy by keeping them in service. The Korat-class cutter was put into service as a replacement.

Bordering on the boundary of being classed as a small vessel, Cutter-class ships have always been lightly armored, powered and armed. Improvements over the last few years during the construction of the zirax's new fleet elements saw marked improvements to their cutters to replace their planetary patrol vessels that until recently had been nothing more than armed freighters.

The Korat, like all cutters is a low-cost, mass-produced support craft designed for planetary patrol and survey missions. It's an agile craft equipped with a pair of underside Miniguns for anti-personnel ground combat and a pair of topside cannons for anti-aircraft combat.
Unlike the armed freighters it replaced, the Korat isn't warp-capable instead relying on a Tender to transport Cutters in-bulk between sectors. With the tenders mounting up to 8 cutters each, they're primarily used for anti-piracy action for pursuing smaller, agile enemies to ground. A fact that doesn't change when used alone to protect zirax assets on the ground or assist in a ground assault on an enemy installation.

Attack value: 
Defense value: 

Weapons: 2x Minigun, 2x Cannon
Shield: no
Drones:
Chinese (simplified):
现有的行星巡逻舰船的武器装备贫弱且船体昂贵，使它们成为理想的攻击目标，以至于有人认为继续使用它们等同于“为敌人提供武装”。因此，科拉特级切割舰被投入使用作为替代品。

科拉特级切割舰几乎接近被称为小型舰船的边缘，切割舰级船舶一直以来都是轻装甲、轻动力和轻武装的。在过去几年中，随着兹瑞克斯新舰队元素的建造，其切割舰有了显著的改进，以取代那些直到最近还只是武装货船的老化行星巡逻舰船。

科拉特级切割舰像所有切割舰一样，是一种低成本、大规模生产的支援船只，专为行星巡逻和勘测任务而设计。它是一种敏捷的船只，装备有一对悬挂在下方的机枪，用于反人员地面战斗，以及一对顶部的炮，用于防空战斗。

与它所取代的武装货船不同，科拉特级切割舰不具备翘曲能力，而是依靠补给船来成批运输切割舰在星区间。由于补给船每个能装载多达8艘切割舰，它们主要用于反海盗行动和追击更小、更敏捷的敌人至地面；当单独使用来保护兹瑞克斯的地面资产或协助对敌方设施的地面攻击时，这一事实并没有改变。

攻击值：
防御值：

武器：2x 机枪，2x 加农炮
护盾：无
无人机：

English:
With the Zirax being a militaristic and aggressive race, they often design their ships for ramming, giving them an armored prow with a large engines at each end to provide thrust.

The main bridge is located at the end of the tail, rather than up high, center-mounted or at the front like a terran or polaran ship. Allowing the captain a view of the entire ship and clear visuals for clearance when landing such a wide vessel.

In heavy combat, the captain will usually switch to the Combat bridge at the heart of the ship where there's less chance of being killed by a stray rocket from a flanking spacecraft. Though taking the combat bridge for light combat is considered cowardly.

The main bridge can be sealed and ejected as a lifeboat in an emergency; includes cryopods for the entire crew.

Attack value: 
Defense value: 

Weapons: 4c Pulse Laser, 3x Plasma, 1x Minigun, 1x Flak
Shield:
Drones:
Chinese (simplified):
由于兹瑞克斯是一个军事化和侵略性的种族，他们经常设计他们的飞船用于撞击，给它们一个装甲的船头和每个端部的大型引擎以提供推力。

主桥位于尾部的末端，而不是像地球或极星飞船那样高高在上、中心安装或位于前端。这让船长可以一览整个飞船，并在着陆这样一个宽阔的飞船时有清晰的视觉。

在激烈的战斗中，船长通常会切换到位于飞船中心的战斗桥，那里被流弹击中的几率较小。尽管在轻战斗中接管战斗桥被认为是懦弱的。

主桥可以在紧急情况下密封并作为救生艇弹出；包括整个机组的冷冻舱。

English:
The Periat-class Missile Frigate is the last of the older model hammerhead-type ships used by the Xenu.
Like the Sunat-class, the Periat possesses a heavily armored prow designed for head-on assaults and ramming. With a rear-mounted bridge to both survey the battlefield and to aid in landing the ship's considerable width, while also a lower, more protected combat bridge inside the head of the ship for heavy combat situations where the rear bridge may come under fire by a flanking enemy.

The ship boasts a considerable number of rooms and bunks for crew, but on average as the number of Periat-class frigates are slowly retired from service, less than half the available bunks are ever filled as crews are more use trained for more modern combat vessels.
Due to the considerable width of the Periat-class Frigates, docking and finding suitable landing areas always proved a problem and became one of the leading reasons the hammerhead-type ships went out of style. Relegated to the task of patrol duty, parade and support roles, they number now only in the hundreds.

The Periat-class have a hangar beneath the combat bridge, accessed from the rear; four forward-facing rocket batteries mounted top and bottom to engage enemies ahead, with four flak turrets mounted top and bottom to cover the rear and blind spots of the forward rocket batteries. A pair of heavy Zirax plasma turrets are mounted beneath the bridge to prevent boarders entering the hangar and for orbital bombardment of ground installations.

Attack value: 
Defense value: 

Weapons: 4x Rocket, 2x Plasma, 4x Flak, 4 Sentry
Shield:

Chinese (simplified):
与苏纳特级一样，佩里亚特级导弹护卫舰也拥有重装甲的前舷，用于正面攻击和冲撞。与同级舰一样，佩里亚特号也有一座后置舰桥，用于勘察战场和帮助船体宽度较大的舰艇着陆，同时还有一座更低矮、更受保护的前置战斗舰桥，用于在重型战斗情况下，后置舰桥可能会遭到侧翼敌人的炮火攻击。 
由于佩里亚特级护卫舰的宽度很大，停靠和寻找合适的着陆区一直是个问题，这也是锤头型舰艇过时的主要原因之一。佩里亚特级护卫舰的战斗舰桥下方有一个机库，可以从后方进入；上下各安装了四个前向火箭炮组，用于打击前方的敌人，上下各安装了四个高射炮塔，用于掩护后方和前向火箭炮组的盲区。舰桥下方安装了一对重型齐拉克斯（Zirax）等离子炮塔，用于防止登船者进入机库，并对地面设施进行轨道轰炸： 
防御值： 
武器： 4x Rocket, 2x Plasma, 4x Flak, 4 Sentry
Shield: （无人机）

English:
The Imerat-Class Destroyer is one of the latest models of combat vessels currently in use by the Zirax, making up a significant portion of their total fleet. However, due to the need for defense around their home systems and border patrols at the edge of controlled space, it's generally quite rare to encounter one in the area between the two zones.

Unlike the older model Periat and Sunat class ships, the Imerat consolidates the majority of its infrastructure into a single, heavily armored body instead of spreading it out amongst an array of modules and arms. Giving away space normally used for crew for the mass of machinery required to run the engines and a high-output nuclear reactor far in excess of what the ship needs to run.
The general theory behind the use of such a high output generator is as an external power supply for establishing bases in the field; with the reactor connecting directly the bases infrastructure since it's more efficient to run the reactor constantly than to shut it down when not needed.

The Imerat's arsenal seems impressive on paper, but much of it is low-output energy weapons designed for combating legacy infestations and swarmships. While it has significant artillery, it's distributed for forward firing and orbital bombardment and isn't suitable for high-speed engagements, being at a disadvantage against a single small, fast-moving craft. For this reason, it has a set of rails on the rear to which a pair of fighters are usually docked to protect the ship's vulnerable rear.

Attack value: 
Defense value: 

Weapons: 8x Pulse Laser, 1x Rocket, 2x Flak, 3x Plasma, 3x Artillery, 7x Sentry
Shield:
Drones:
Chinese (simplified):
伊梅拉特级驱逐舰是兹瑞克斯目前使用的最新型战斗舰艇之一，构成了他们舰队的重要部分。然而，由于需要在其本土系统周围进行防御和在控制空间边缘进行边境巡逻，所以在两个区域之间的区域遇到它通常是相当罕见的。

与较老型号的佩里阿特和苏纳特级舰艇不同，伊梅拉特级将其大部分基础设施整合成一个单一的、装甲厚重的主体，而不是将其分散在一系列的模块和臂膀中。它牺牲了通常用于船员的空间，以便为运行引擎和高输出核反应堆所需的大量机械装置腾出空间，这种反应堆的输出远大于飞船所需。

使用如此高输出发电机的一般理论是作为建立野外基地的外部电源；由于直接将反应堆连接到基地基础设施更为高效，因此反应堆会持续运行，而不是在不需要时关闭。

伊梅拉特级的武器库在纸面上看起来令人印象深刻，但其中许多是低输出能量武器，这些武器设计用于对抗遗留者虫害和群舰。虽然它拥有重要的炮兵力量，但它被分布在前向射击和轨道轰炸中，不适合高速交战，面对一个小型、快速移动的飞船时处于劣势。因此，它在后部有一套轨道，通常有一对战斗机停靠在上面以保护飞船脆弱的后部。

防御值：

武器：8x 脉冲激光，1x 火箭，2x 弹片炮，3x 等离子，3x 炮兵，7x 哨兵

English:
The primary carrier unit of the zirax fleets, the Kamirat-Class Battlecarrier is a heavily armed and armored ship almost as dangerous alone as the Imerat-Class Destroyer, and just as important to the zirax navy.
Their deployment of largely unmanned drones allows them to strike fast and hard at multiple targets either offensively or defensively that costs less than a destroyer to operate in the face of the zirax empire's disproportionate population and dependency on cloning for shock troops.

兹瑞克斯舰队的主要运载单位，卡米拉特级战斗航母是一种重型武装和装甲的飞船，几乎和伊梅拉特级驱逐舰一样单独作战危险，对兹瑞克斯海军同样重要。

他们大量部署无人无人机，允许他们在成本低于驱逐舰的情况下，快速而强硬地攻击多个目标，无论是进攻还是防御，这反映了兹瑞克斯帝国人口比例失调和对克隆冲击部队的依赖。

English:
Among the zirax warfleet, the Tovera-Class is the only true battleship constructed since the war of silence. Designed to crack open legacy decimators, the Tovera's broad, hammer-head design, a typical design of zirax older vessels, allows it to direct all its considerable firepower onto a single point while simultaneously allowing to a full field of view, allowing it to fight on any angle.

Defensively, it has the thickest armor of any zirax ship ever built. With the prow of the ship being up to 15 meters thick, allowing the Tovera the resilience to withstand a direct impact with an Infector's reinforced shell with the infector coming out worse off.

With the resurgence of the Legacy, Rados shipyards have been working flat out to produce more Dreadnoughts, with the current count of Dreadnoughts in active service being estimated at 68. Most of which are concentrated around the zirax homeworld.

Chinese (simplified):
在兹瑞克斯战争舰队中，托维拉级是自沉默之战以来唯一真正建造的战列舰。设计用来击破遗留者毁灭者，托维拉级宽阔的锤头型设计，这是兹瑞克斯早期船只的典型设计，使其能够将所有可观的火力集中到一个点上，同时允许全方位视野，允许它在任何角度作战。

在防御方面，它是迄今为止建造的任何兹瑞克斯船只中最厚的装甲，船头部分厚度可达15米。这让托维拉能够承受与感染者加固外壳的直接撞击，而感染者则会遭受更大的损失。

随着遗留者的复兴，拉多斯造船厂一直在全力生产更多的这些无畏舰，目前活跃服役中的托维拉数量估计为68艘。这些船只大多集中在兹瑞克斯的母星周围。

English: The bomber gunship is often used in base attacks. It moves slower than the other gunships, but is heavily armed. Its bombs deal enormous damage to any ground troop and to armored structures, but only do little damage to shields.
Chinese (simplified): 轰炸机舰经常被用于基地攻击。它比其他炮艇移动得慢，但装备有重型武器。它的炸弹对任何地面部队和装甲结构造成巨大损伤，但对护盾只造成轻微损伤。

English:
The office of [c][80ffff]D[-][/c]eep space [c][80ffff]E[-][/c]xploration, [c][80ffff]S[-][/c]cience and [c][80ffff]C[-][/c]olonization is an organization, founded a century ago by independent companies, NGOs and the Free Colonists to address the questions, problems and challenges that this galaxy poses to both individuals and societies on a global scale.

Since two decades ago, DESC is also recognized as a legitimate and official organisation by the most important powers in this sector of the galaxy: Polaris, Traders Guild, the Zirax Empire and even the Pirate Clans. The Kriel Empire at least has promised to not attack any DESC representative outside of their core worlds.

DESC does not run own stations or vessels, but every interested citizen can get in touch with the organization via the GALACTIC INFORMATION NETWORK (GIN) consoles - available on all official trading stations! 

Significant contributions to the overall goal of DESC will be rewarded!
Chinese (simplified): [c][80ffff]D[-][/c]深空[c][80ffff]E[-][/c]探索、[c][80ffff]S[-][/c]科学和[c][80ffff]C[-][/c]殖民化办公室是一个由独立公司、非政府组织和自由殖民者在一个世纪前成立的组织，旨在解决这个星系给个人和社会带来的跨领域的问题、难题和挑战。 \n自二十年前以来，DESC也被银河系中最重要的势力视为合法的官方组织： 极星、贸易商公会、齐拉克斯帝国，甚至海盗部族。DESC并不管理或拥有自己的站点或船只，但每个感兴趣的公民都可以通过银河信息网（GIN）控制台与该组织取得联系--所有官方贸易站都可以使用！\n对DESC的总体目标做出重大贡献将获得奖励！

English: This chapter of the Empyriopedia files information about all relevant factions, their (combat) vessels, ground- and orbital structures.\n\n[i]Expand and reveal the info of the chapter categories and their sub-folders by [c][80ffff]clicking on their headline[-][/c] and/or by clicking the [c][80ffff]arrow-buttons [-][/c]next to them.[/i]
Chinese (simplified): Empyriopedia 的这一章节包含了所有相关派系、他们的（战斗）飞船，以及地面和轨道结构的信息。\n\n[i]通过[c][80ffff]点击他们标题[-][/c]和/或点击他们旁边的[c][80ffff]箭头按钮[-][/c]来展开并显示章节类别及其子文件夹的信息。[/i]

English: This chapter of the Empyriopedia files information about all relevant story characters, as well as the different civilians, troopers, droids, cyborgs and all the other creatures you might run into while exploring this galaxy.\n\n[i]Expand and reveal the info of the chapter categories and their sub-folders by [c][80ffff]clicking on their headline[-][/c] and/or by clicking the [c][80ffff]arrow-buttons [-][/c]next to them.[/i]
Chinese (simplified): 这一章节的Empyriopedia文件包含了关于这个银河系中所有相关故事角色的信息，以及不同的平民、士兵、机器人、半机械人以及你在探索这个银河系时可能遇到的所有其他生物。\n\n[i]通过[c][80ffff]点击他们的标题[-][/c]和/或点击它们旁边的[c][80ffff]箭头按钮[-][/c]来展开并揭示章节类别及其子文件夹的信息。[/i]

English: This chapter of the Empyriopedia files information about all resources, relevant planet and moon types, stars and other celestial objects in this galaxy.\n\n[i]Expand and reveal the info of the chapter categories and their sub-folders by [c][80ffff]clicking on their headline[-][/c] and/or by clicking the [c][80ffff]arrow-buttons [-][/c]next to them.[/i]
Chinese (simplified): 这一章节的Empyriopedia文件包含了关于这个银河系中所有资源、相关行星和卫星类型、恒星和其他天体的信息。\n\n[i]通过[c][80ffff]点击他们的标题[-][/c]和/或点击它们旁边的[c][80ffff]箭头按钮[-][/c]来展开并揭示章节类别及其子文件夹的信息。[/i]

English: A planetary fighter drone, merely built around the concept of a downsized, less armored and slower model of the Polaris space fighter. It is equipped with a MKII Pulsed Laser Repeater (PLR). It is a lot more costly to use and maintain when used on planetary drones compared to other purely projectile or other specialized energy based weapons. It's advantage: it is much more effective against armored targets compared to the standard pulse laser or a high caliber cannon, with a decent damage effect against shields. It is also deadly for ground troops as it has a higher rate of fire than the larger caliber guns.
Chinese (simplified): 一种行星战斗无人机，基于缩小尺寸、减少装甲、速度较慢的极星太空战斗机概念建造。它配备了MKII脉冲激光重复器（PLR）。与使用其他纯射击或专门基于能量的武器相比，这种武器在使用和维护上成本更高。它的优点是：与标准脉冲激光或大口径炮相比，它对装甲目标更有效，对护盾的伤害也相当可观。它对地面部队也是致命的，因为它的射速比大口径炮更高。

English: The Polaris space combat fighters are equipped with a slightly modified version of the standard pulse laser weapon most fighters are using in this galaxy. Its increased damage on armor and higher damage on shields is accompanied by a heavier armor plating compared to its Zirax counterpart.
Chinese (simplified): 极星太空战斗战斗机配备了标准脉冲激光武器的略微改良版本，这种武器在这个星系中的大多数战斗机都在使用。与兹瑞克斯竞争对手相比，它的装甲损伤增加，护盾伤害更高，并且装甲板更重。

English: Scientists of the Polaris Megacorp have managed to create a pulse a heavily ionized pulsed laser particle that can severely damage shields and armor from a high distance. Drones equipped with these 'Laser Pulse Bolt' weapons are often used as long range attack craft together with Polaris laser fighters. The particle can melt through heavy plating, but is primarily known for being able to swipe away standard shields in seconds. The Pulse fighters are well armored, but due to the energy required for supercharging the ionized laser particle, they can only move slowly.
Chinese (simplified): 极星超级企业的科学家们设法创造了一种高度电离的脉冲激光粒子，这种粒子可以在高距离严重损坏护盾和装甲。装备这些'激光脉冲弹'武器的无人机通常与极星激光战斗机一起用作远程攻击舰。这种粒子可以熔化重型板材，但主要因其能够在几秒钟内清除标准护盾而闻名。脉冲战斗机装甲坚固，但由于需要为超充电离激光粒子提供能量，它们只能缓慢移动。

English:
The Polaris Armed Shuttle, also known as the Surveyor is a short-range armed shuttle for collecting and depositing polaris workers, private security and equipment into or through hostile territory.
A reliable ship, it technically violates zirax law being larger than a commercial transport and more heavily armed than most drones.

Despite obvious signs of militarization, the innocently-named APC has many rows of seats to enforce its registration as a non-combat vessel and officially the weapons are intended for dealing with wildlife on the ground.

Despite being registered as a commercial transport for hazardous conditions, the Idala has a warship class designation and is unofficially classed as a Cutter, a small combat ship.
Nonetheless, it does serve publicly as a transport for workers too and from their residence modules to their designated workplace.

The first encounter with Polaris by the UCH was a regular transport crossing near the UCH defensive lines in the battle of Endeda Beta. Identified as a transport and with its identifiable coloring, it was given the temporary military designation of "Schoolbus", which after establishing closer relations with Polaris has unfortunately stuck with the rank and file. Much to the chagrin of the military command.

Defense value: 

Weapon types: Pulse Laser, Flak
Shield:
Drones:
Chinese (simplified):
极星武装穿梭机，也被称为勘测者，是一种短程武装穿梭机，用于收集和部署极星工人、私人安全人员和设备进入或穿越敌对领土。
一艘可靠的飞船，技术上违反了兹瑞克斯法律，因为它比商用运输机大，武装程度超过大多数无人机。
尽管有明显的军事化迹象，但这个被无辜命名的APC有许多排座位，以强化其作为非战斗舰船的注册，并官方上武器是用于对付地面上的野生动物。
尽管被注册为用于危险条件的商用运输，Idala拥有战舰级别的指定，并且非正式地被归类为Cutter，一种小型战斗舰。
尽管如此，它确实公开作为工人从他们的居住模块到他们指定的工作地点的交通工具。

与极星的第一次接触是UCH在Endeda Beta战斗中穿越近UCH防线的常规运输。被识别为运输机，并且有其可识别的颜色，它被临时军事指定为“校车”，在与极星建立更密切的关系后，不幸的是这个名称一直沿用至今。这让军事指挥部非常恼火。

Kellend class vessels will not stand a chance in a serious battle, but they are tough enough for clearing an ambush of pirates or keep up with occasional marauder encounters.

English:
The Polaris Tenders are a combination of factory ship, giga transport and carrier platform.

There are only a few of those megaships, but each one is in the size of other factions carriers and beyond, capable of even supporting large Zirax Cruisers, running a full fledge mining operation…or building up a colony on its own!

The ship class offers several fully automated ore-to-device production lines, repair and refilling facilities and an enormous amount of cargo capacity. They can hold a fleet of smaller ships for remote repair, supply and material transport and mining.

Because of that, tenders of the Illmarien-Class are often found, leading bigger mining and salvaging operations as mobile command outposts.

As these ships are incredibly slow and only have a few turrets for asteroid defense, they usually have a large escort group.

Chinese (simplified):
极星补给舰是工厂船、巨型运输船和航母平台的结合体。

这些巨型飞船数量不多，但每一艘的规模都超过了其他派系的航母，甚至能够支持大型兹瑞克斯巡洋舰，同时运行完整的采矿作业，并自行建立殖民地！

这艘船级提供了几条完全自动化的矿石到设备生产线，修理和补给设施，以及巨大的货物容量。它们可以容纳一支小型船队，用于远程修理、供应、物资运输和采矿。

正因为如此，伊尔马里恩级补给舰通常作为移动指挥所，领导着更大规模的采矿和打捞作业。

由于这些飞船速度极慢，且只有少数炮塔用于小行星防御，它们通常有一大群护航舰艇。

English: The plasma pulse drone used by the Traders Guild for planetary sector control is equipped with a fast firing plasma pulse weapon which deals a lot of damage to armor and shields. The drone itself is using a chassis of the Zirax planetary small drones, but with weaker armor due to the planetary drone can move quite fast and has a high maneuverability, but it can literally be damaged by throwing a stone at it - as their operators often complain.
Chinese (simplified): 贸易协会用于行星星区控制的等离子脉冲无人机装备有快速射击的等离子脉冲武器，对装甲和护盾造成大量伤害。无人机本身使用的是兹瑞克斯行星小型无人机的底盘，但由于行星无人机移动速度相当快且具有高机动性，因此装甲较弱，以至于实际上可以用扔石头的方式对其造成伤害——正如它们的操作员经常抱怨的那样。

English: The plasma space fighter is equipped with a larger version of its planetary siblings weapon. Due to the larger chassis, the energy management is less of a problem. The energy content and thus the damage of the plasma pulses on impact are a lot higher. The fighter moves fast and is highly maneuverable
Chinese (simplified): 等离子太空战斗机装备有比其行星同类更大的武器版本。由于底盘更大，能量管理不再是问题。等离子脉冲在撞击时的能量含量和因此造成的伤害要高得多。战斗机移动速度快且高度机动。

English: The plasma rocket fighter bomber is based on the same chassis that all of the Traders Guild fighters are using. It is bearing a self-guided, slow moving plasma warhead. The impact will severely damage the targets armor and shields, although there is a chance to outrun the projectile for vessels. Due to the heavier armoring and the max speed for the rocket deployment, the fighter bomber is flying slower than a pulse fighter and also needs to be quite close to its target to be able to release the warhead.
Chinese (simplified): 等离子火箭战斗机轰炸机基于贸易协会所有战斗机都使用的相同底盘。它携带有自导的、移动缓慢的等离子弹头。撞击将严重损坏目标的装甲和护盾，尽管对于飞船来说有机会逃脱这个投射物。由于更重的装甲和火箭部署的最大速度，战斗机轰炸机的飞行速度比脉冲战斗机慢，也需要非常接近目标才能释放弹头。

English: The artillery support vessel is based on the same chassis as the Zirax heavy Interceptor series. It moves slower than the Interceptor and has only basic armor, but is equipped with a special rocket, bearing a fusion warhead, which works both against shields and all kinds of armor.  Although the projectiles are quite costly and the vessels are lost quite often due to their basic armor, the Zirax Strategic Command insists to keep this vessel in the main combat groups.
Chinese (simplified): 炮兵支援舰基于兹瑞克斯重型拦截机系列的相同底盘。它比拦截机移动得慢，只有基础装甲，但装备有特殊的火箭，携带聚变弹头，对护盾和各种装甲都有效。尽管这些投射物相当昂贵，且由于基础装甲的原因，舰艇经常损失，兹瑞克斯战略指挥部坚持将这种舰艇保留在主要战斗群中。

English: The cannon drone is based on stolen or captured Polaris drones. Instead of the Pulse Lasers, they are equipped with modified high caliber cannons of unknown origin. The cannons are dangerous for un-shielded medium armored vessels, but only have a low effect on shields. The drones armor is lower than its original version, but it moves faster.
Chinese (simplified): 无人加农炮以偷来或缴获的极星无人机为基础。它们装备的不是脉冲激光器，而是来历不明的改装大口径加农炮。这种大炮对无护罩的中型装甲舰船很危险，但对护罩的影响很小。无人机的装甲低于其原始版本，但移动速度更快。

English: Based on stolen/captured versions of the Zirax Rocket Gunship. The pirates have managed to squeeze in several batteries of mortar launchers of unknown origin. The rockets do slight damage to standard shields and do some damage to medium armor. The drone moves as slow as the gunship it is based on and has reduced armor due to the modifications made. Its main task is to fight light to medium ground vessels and infantry.
Chinese (simplified): 基于被盗/缴获的 Zirax 火箭炮艇。海盗们设法挤进了几组来历不明的迫击炮发射器。这些火箭可对标准护盾造成轻微伤害，并对中型装甲造成一定伤害。无人机的移动速度和它所基于的炮艇一样慢，并且由于改装而降低了装甲。它的主要任务是骚扰轻型到中型地面船只和步兵。

English:
Based on the chassis of a stolen/captured Traders Guild Plasma fighter. It is equipped with an EMP weapon, based on a stolen (discontinued) prototype concept the Zirax Empire was working on for their space fighters. Its effect on shields is only slightly lower than its Polaris equivalent, but its rate of fire is increased, which makes it more dangerous for vessels that rely on shields. The downside of the prototype concept: it does no damage to medium or heavy armor and only little to standard armor. The armor of the fighter is low as well.

It is often used to 'strip down' shields of vessels to prepare the boarding operations or make artillery support more efficient. 

[i]The nickname the operator crews use for this vessel internally is a lot more .. colloquial.[/i]
Chinese (simplified): 基于偷窃/缴获的贸易商公会等离子战斗机底盘。它配备了电磁脉冲武器，该武器是根据齐拉克斯帝国为其太空战斗机开发的一个被盗（已停产）的原型概念设计的。它对护盾的影响仅略低于极星，但射速却有所提高，这使它对依赖护盾的舰船更加危险。原型概念的缺点是：它对中型或重型装甲没有伤害，对标准装甲的伤害也很小。它经常与其他战斗机结合使用，以 '剥下 '船只的护盾，为登船行动做准备，或使炮火支援更有效率。\n[i][/i]操作人员在内部给这种飞船起的绰号（'脱衣舞娘'）要更......口语化一些。

English: The Rocket Ferry is a combination of a stolen/captured chassis of the Polaris Fighter, stuffed with self-guided long range swarm rockets of unknown origin. It can deal a lot of damage, also to standard shields, but it moves only at an average speed, although due to its long range weapon, it can attack from quite a distance.\n\nIt is often used together with the Stripper.
Chinese (simplified): 火箭渡轮是偷来的/捕获的极星战斗机底盘的组合，装满了来源不明的自导远程群集火箭。它可以造成大量伤害，即使是标准护盾也不例外，但它的移动速度只是平均水平，尽管由于其远程武器，它可以从相当远的距离进行攻击。\n\n它通常与剥离器一起使用。

English: The pirate clans have developed a few own models for fighters and drones, often based on stolen chassis, equipped with weapons of unknown origin, but it is also possible to run into drones, fighters and even small and large vessels that the pirate clans have captured from other factions. \n\nBesides the taunting element and using them simply for their often greatly superior firepower, compared to the corvettes and frigates the Pirate Clans are using, it has become a habit to use these ships to either set up ambushes or fooling the patrol ships for an easy escape after a heist.
Chinese (simplified): 海盗部族已经开发出了一些自己的战斗机和无人机模型，这些模型通常基于偷来的底盘，装备的武器来历不明，但也有可能遇到无人机、战斗机，甚至海盗部族从其他派系缴获的小型和大型船只。\n与海盗部族使用的典型轻型护卫舰和护卫舰相比，这些船只的火力往往更强，除了嘲弄元素和使用这些船只外，使用这些船只设伏或愚弄巡逻船以便在抢劫后轻松逃脱也已成为一种习惯。

English:
Colonists vessels are usually registered to the companies, but also to individuals, families, prospectors, managers, militia groups, local tycoons...or warlords.

There are few real combat ships, although there have been reports of some companies and militia groups have build up small fleets, supporting the colonists, the DESC or their own cause. 

Most of the colonist vessels are (armed) freighters of different size, kind .. and age.

Freighters, drones, fighters and combat ships are sometimes licensed builds or (in rare cases) purchased directly from the Polaris Megacorp or the Traders Guild. Mostly second-hand or discontinued versions.
Chinese (simplified):
殖民者飞船通常注册在公司名下，但也可能是个人、家庭、勘探者、经理、民兵组织、地方大亨……或军阀。

真正的战斗舰只很少，尽管有报告称一些公司和民兵组织正在建立小型舰队，支持殖民者、DESC或他们自己的原因。

大多数殖民者飞船是不同大小、类型和年龄的（武装）货船。

货船、无人机、战斗机和战斗舰有时是获得许可的建造，或（在少数情况下）直接从极星超级企业或贸易协会购买——主要是二手或已停产的版本。

English: The most popular long range transporter. Comes in different colors and variants.
Chinese (simplified): 最受欢迎的远程运输船。有不同的颜色和变体。

English: Heavily militarized groups or factions which are fighting for their own, often unknown goals. If you do not belong to them, you are considered hostile - at all times.
Chinese (simplified): 高度军事化的团体或派系，他们为自己的目标而战，通常目标不明。如果你不属于他们，你在任何时候都会被视为敌对者。

English: The Legacy SEEKER drones are used on planets and in space. They are equipped with an antiproton beam, which deals a lot of damage to even strong shields and melts into the hardest armor like a hot knife in butter.\n\nIt is said, that in the War of Silence, the appearance of a single SEEKER drone at the outskirts of a solar system gave everyone only a few minutes to either escape or prepare for a likely to be lost LEGACY assault.
Chinese (simplified): 遗留者SEKER无人机在行星和太空中使用。它们装备了反质子束，即使是强大的护盾也能造成大量伤害，像热刀切黄油一样融化最硬的装甲。\n据说，在沉默战争中，一个SEKER无人机出现在太阳系边缘，让每个人都有几分钟时间选择逃跑或准备迎接一场可能失败的遗留者攻击。

English:
During the War of Silence, the Infector was the Legacy's vanguard in every direct engagement. Acting as both warship and frontline base for the spread of the Legacy onto protectorate planets the Infectors could cut a swathe through frigates and destroyers defending a planet before dropping from orbit like a meteorite onto densely populated areas.
Once landed, the Infectors would extend tendrils into the ground and begin spreading both viral and mutagenic compounds into the environment to modify those left injured, dying or dead from the impact.

Hundreds of cycles since the war, the scars and effects left by the Infectors can still be seen and in many cases have become a source of raw materials and rare isotopes used in everything from medicine and weapons to warp drive components and fuel. These irradiated zones still produce mutated creatures born from the Legacy Virus, but without the connection or intelligence that made them the efficient killing machines they were.

The Infector, or "Nautilus" consists of a segmented circular shell of significant strength and thickness that protects the equally rigid mechanics of the interior. The shell's thickness is required for the entity to survive the impact from orbit which many still failed to do after being damaged by defending ships.
While the body of the entity possesses no defensive armaments, a pair of defense rings float an exact distance from the eye of the nautilus' shell providing a full sphere of coverage with powerful Anti-Proton beam emitters.

Attack Value: 
Defense Value: 

Weapon Type: Anti-Proton beam
Shield:
Drones:
Chinese (simplified):
在沉默战争期间，感染者是遗留者在每次直接交战中的先锋。它们既是战舰，也是遗留者向保护国行星扩散的前线基地，感染者会在行星轨道上像流星一样降落，穿透护卫舰和驱逐舰的防御，然后降落在人口密集的地区。

一旦着陆，感染者会向地面伸出触须，开始将病毒和突变化合物散布到环境中，以改变那些因撞击而受伤、垂死或死亡的生物。

自战争以来数百个周期，感染者留下的痕迹和影响仍然可见，在许多情况下，它们已成为从医学和武器到翘曲引擎组件和燃料中使用的原始材料和稀有同位素的来源。这些辐射区域仍然产生由遗产病毒产生的突变生物，但它们并没有连接或智能，使它们成为曾经高效杀戮机器。

感染者，或称为“鹦鹉螺”，由具有显著强度和厚度的分段圆形外壳组成，保护着同样坚固的内部机械。外壳的厚度是为了使实体能够从轨道上撞击后生存下来，尽管许多在被防御舰只损坏后仍然失败了。

虽然实体的主体没有防御武器，但一对防御环以精确的距离从鹦鹉螺壳的眼着漂浮，提供全面球面覆盖，配有强大的反质子光束发射器。

武器类型：反质子光束

English:
The natural evolution of the Infector-class legacy biocraft. The Decimator is the unfurled shell state with enhanced armaments and a chambered carapace. Evolution of traits borne to counteract the armor-piercing weapons of the zirax during the War of Silence.
Despite losing the ability to drop from orbit as Infectors do, (the effects of this event with a Decimator-class ship resulted in the entity breaking up on impact with the ground. With the entity damaged beyond recovery 60% of the time.) they were typically found as a rear guard for the Infectors in planetary assaults or as protection for Hiveships.
An Infector-class biocraft that has successfully landed and absorbed natural materials, will in many cases transition into a Decimator, rise into orbit and assume the task of supporting invasion with new infectors on another location. Had the War of Silence dragged on longer, the number of Decimators found on the battlefield would've eventually surpassed the zirax fleet in number.

感染者级遗留生物飞船的自然进化。毁灭者是展开的外壳状态，配备了增强的武器和分室的甲壳。在沉默战争中，为了对抗兹瑞克斯的穿甲武器，这些特征的进化应运而生。
尽管失去了像感染者那样从轨道上降落的能力（这种事件对毁灭者级飞船的影响是在撞击地面时实体解体。大多数时候，实体损坏到无法恢复的程度。），它们通常作为行星攻击中感染者的后卫，或作为蜂巢船的保护。
一个成功着陆并吸收了自然材料的感染者级生物飞船，在许多情况下会转变为毁灭者，升入轨道，并承担在另一个位置支持入侵的新感染者的任务。如果沉默战争持续时间更长，战场上发现的毁灭者数量最终将超过兹瑞克斯舰队的数量。

They are using an advanced railgun projectile that can deal a high amount of energy damage to shields and kinetic damage to heavy armor from a high distance with a high rate of fire. The drones move fast and have a high maneuverability. The armor is medium to low, but these drones are often deployed in swarms!

English:
Vessels and stations that are either privately held or belong to independent companies often have running contracts with the big factions, like Zirax Empire, Kriel Empire, Traders Guild and Polaris Megacorp as well as the Colonists and DESC. Smugglers handling stuff for the Pirate Clans or everyone who can pay them, can be found as well.

In this case, the vessels, escorting drones and stations listed below will have their faction color and tags set to the company, faction or individual they are running a business for.

How they behave towards you is based on your reputation to the faction, company or individual they are currently working for.

Note on escorting DRONES: Due to the fact the freighters are often hired by factions and companies, the escorting drones might be of a different kind than the drones usually used by the hiring faction/company. This depends on the expenses the owner of the freighter has made or drones that he could acquire or was given.
Chinese (simplified):
私人拥有或属于独立公司的船只和空间站通常与大派系有着运行中的合同，比如兹瑞克斯帝国、克里尔帝国、贸易协会、极星超级企业以及殖民者和DESC。为海盗氏族（或任何能支付他们的人）处理事务的走私者也可以在这里找到。

在这种情况下，下面列出的船只、护航无人机和空间站将它们的派系颜色和标签设置为它们正在做生意的公司、派系或个人。

它们对您的行为是基于您与赞助派系、公司或个人的声誉。

关于护航无人机的注释：由于货船经常被派系和公司雇佣，护航无人机可能与雇佣派系/公司通常使用的无人机在设计或标记上有所不同。这取决于货船所有者已经花费的费用、他能够获得的无人机或他被给予的无人机。

English:
Although it wasn't fully equipped for combat at the time of its destruction, the schematics for the TITAN ship class exist in every UCH Engineer's personal database to aid repairs to these vessels, where the UCH 003 GRANT is the last one to be known operational. 

Constructed by Forge Aerospace's Anvil, the UCH 002 TITAN class ships were designated UCH fleet flagships, capable of housing almost 200 crew and multiple crafts, with advanced weaponry - compared to the technical level of the other terran vessels based in the solar system. The GRAND has been upgraded with more powerful tech found and acquired in Andromeda, though.

Despite the size of the ship, it remains a highly maneuverable heavy cruiser with enough computing power capable to handle a much larger array of additional armaments beyond standard at designated hardpoints all over the ship.

尽管在毁灭时它并未完全装备用于战斗，但每个UCH工程师的个人数据库中都存在TITAN级飞船的图纸，以帮助修复这些飞船，其中UCH 003 GRANT是已知最后一艘运作的。

由Forge Aerospace的Anvil建造的UCH 002 TITAN级飞船被指定为UCH舰队的旗舰，能够容纳近200名船员和多艘飞船，配备先进的武器——与太阳系内其他地球飞船的技术水平相比。然而，GRAND已经用在仙女座发现和获取的更强大的技术进行了升级。

尽管飞船体积庞大，它仍然是一艘高度机动的重型巡洋舰，拥有足够的计算能力，能够处理船上指定硬点上的标准之外更多的额外武器阵列。

Chinese (simplified): 兵员运输机从当地的无人机基地运送部队，并将他们投放到有争议的空间站或在基地受到攻击时投放到敌对结构上。\n\n运输机移动缓慢，没有武装，但装甲坚固。

- Attack and Defense values for Combat

Chinese (simplified):
有四个值
- 战斗的攻击和防御值
- 步兵的攻击和防御值

值来自以下方块和设备组，标记有以下参数：

English:
1.  Action leads to reaction. Killing or looting and other actions now come at a cost or with a reward of REPUTATION POINTS
2. NPC Factions have TERRITORIES. Performing the aforementioned Actions inside or outside the territory might show different results
3. You can make friends, but due to the RIVALRY of faction, you might make enemies at the same time

Technical notes:
- The NPC Factions do not grow their territories.

Creators info
