- It is possible to set the game-start standing vs. NPC Factions individually for the Player-Origins in the DefReputation.ecf ! This means: THAT will be the standing a player of THIS origin will start with. It does not mean that all players of this origin contribute to a common standing vs. NPC factions!
Chinese (simplified):
1. 行动会导致反应。杀戮、抢劫和其他行动会以声望点数的成本或奖励出现。
2. NPC派系拥有领土。在这些领土内外执行某些行动可能会有不同的结果。
3. 你可以交朋友，但由于各种派系的竞争，你可能同时也会树敌。

技术说明：
- NPC派系不会扩展他们的领土。

创作者信息：
- 在DefReputation.ecf文件中，可以为玩家起源独立设置游戏开始时与NPC派系的关系！这意味着：这是这个起源的玩家将会开始的关系。这并不意味着所有这个起源的玩家对NPC派系的关系有共同的贡献！
不可破坏的方块、设备和结构

English:
There are two variants:

1. Default Core: armored blocks
Handheld weapons often cannot damage or even destroy blocks of Capital Vessels and Bases. A notification on the top center will inform you about that.

2. Admin Core
Some bases, mostly POIs might use an "admin core". When you look at the map, this is indicated by a 'chevron' icon instead of the rounded one.
 Admin cores make all blocks and devices indestructible for any weapon EXCEPT those that have been set to be "destroyable" by the creator of the POI. 

 There is one important premise for the default game: In case an admin-core station can shoot at you, turrets and relevant devices can always be destroyed. A station with an admin core which does NOT shoot at you (and which is NOT a Trading Station), is either a Dungeon or a Story-relevant POI.  But: Most of the time there is still a method for the core to be destroyed by the player. For example a lever or a puzzle or a riddle that will blast the core when solved. Without  a core, all the blocks and devices are destructible again!
Chinese (simplified):
有两种变体：

1. 默认核心：装甲方块
手持武器通常无法损坏或甚至摧毁主力舰和基地的方块。顶部中心的通知将告知你这一点。

2. 管理员核心
一些基地，大多数POI可能使用“管理员核心”。当你查看地图时，这由一个'chevron'图标而不是圆形图标表示。
管理员核心使所有方块和设备对任何武器不可摧毁，除了那些被POI创建者设置为“可摧毁”的。

默认游戏有一个重要的前提：如果一个管理员核心站可以向你射击，炮塔和相关设备总是可以被摧毁的。一个不向你射击的管理员核心站（并且不是一个贸易站），要么是一个地牢，要么是一个与故事相关的POI。但是：大多数时候，仍然有一种方法可以让玩家摧毁核心。例如一个杠杆或一个谜题或一个谜语，当解决时会炸毁核心。没有核心，所有的方块和设备再次可摧毁！

English:
NPC vessels can be found on planets and in space. 

- Planetary Patrol vessels are armed and armored sector patrols. 
- Freighters are orbital vessels transporting goods and resources. They are armed and armored as well!
- Orbital Patrol vessels are combat vessels for sector control. There are light OPVs but also battleships and cruisers.
- Space Base Defense reinforcements are OPVs that are called for help in case you attack an orbital base.

[i]For more detail and info, please, in the list on the left, click and open this chapters sub-headlines by [c][80ffff]clicking on their headline[-][/c] and/or by clicking the [c][80ffff]arrow-buttons [-][/c]next to them.[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
NPC飞船可以在星球上和太空中找到。
- 行星巡逻舰是武装和装甲的星区巡逻舰。
- 货船是运输货物和资源的轨道飞船。它们也是武装和装甲的！
- 轨道巡逻舰是用于星区控制的战斗舰。有轻型OPV以及战列舰和巡洋舰。
- 太空基地防御增援是当你攻击轨道基地时请求支援的OPV。

[i]要获取更多详细信息，请在左侧列表中，点击并打开本章节的小标题[c][80ffff]点击它们的标题[-][/c]和/或点击它们旁边的[c][80ffff]箭头按钮[-][/c]。[/i]

English:
Q: What do I need to do to stop the vessel?
A: Destroy the Thrusters

Q: Will this set off an automated despawn timer?
A: Yes, it will start exploding as soon as it touches ground. Afterwards it will stay there for 6 minutes, then despawn.  

Q: Can I board and loot (the containers of) the vessel?
A: No.

Q: Can I salvage/multitool the vessel when I stopped it?
A: Yes. For 6 minutes.

Q: Can I control / capture / use the vessel
A: Currently not.

Q: Is there a way to modify the parameters like despawn, respawn etc?
A: Check ...\Empyrion - Galactic Survival\Content\Playfields\+ExamplePlanet\playfield_static.yaml
A. You cannot stop the vessel from despawning/modifying the timer yet.
Chinese (simplified):
Q: 我需要做什么才能停止这艘船？
A: 摧毁推进器。

Q: 这会触发自动消失计时器吗？
A: 是的，一旦它接触到地面就会开始爆炸。之后，它会在那里停留6分钟，然后消失。

Q: 我能登上并搜刮（船上的容器）吗？
A: 不能。

Q: 我一旦停止它，能打捞/多功能工具处理这艘船吗？
A: 可以。时间为6分钟。

Q: 我能控制/捕获/使用这艘船吗？
A: 目前不行。

Q: 有没有办法修改参数，比如消失、重生等？
A: 检查 ...\Empyrion - Galactic Survival\Content\Playfields\+ExamplePlanet\playfield_static.yaml
A. 你目前还不能阻止船只消失/修改计时器。

English: Flying, Flight model and Pilot info
Chinese (simplified): 飞行、飞行模型和飞行员信息

English:
When in range of a station which has the station services enabled, open the control panel of your vessel (P) and find the new tab 'Station Services'. 

You can buy and refill fuel, ammo and pentaxid, as well as repair your ship (repair-2-template!) and quick-load your shield - in case you have the required credits on your bank account! 

[i]Creators Information: The availability of station services (and which services are offered) can be set individually for an orbital or planetary POI in the playfield_static.yaml PROPERTIES entry. The pricing is taken from a new parameter, set in the ItemsConfig.ecf. This base pricing can then be further modified by factors in the playfield_static.yaml file.[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
当处于启用了站服务的站的范围内时，打开你的飞船的控制面板（P），找到新的'站点服务'标签。

你可以购买和补充燃料、弹药和翘曲水晶，以及修理你的飞船（修理-2-模板！）和快速装载你的护盾 - 如果你的银行账户上有所需的信用点！
[i]创造者信息：站服务的可用性（以及提供哪些服务）可以在playfield_static.yaml PROPERTIES条目中为轨道或行星POI单独设置。定价来自ItemsConfig.ecf中的一个新参数。这个基础定价然后可以通过playfield_static.yaml文件中的因素进一步修改。[/i]

English:
Attacked POIs will call for reinforcements; Reinforcements do not always appear, depending on several factors, eg. playfield level.

A message will appear that informs you when the reinforcements will appear. In case you destroy all the reinforcements, another message will inform you about your victory!

[u]Creators Information:[/u]
The SBD is configured in the FactionWarfare.ecf in the /Content/Configuration game folder.
[u][/u]
There is also an override syntax to  manage the SBD per POI.  Add the following entry to the POI in the space_dynamic.yaml:

SpaceDefenseOverrideDefaults: True
SpaceDefenseProbability: 0
SpaceDefensePriceMinMax: [ 30, 60 ]

Note: Only SpaceDefenseOverrideDefaults is a setting that is mandatory in case you want to handle an individual POI different than laid down in the factionwarfare config. You do NOT need to set SpaceDefenseOverrideDefaults to FALSE, as FALSE is the same as if the parameter was not set ( = FactionWarfare is used )
Chinese (simplified):
被攻击的POI会呼叫增援；增援并不总是出现，这取决于几个因素，例如战场等级。

当增援出现时，会有一个消息通知你。如果你摧毁了所有增援，另一个消息会通知你胜利！

[u]创造者信息：[/u]SBD在/Content/Configuration游戏文件夹中的FactionWarfare.ecf中配置。
[u] [/u]
还有一个覆盖语法来管理每个POI的SBD。在space_dynamic.yaml中的POI添加以下条目：

SpaceDefenseOverrideDefaults: True
SpaceDefenseProbability: 0
SpaceDefensePriceMinMax: [ 30, 60 ]

注意：只有SpaceDefenseOverrideDefaults是一个强制性设置，如果你想处理一个与派系战争配置中规定的不同的个别POI。你不需要将SpaceDefenseOverrideDefaults设置为FALSE，因为FALSE与未设置该参数相同（=使用派系战争）。

English: The Proximity Log is a feature of the REGISTRY for your OWN structures: Open the Registry, find a structure and click on the 'Proximity Log' button on the lower right.\n\nThe PL will show data about other players passing by or approaching the selected structure.
Chinese (simplified): 接近日志是注册表的一个特性，用于记录你自己的结构：打开注册表，找到一个结构，然后点击右下角的“接近日志”按钮。\n\nPL将显示其他玩家路过或接近所选结构的数据。

English: The Scoreboard is available by pressing the button B.\n\nIt will show and rank players based on many different gameplay elements.
Chinese (simplified): 得分板可通过按下B键来调出。\n\n它会根据许多不同的游戏玩法元素来显示和排名玩家。

English:
The games FLIGHT MODEL includes the following features:

  - 1. Virtual Drag (physics) influencing the vessel top speed
  - 2. Aerodynamic Lift  (physics)
  - 3. Thrusters generating Torque (Roll, Pitch, Yaw), based on their placement (game tech)
  - 4. Boost-capability for Thrusters  
  - 5. Technical max speed  

The following chapters mostly apply to Small Vessels and Capital Vessels, but also merely for Hover Vessels!
[i][/i]
[i]For more detail and info, please, in the list on the left, click and open this chapters sub-headlines by [c][80ffff]clicking on their headline[-][/c] and/or by clicking the [c][80ffff]arrow-buttons [-][/c]next to them.[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
游戏的飞行模型包含以下特性：

- 1. 虚拟阻力（物理）影响飞船的最高速度
- 2. 空气动力学升力（物理）
- 3. 推进器产生的扭矩（翻滚、俯仰、偏航），基于它们的放置位置（游戏技术）
- 4. 推进器的增压能力
- 5. 技术最高速度

以下章节主要适用于小型飞船和主力舰，也适用于悬浮飞船！

[i]要获取更多细节和信息，请在左侧列表中，通过[c][80ffff]点击他们的标题[-][/c]或者点击它们旁边的[c][80ffff]箭头按钮[-][/c]来打开本章节的小标题。[/i]

English:
You can dock ANY vessel to ANY other vessel in no required order. 

[u]Examples:[/u]

  - HV<>HV
  - SV<>SV
  - CV<>CV
  - HV<>SV
  - SV<>CV
  - HV<>CV

[u]RULES:[/u]
1. no docking of vessels that have already vessels docked
  2. turrets, shields and weapons do not work when docked
  3. passengers can not stay seated in a docked vessel

[u]How is the carrier and the docking ship defined?[/u]
The docking ship is ALWAYS the ship that docks to another ship. The other ship will automatically become the "carrier". 

F.ex. docking a CV on top of a HV, makes the HV the carrier. Question only is, if the HV can tow that load. 

[u]Special Info about HVs use in SPACE[/u]
When you undock a HV in space, the HV can  move in ALL directions, but only with a limited speed of 3m/s but also WITHOUT requiring any thrusters!

[u]Docked mass/weight:[/u]
  - Weight and mass of a docked vessel will contribute to the carrier mass!

[u]Shields[/u]
  - Shields on the carrier do NOT protect the docked vessel ( The Hull Polarization is only active for the vessel with the shield device)

[u]Pilot required[/u]
  - A vessel will always only dock, when there is a pilot seated inside! ( If you drop a BP onto a BA or CV, this will NOT dock automatically!)

Movement Blocked
In case you are trying to fly a vessel which has other vessels undocked inside or very close, the movement will be blocked/slowed down.
Chinese (simplified):
你可以将任何飞船对接至任何其他飞船，无需特定顺序。

[u]示例：[/u]
  - HV<>HV
  - SV<>SV
  - CV<>CV
  - HV<>SV
  - SV<>CV
  - HV<>CV

[u]规则：[/u]
1. 不允许对接已经对接了其他飞船的飞船
  2. 对接时，炮塔、护盾和武器不会工作
  3. 乘客不能在对接的飞船内就座

[u]如何定义载体和对接船？[/u]
对接船总是对接至另一艘飞船的船。另一艘飞船将自动成为“载体”。

例如，将CV对接在HV上方，使HV成为载体。问题只是，HV是否能拖动那个负载。

[u]关于在太空中使用HV的特殊信息[/u]
当你在太空中解除对接HV时，HV可以向所有方向移动，但速度限制为3m/s，而且不需要任何推进器！

[u]对接质量/重量：[/u]
  - 对接飞船的重量和质量将贡献给载体质量！

[u]护盾：[/u]
  - 载体上的护盾不会保护对接的飞船（船体极化只对带有护盾设备的飞船有效）

[u]需要飞行员：[/u]
  - 只有当有飞行员坐在里面时，飞船才会对接！（如果你将BP放到BA或CV上，这不会自动识别对接！）

移动受阻
如果你试图驾驶一艘内部或非常靠近有其他飞船未对接的飞船，移动将被阻止/减慢。

English:
With Repair-2-Template it is possible to fix up a vessel (Repair Blocks) and having lost blocks being placed back where they belong to (Repair-2-Template). This does cost ressources.

Available for:  Base, Capital Vessel

Devices needed:
- Repair Bay (Dock) T1 or T2
- Repair Console (Access)
 [u]
How does it work?[/u]
1. Go to the CONTROL PANEL of your vessel
2. On the main page on the LOWER LEFT click the button "Save Repair Template"
3. Have a base with both Repair-2-Template devices
4. When your vessel has lost blocks in a battle, move it on the Repair Bay T2
5. Go to the Repair Console and access with F (default button)
> You should now see your vessel INFO and a RESOURCES / TIME requirement
6. Set your repair mode (Repair damaged blocks only or Repair-2-Template
7. Add the required materials to the intake below
8. Hit the button "START REPAIR"

[u]GLOBAL INFO[/u]
- Repair Blocks costs resources: 200 Hitpoints = 1 Iron Ingot
- Repair bays drops 60% of its content when destroyed, and keeps 100% of its content when upgraded
- You cannot drop in more materials when repair is in progress
- When the REPAIR-shield is hit by weapon fire, this will damage the REPAIR BAY!
- The repair area needs to have sufficient space for the Bounding Box of your vessel to fit in. All obstacles need to be removed (like blocks ranging inside the virtual "bounding box")
- The Repair beam has a range of 8m.  
- You do NOT need a platform to park a large vessel for repair BUT if the vessel is not parked ABOVE the virtual "ground layer" of the "repair area", eg tilted a bit so that parts of it might be below that line, Repair will not start.
- You can CODE-lock templates when saving them. You need that code when R2T
[u][/u]
[u]QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS[/u]
Q: Can I withdraw any ingots from the system?
A: No, but stored ingots will drop out when the Repair Bay  is removed, although only 60% (If you upgrade the Repair Bay, its content is 100% kept)
A: You can always remove and replace the Repair Console.

Q: Do i need to use the REPAIR BLOCKS button when I used REPAIR-2-TEMPLATE before?
A: Yes, R2T does not fix up damaged blocks. 

Q: Can I add more than one Repair-2-Template system per base?
A: No.

Q: Do I need a Repair Console just for using the "damage removal" (Repair Blocks) function of Repair Bay?
A: Yes.
Chinese (simplified):
使用Repair-2-Template，可以修复飞船（修复方块）并将丢失的方块放回它们所属的位置（Repair-2-Template）。这需要消耗资源。

适用于：基地，主力舰

所需设备：
- 修理湾（船坞）T1或T2
- 修理控制台（访问）
 [u]它是如何工作的？[/u]
1. 进入你的飞船的控制面板
2. 在主页面的左下角点击“保存修理模板”按钮
3. 拥有一个基地，配备两个Repair-2-Template设备
4. 当你的飞船在战斗中丢失方块时，将其移至修理湾T2
5. 通过F（默认按钮）访问修理控制台
> 你现在应该可以看到你的飞船信息和资源/时间需求
6. 设置你的修理模式（仅修复损坏的方块或Repair-2-Template
7. 将所需材料添加到下方的进料口
8. 点击“开始修理”按钮

[u]全局信息[/u]
- 修复方块消耗资源：200生命值 = 1铁锭
- 修理湾在被摧毁时会丢失60%的内容，并且在升级时会保留100%的内容
- 修理过程中不能投入更多材料
- 当修理盾牌被武器火力击中时，这会损坏修理湾！
- 修理区域需要有足够的空间来容纳你的飞船的边界框。需要移除所有障碍物（如在虚拟“边界框”内的方块）
- 修理光束的射程为8米。
- 你不需要一个平台来停放大型飞船进行修理，但是如果飞船没有停在“修理区域”的虚拟“地面层”上方，例如有点倾斜，以至于部分在该线下方，修理将不会开始。
- 你可以在保存模板时进行CODE-lock。当你进行R2T时需要那个代码
[u][/u]
[u]问题和答案[/u]
Q: 我可以从系统中提取任何锭吗？
A: 不，但是当修理湾被移除时，存储的锭会掉落出来，尽管只有60%（如果你升级了修理湾，其内容会100%保留）
A: 你可以随时移除并更换修理控制台。

Q: 我之前使用了REPAIR-2-TEMPLATE，现在需要使用REPAIR BLOCKS按钮吗？
A: 是的，R2T不会修复损坏的方块。

Q: 我可以在每个基地添加多个Repair-2-Template系统吗？
A: 不。

Q: 我是否只需要一个修理控制台来使用修理湾的“损伤移除”（修理方块）功能？
A: 是的。

English:
The technical (game-limited) MAX SPEED are:  ( planet / space  in m/s  )

  -   Hover Vessel: 50 / 3
  -   Small Vessel: 70 / 200
  -   Capital Vessel: 60 / 150

The TOP SPEED per vessel is a result of the FLIGHT MODEL. It can only be as high as the TECHNICAL max speed. See that entry for more details.
Chinese (simplified):
技术上（游戏限制）的最大速度是： (planet/space in m/s )

 - Hover Vessel: 60 / 3
 - Small Vessel: 80 / 160
 - Capital Vessel: 70 / 120

 每艘船的最高速度是飞行模式的结果。它只能与技术最高速度一样高。更多详情请参见该条目。

English:
Technical max speed = relates to rendering, collision and other game parameters. This is the absolute max speed that you cannot go over by any  means (if you can, it is possibly not intentional and a bug 

TECHNICAL max speed should not be confused with the TOP SPEED of your vessel. The latter can be much lower than the technical max speed. See chapter about VIRTUAL DRAG in the FLIGHT MODEL entry for more info.

[i]Note: The given values for the technical max speeds are those that "work" with the game and create the least of issues. [/i]
Chinese (simplified):
技术最大速度与渲染、碰撞和其他游戏参数有关。这是你无论如何都不能超过的绝对最大速度（如果你能超过，很可能不是故意的，而是一个bug！）

技术最大速度不应与飞船的[最高速度]混淆。根据飞船类别，最高速度可能远低于技术最大速度。有关更多信息，请参见飞行模型条目中的[虚拟阻力]章节。

[i]注：给出的技术最大速度值是那些与游戏“兼容”并造成最少问题的速度。[/i]

English:
Most of the thrusters now offer the capability to BOOST the ship speed for a short amount of time.

[u]Keycombo[/u]
LeftSHIFT + Directional Key 
(For example SHIFT+W, +A, +S, +D )

The BOOSTERS will fire,  as LONG as you keep the key kombo pressed OR until the boost is consumed. Then it will take a while to load up again.

Boosting does not consume extra fuel or energy at the moment and it is also not visible by an extra effect on the thrusters, yet.
Chinese (simplified):
大多数推进器现在提供了短时间内增加加速的能力。

[u]按键组合[/u]
左SHIFT键 + 方向键
（例如SHIFT+W，+A，+S，+D）

只要你保持按键组合被按下，或者直到加速能量耗尽，BOOSTERS就会持续喷射。然后它需要一段时间来重新装载。

目前，加速不会消耗额外的燃料或能量，而且在推进器上还没有作为视觉特效显示。

English: The HUD is showing the load status with a circle below the MOVEMENT element on the right side of the HUD (see screenshot in the 1st post of this thread or in the HUD info  thread! \n\nThe BOOST will load up only when the vessel or the thrusters are On/powered.
Chinese (simplified): HUD在HUD右侧MOVEMENT元素下方的圆圈中显示负载状态（见本主题第一篇帖子或HUD信息帖子中的截图！\n\n只有在飞船或推进器开启/供电时，推进加速才会加载。

English: The boost is available in ANY direction for which a boost-capable thruster is available. Said that, BOOST is not an "afterburner" tech, only accelerating the ship forward, but BOOST can also be used to the side,up or down or even for backward, for example to come to a full stop faster. Given a boost-capable thruster is available for this direction, of course!
Chinese (simplified): 推进加速可以在任何有推进加速能力的推进器可用的方向上使用。也就是说，推进加速不是“加力燃烧室”技术，只加速飞船向前，但推进加速也可以用来向侧面、向上或向下，甚至向后，例如更快地完全停止。当然，前提是这个方向上有推进加速能力的推进器可用！
技术：最大/最高速度限制

English:
- The Boost will NOT bring you above the technical max speed or the top speed of the vessel (see explanation of VIRTUAL DRAG further below), but BOOST-ACCELERATE your vessel  towards the TOP SPEED of your vessel. Using Boost while you are already at TOP SPEED is only wasting your boost
  - 
  - Boost, technically spoken, is a multiplier to the actual THRUST value of the thruster.
Chinese (simplified):
- 推进加速不会使你超过技术最大速度或飞船的顶速（见下文的VIRTUAL DRAG解释），但会推进加速你的飞船向飞船的顶速。在已经达到顶速时使用推进加速只会浪费你的推进加速
  - 
  - 从技术上讲，推进加速是推进器实际推力值的乘数。

English: There are two possibilities to generate torque for a vessel\n1. RCS devices (fixed output independent of placement)\n2. Thrusters generate torque based on their position on the vessel and their thrust direction.
Chinese (simplified): 有两种方法可以为飞船产生扭矩\n1. RCS设备（固定输出，与放置位置无关）\n2. 推进器根据其在飞船上的位置和推进方向产生扭矩。

English:
Other than for RCS devices, the calculation of thruster-torque depends on a lot of factors ( inertia tensor of the ship, the positions and orientations of all the thrusters of the ship compared its the center of mass,..etc) BUT information about what amount of torque is contributed by RCS and/or Thrusters is available in the STATISTIC tab of the control panel.

[u]Important NOTE: [/u]The thrust-torque always generates in relation to the planes created by the different axis spread from the CENTER OF MASS, not anything else! 

[u]What means: [/u]Thrusters generate rotation around the two axes perpendicular to the thruster direction, with a strength proportional to the thrusters' distance from the center of mass. Ships always rotate around their center of mass.

[u]Example: [/u]
If your thrusters you use to produce a Yaw are not exactly in the horizontal plane containing the center of mass, then this will generate mostly a Yaw but also some small Pitch and some Small Roll. If the ship is not able to cancel those other unwanted rotations (here Pitch and Roll) with some other thrusters it will cancel the rotation and not turn.
Chinese (simplified):
除了RCS设备外，推进器扭矩的计算取决于许多因素（飞船的惯性张量，所有推进器相对于其质心的位置和方向，等等），但是关于RCS和/或推进器贡献了多少扭矩的信息可以在控制面板的STATISTIC标签中找到。

[u]重要注意事项：[/u]推进扭矩总是相对于由质心扩散的不同轴平面生成的，而不是其他任何东西！

[u]这意味着：[/u]推进器在与推进器方向垂直的两个轴周围产生旋转，其强度与推进器距离质心的距离成比例。飞船总是在其质心周围旋转。

[u]示例：[/u]
如果你用来产生偏航的推进器不完全在包含质心的水平平面内，那么这将主要产生偏航，但也会有些小的俯仰和滚转。如果飞船不能用其他推进器取消这些不需要的旋转（这里是俯仰和滚转），它将不会转动。

English:
Aerodynamics can be used to build plane-style vessels that work in atmospheres with only a back-facing thruster (and a forward facing for braking!)

[u]The mechanic is pretty straight forward:[/u]
As long as the ground-facing surface of your vessel is large/big enough, it might create enough uplift to allow your vessel to be leveled with the horizon and NOT drop to the grown as you are moving forward fast enough. (This is NOT a full real-world simulation of course!)

If you vessel is heavy and you are going too slow and the shape is not really optimal (although you will not need a wing-only style vessel to make this work!!) you will not achieve the same performance and possibly drop to the ground.
Chinese (simplified):
空气动力学可以用来建造飞机风格的飞船，这些飞船在只有背向推进器（以及用于制动的前向推进器！）的大气中工作。

[u]这个机制相当直接：[/u]
只要你的飞船面向地面的表面积足够大，它就可能产生足够的升力，使你的飞船与地平线保持水平，而不是在你快速前进时掉到地面上。（当然，这不是一个完整的现实世界模拟！）

如果你的飞船很重，速度太慢，形状不是非常理想（尽管你不需要一个只有机翼风格的飞船来实现这一点！！），你将无法获得相同的性能，可能会掉到地面上。

English:
[u]Tips[/u]
[u][/u]- Spreading out the thruster from the center of mass of the vessel will increase the torque!
  - Depending in which direction the thruster points and where it is placed, it will add its torque to roll, yaw or pitch
  - Unlike the BOOST, torque will be added by ANY thruster (JET and Standard)
- You do NOT need an RCS to roll or pitch or yaw your vessel! (Also saves CPU points)
Chinese (simplified):
[u]提示[/u]
[u] [/u]- 将推进器从飞船的质心分散开来会增加扭矩！
  - 根据推进器指向的方向和放置的位置，它将增加其对滚转、偏航或俯仰的扭矩
  - 与推进加速不同，任何推进器（喷射和标准）都会增加扭矩
- 你不需要RCS来滚转、偏航或俯仰你的飞船！（也节省了CPU点）

English:
The VIRTUAL DRAG, although it will have a lot of impact on the TOP SPEED (not to confuse with the TECHNICAL max speed of the vessel class; see explanation above) of your vessel and depends a lot on how you shape your vessel, is the feature that possibly requires the least of explanations.

The system is very simple and can be put in between these two extremes:

  - If your vessel is build more like an arrow, you might be able to rise the TOP SPEED of your vessel up to the TECHNICAL MAX SPEED of your vessel type just by building and with only few thrusters.
  - If you build a flying brick, the TOP SPEED of your vessel might not even be close to the TECHNICAL MAX SPEED of your vessel type and you might need to reduce mass or increase thrust.
This accounts for ALL movement directions, as well as for roll/yaw/pitch!

Virtual drag takes into account the overall shape of the vessel.

The Virtual Drag values are  visualized on the STATISTIC page or - together with the other flight mechanic values - on a dedicated, new Control Panel tab
Chinese (simplified):
虚拟拖曳，虽然它将对你的飞船的最高速度（不要与飞船类别的技术最大速度混淆；见上面的解释）产生很大影响，并且很大程度上取决于你如何塑造你的飞船，可能是最不需要解释的功能。


这个系统非常简单，可以放在这两个极端之间：

  - 如果你的飞船建造得更像一支箭，你可能会通过建造和只有少数推进器就能将你的飞船的最高速度提高到你的飞船类型的技术最大速度。
  - 如果你建造一个飞行砖块，你的飞船的最高速度可能甚至无法接近你的飞船类型的技术最大速度，你可能需要减少质量或增加推力。
这适用于所有运动方向，以及滚转/偏航/俯仰！

虚拟拖曳考虑了飞船的整体形状。

虚拟拖曳值在STATISTIC页面上可视化，或者与其他飞行机制值一起在专用的新控制面板标签上

English:
[u]Why is it called VIRTUAL DRAG?[/u]
Because it is NOT the physical (aerodynamic) drag alone, but a combination of a lot of factors. The term "VIRTUAL DRAG" is a hand term to describe the methods and factors used to define the TOP SPEED of your vessel (which might not necessarily range up to the technical max speed of the vessel type)!

For example in space the single factor "drag", that you only have in an atmosphere, is of course not present, but other factors like mass and thruster capability are still weighted in.

[u]Why is this also affecting ships in space?[/u]
The VIRTUAL DRAG to some extent compensates for the inevitable technical limitations of the game environment and engine. Also, as we do NOT want Empyrion to be a physics simulation, we cannot fully use real world physics and mechanics, for example thrust power, mass, volumes etc. 

By limiting the technically limit the technical max speed, we have to find a middle ground between technical possibilities and a gameplay that is fun but not too simplified. The VIRTUAL DRAG (As well as other features) add a new challenge in terms of an additional balancing parameter -  which can be overcomed either by building and design or by using CPU Points in terms of investing in thrust or RCS.
Chinese (simplified):
[u]为什么它被称为虚拟拖曳？[/u]
因为它不仅仅是物理（空气动力学）拖曳，而是许多因素的组合。术语“虚拟拖曳”是一个手工术语，用来描述用于定义你飞船的最高速度的方法和因素（这可能不一定达到飞船类型的技术最大速度）！

例如在太空中，你只在大气中拥有的单一因素“拖曳”当然不存在，但其他因素如质量和推进器能力仍然被考虑在内。

[u]这为什么也影响太空中的飞船？[/u]虚拟拖曳在一定程度上补偿了游戏环境和引擎不可避免的技术限制。此外，由于我们不希望Empyrion成为一个物理模拟，我们不能完全使用现实世界的物理和力学，例如推力功率、质量、体积等。

通过限制技术限制技术最大速度，我们必须在技术可能性和有趣但不过于简化的游戏玩法之间找到一个中间地带。虚拟拖曳（以及其他功能）增加了一个额外的平衡参数的挑战——这可以通过建造和设计或使用CPU点数投资推进或RCS来克服。

English:
With the Logistics Network (F4) you can transfer goods and items between your vessels, base and your personal inventory without having to manually approach the containers (or sometimes you don't even need to move your vessel)

Add a WIRELESS CONNECTION device to your bases and vessels to increase the range of the Logistics Network up to about 100m

As long as you are in range of your structures logistic network, you can use ANYTHING from the connected toolbar as you would from your default toolbar.

[c][7c99b3][i]For more detail and info, please, in the list on the left, click and open this chapters sub-headlines by [c][80ffff]clicking on their headline[-][/c] and/or by clicking the [c][80ffff]arrow-buttons [-][/c]next to them.[/i][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
使用物流网络（F4），你可以在不手动接近容器的情况下（有时甚至不需要移动你的飞船）在飞船、基地和个人库存之间转移货物和物品

为你的基地和飞船添加无线连接设备，将物流网络的范围增加到大约100米

只要你在结构物流网络的范围内，你就可以使用连接工具栏中的任何东西，就像你从默认工具栏中使用一样。
[c][7c99b3][i]要了解更多详细信息，请在左侧列表中，点击并打开这些章节的小标题[c][80ffff]点击他们的标题[-][/c]和/或点击它们旁边的[c][80ffff]箭头按钮[-][/c]。[/i][-][/c]

English:
[i]Important: check the HELP button in the device window for any info on how to manage and work with the devices named below!![/i]

There are three basic variants of construction/crafting machines available for vessels and bases
- Constructors (incl. Food Processor)
- Deconstructors
- Furnace

Note: 
- For most of these, you need to assign a Cargo Box or Container for the devices to work! 
- Read the LOGISTICS entry to learn about how to use the Logistics Network to manage and handle large devices or craft/manage your production from remote or between vessels and structures!
[c][7c99b3][-][/c]
[c][7c99b3][i]For more detail and info, please, in the list on the left, click and open this chapters sub-headlines by [c][80ffff]clicking on their headline[-][/c] and/or by clicking the [c][80ffff]arrow-buttons [-][/c]next to them.[/i][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[i]重要：请检查设备窗口中的HELP按钮，了解如何管理和使用以下命名的设备！[/i]

有三种基本类型的建造/制造机器可用于飞船和基地：
- 建造机（包括食品加工机）
- 拆解机
- 熔炉

注意：
- 对于这些设备中的大多数，你需要分配一个货物箱或容器，以便设备工作！
- 阅读LOGISTICS条目，了解如何使用物流网络来管理和处理大型设备，或在飞船和结构之间远程或管理你的生产！

[c][7c99b3][-][/c]
[c][7c99b3][i]要获取更多详细信息，请通过[c][80ffff]点击他们的标题[-][/c]和/或点击它们旁边的[c][80ffff]箭头按钮[-][/c]来点击并打开本章的小标题。[/i][-][/c]
为生产分配和使用容器

English:
Applies to Constructor, Deconstructor, Furnace and Food Processor!

1. Click on the dropdown next to the INPUT on the left of the constructor screen and select a container to connect the production logistics.

2. In order to ADD resources to an INBOX container while you are in the constructor screen, click on the small icon next to the source dropdown to access the Logistics Network! The connected container will be listed with an (A) in front of its name.

Do the same for picking up crafted devices and items from the OUTBOX.

This is required, because you cannot directly grab produced items from the OUTPUT in the Constructor screen and you cannot simply drop items into the INPUT.
Chinese (simplified):
适用于建造机、解构机、熔炉和食品加工机！

1. 点击建造机屏幕左侧输入旁边的下拉菜单，选择一个容器连接到生产物流。

2. 当你在建造机屏幕时，要向收件箱容器添加资源，请点击源下拉菜单旁边的小图标以访问物流网络！连接的容器将在其名称前显示一个（A）。

对于从发货箱中收取制造的设备和物品，也请执行相同的操作。

这是必需的，因为你不能直接从建造机屏幕的输出中直接抓取生产的物品，你也不能简单地将物品放入输入中。

English:
1. You can have different containers for inbox and outbox! The constructor will automatically pick from or move items and devices to the assigned container(s).

2. When you reach a high enough level in the tech tree, you can also craft an Expandable Container System. 
You need to craft one 'Container Controller' (CC) main unit and place it. Then craft 'Container Extenders' (CE) and place them adjacent to the Container Controller to expand this controller's capacity.

3. You can manage ALL of your containers and cargo and even your constructors with the Logistics Network. Step on your base or in range of a Wireless Device and hit F4 to access the network.

4. Filling the Container of a constructor does not require doing this from inside the constructor GUI. You can use the Logistic Menu, find the container you used for Input and/or Output and add or remove items and blocks at any time. You can even for example "mine" into this container while the constructor works on the ingots.

5. As long as you (or someone else) accesses an assigned container or adds something in the same second (e.g mining in ores), the construction process will be halted and resumed.

6. You actually CAN assign the outbox-assigned Container of a Constructor as the INBOX for another constructor and so on!
Chinese (simplified):
1. 你可以为收件箱和发件箱设置不同的容器！建造机会自动从指定的容器中取出或移动物品和设备。

2. 当你在科技树中达到足够高的等级时，你也可以制作一个可扩展的容器系统。
你需要制作一个'容器控制器'（CC）主单元并放置它。然后制作'容器扩展器'（CE）并将它们放置在容器控制器旁边以扩展这个控制器的容量。

3. 你可以使用物流网络管理所有你的容器和货物，甚至你的建造机。站在你的基地或无线设备范围内，按F4访问网络。

4. 填充建造机的容器不需要从建造机GUI内部进行。你可以使用物流菜单，找到你用于输入和/或输出的容器，并随时添加或移除物品和方块。你甚至可以在建造机工作时“挖掘”到这个容器。

5. 只要你（或某人）在同一秒内访问指定的容器或添加东西（例如在矿石中挖掘），建造过程将会暂停并恢复。

6. 你实际上可以将一个建造机的发件箱指定的容器作为另一个建造机的收件箱，依此类推！

English:
You can build Teleporters for Base and Capital Vessels.

Base Teleporters have a range of up to 30 LY
Capital Vessel Teleporters can teleport inside a Sector

- Accessing a teleporter (F) will show you a range of available targets, faction status of the target, distance etc.
- You can teleport to any base you discovered, as long as the faction it owns is at least friendly to you.
- You can teleport to and from your ship, as long as it is not moving.
- You can not teleport from a ship or base that has its shields activated or is under attack. 
- You actually can teleport to a destination where the teleporter is OFF.

Teleporter UI shows all NPC target stations in an 'extended' range (actual range + X) but does not allow teleportation if the targets are out of range of your current teleporter. This should serve as a info about sectors/systems that are only slightly out of reach.

[u]Creators info:[/u] 
  - Only teleporters set to the 'Teleport Network' will allow players to select a target
  - If you do not want that and for POIs you want to assign teleporters to a specific location or no be available to players from the outside, uncheck the Teleport Network in the device. 
  - Syntax for setting a defined teleporter destination:

DeviceName@StructureName:PlayfieldName@SolarSystemName#Origin

Note: This does NOT apply for targets that are instances as they get loaded all the time. 
  Note: This syntax does NOT apply to the teleporters players can build in survival!
Chinese (simplified):
你可以为基地和主力舰建造传送装置。

基地传送装置的传送范围可达30光年，而主力舰传送装置可以在星区内传送。

- 访问传送装置（F键）将显示可用目标的范围、目标的派系状态、距离等信息。
- 你可以传送到你已经发现的任何基地，只要该基地所属的派系至少对你是友好的。
- 你可以在不移动的情况下传送到你的飞船上。
- 如果飞船或基地的护盾被激活或正在受到攻击，你不能从那里传送。
- 你可以传送到接收传送装置处于关闭状态的目的地。

传送装置界面显示所有NPC目标站点的“扩展”范围（实际范围+X），但如果目标超出你当前传送装置的范围，则不允许传送。这提供了关于那些稍微超出范围的星区/系统的信息。

[u]创建者信息[/u]
- 只有设置为“传送网络”的传送装置才允许玩家选择目标。
- 如果你不希望这样，对于兴趣点（POIs），你想让传送装置分配到特定位置或不允许玩家从外部使用，可以在设备中取消勾选传送网络。
- 设置定义的传送目的地的语法：

设备名称@结构名称:场地名称@星系名称#起源

注意：这不适用于实例目标，因为它们始终被加载。
注意：这种语法不适用于玩家在生存模式中可以建造的传送装置！

English:
Most devices and blocks cost CPU points when added to a vessel or structure. To check the requirements of a device, have a look at its hover info card.

A structure/vessel has a limit of how many CPU points you can spend on its devices per CPU TIER. 

You can increase the CPU points pool by installing CPU EXTENDERS, which increases your CPU TIER.

You can keep adding devices 'over CPU' even in case your CPU points on your actual CPU TIER are used up BUT this will reduce the overall CPU EFFICIENCY of some devices, like weapons, thrusters etc. What means you will fly slower, for example. 

CPU Tiers are not a hard limit, though.

Check the STATISTICS page in the Control Panel for detailed info about CPU Tier levels, points and Efficiency!

Knowledge:
- Maintaining the 100% CPU performance gives you some benefits, like increased thruster performance.
- Dropping below the 100% efficiency will increase penalties the same way, for example reduced generator output, down to a point where your base or vessel becomes fully dysfunctional!
- CPU Extenders do not remove the requirement of a CORE!
- To unlock a CPU Tier you need to place ALL Extenders of the TIER you want to use.
 - If you have one or several additional Tiers completed and you LOSE a device from the highest  (working) Tier-level (f.ex in combat), you drop back to the NEXT lower (completed) Tier
- Loosing a CPU Tier will also remove the CPU Points available and thus possibly lower the Efficiency of your vessel

Tip: Having LOWER CPU tiers in your vessel or base will work as a FALLBACK. When a higher Tier is lost you do not drop to T1, but maybe only to the next lower tier (which means the Efficiency of your affected base or vessel is not decreased too much)
Chinese (simplified):
大多数设备和方块在添加到飞船或结构时会消耗CPU点数。要检查设备的需要，请查看其悬停信息卡。

一个结构/飞船有一个限制，即你可以在其设备上花费的CPU点数每个CPU层级。

你可以通过安装CPU扩展器来增加CPU点数池，这会增加你的CPU层级。

即使你的实际CPU层级的CPU点数用完了，你也可以继续添加设备“超过CPU”，但这会降低一些设备的整体CPU效率，如武器、推进器等。这意味着例如你的飞行速度会变慢。

CPU层级并不是硬性限制。

查看控制面板中的STATISTICS页面，了解有关CPU层级、点数和效率的详细信息！

知识：
- 保持100% CPU性能会给你一些好处，如增加推进器性能。
- 降低到100%效率以下也会以相同的方式增加惩罚，例如减少发电器输出，直到你的基地或飞船完全无法运作！
- CPU扩展器不会移除核心的要求！
- 要解锁一个CPU层级，你需要放置所有你想要使用的层级的扩展器。
 - 如果你完成了一个或几个额外的层级，并且你失去了最高（工作）层级的一个设备（例如在战斗中），你会退回到下一个较低（已完成）的层级
- 失去一个CPU层级也会移除可用的CPU点数，因此可能会降低你飞船的效率

提示：在你的飞船或基地中拥有较低的CPU层级将作为FALLBACK。当一个更高的层级丢失时，你不会退回到T1，而可能只会退回到下一个较低的层级（这意味着你受影响的基地或飞船的效率不会降低太多）

English:
If your base is too close or even inside an enemy factions territory, the chance is high that it will send troops to tear down your base. The more dangerous you are considered by a faction, the heavier the attack will hit.

You can check the threat level in the control panel of a base:

1. Open the control panel (P)
1. Go to the STATISTICS tab
2. Look at the BASE ATTACK info card on the lower right

The Base Attack info will tell you WHICH base from a certain faction is currently coordinating the attacks.
When this command center is destroyed, and given there are not multiple command centers, the attacks will end on this planet.

Knowledge:
A faction can have several command centers. You need to destroy all to end the attacks on a planet.
Chinese (simplified):
如果您的基地过于靠近或位于敌对派系的领土内，他们派遣军队摧毁您的基地的可能性很高。一个派系认为您越危险，如威胁等级所示，攻击就会越猛烈。

您可以在基地的控制面板中查看威胁等级：

1. 打开控制面板（P键）
2. 转到“统计”标签
3. 查看右下角的“基地攻击”信息卡

基地攻击信息会告诉您，目前哪个派系的基地正在协调攻击。
当这个指挥中心被摧毁，并且没有多个指挥中心时，这个星球上的攻击将会结束。

知识：
一个派系可以拥有多个指挥中心。您需要摧毁所有指挥中心才能结束一个星球上的攻击。

English: In order to maintain speed, hold CTRL + W until the cruise control arrow is at the top.\n\nYou can then work on other things while the vessel flies into the chosen direction.
Chinese (simplified): 为了保持速度，按住CTRL + W直到巡航控制箭头到达顶部。\n\n然后你可以在飞船飞向选定方向的同时处理其他事情。

English:
As soon as you are in range of a Logistic Network or standing on your base or vessel, you can access the new logistic menu with F4 - or by facing a container and clicking F

On BOTH SIDES  you can select
- a structure (even the same structure)
- a container (cannot be the same if structure is the same)

On the RIGHT side you can also select Fuel Tanks and O2 Tanks from an additional dropdown in order to fill them (fill-source needs to be selected to the LEFT side!)

The MIDDLE offers several buttons
- Connect Toolbar
- Find Constructor (assigned to the container on the right)
- Move all items left/right
Chinese (simplified):
一旦你进入物流网络的范围，或者站在你的基地或飞船上，你可以通过按F4键或者面对一个容器并点击F键来访问新的物流菜单。

在两侧，你可以选择：
- 一个结构（即使是相同的结构）
- 一个容器（如果结构相同，则不能是同一个）

在右侧，你还可以从额外的下拉菜单中选择燃料、氧气和翘曲水晶（原料）罐来填充它们（填充源需要在左侧选择！）

中间提供了几个按钮：
- 连接工具栏
- 查找建造机（分配给右侧的容器）
- 将所有物品向左/右移动

English:
As indicated, the integration of weight and volume limits will change how you handle blocks and items - especially the big ones: Large Constructor has 2500 L volume and your Inventory has 500 L storage capacity.

1. As soon as you are  in range of the Logistic Network, hit F4 and use the CONNECT button in the Logistic menu.
2. Now, you get a new toolbar, the CONNECTED TOOLBAR, which is pulled to the foreground automatically. (Switch between manual and connected toolbar with T)
3. Drag and drop large blocks to this connected toolbar.

This will "virtually" add the block or device to the toolbar and let you use it from there like you would from your manual toolbar, except volume and weight limits do not play a role there.
Chinese (simplified):
如所示，重量和体积限制的集成将改变你如何处理方块和物品——特别是大型的：大型建造机有2500 L体积，你的库存有500 L存储容量。

1. 一旦你在物流网络的范围内，按F4并使用物流菜单中的CONNECT按钮。
2. 现在，你会得到一个新的工具栏，连接工具栏，它会自动被拉到前景。（用T在手动和连接工具栏之间切换）
3. 将大型方块拖放到这个连接工具栏上。

这将“虚拟地”将方块或设备添加到工具栏，并允许你像使用手动工具栏一样从那里使用它，只是体积和重量限制在那里不起作用。
无线连接器： 远程工作

English:
As indicated, the integration of weight and volume limits will change how you handle blocks and items - especially the big ones: Large Constructor has 2500 L volume and your Inventory has 500 L storage capacity.

1. As soon as you are  in range of the Logistics Network, hit F4 and use the CONNECT button in the Logistic menu.
2. As a result you get a new toolbar, the CONNECTED TOOLBAR, which is pulled to the foreground automatically. (Switch between manual and connected toolbar with T)
3. Drag and drop large blocks to this connected toolbar.

This will "virtually" add the block or device to the toolbar and let you use it from there like you would from your manual toolbar, except volume and weight limits do not play a role there.
Chinese (simplified):
如指示所示，重量和体积限制的整合将改变你处理方块和物品的方式——尤其是大型的：例如，大型建造机有2500升的体积，而你的背包只有500升的存储容量。这意味着你不能简单地捡起它来放置。

1. 一旦你进入物流网络的范围，按下F4并使用物流菜单中的“连接”按钮。
2. 作为结果，你会得到一个新的工具栏，即“已连接工具栏”，它会自动被拉到前台。你可以使用T键在手动和已连接工具栏之间切换。
3. 将大型方块拖放到这个已连接的工具栏上。

这将“虚拟地”将方块或设备添加到工具栏，并允许你像使用手动工具栏一样从那里使用它，只是体积和重量限制在那里不起作用。

English:
- The WIRELESS  CONTROL block will EXTEND the range of the Logistic menu up to 100m FROM ITS VERY POSITION! 
- Check the lower left icon row: when the  Wireless Control NETWORK symbol lights up, you are in range of a structure with a Wireless Control device
- You can add more than ONE Wireless Control device per structure. Set them to the edges to max out the range.
- A number next to the Wireless Control Network symbol indicates that there might be more than  one structures available
- You can only connect to ONE structure/container combo at the same time!
- You do NOT have to have any weapon or drill or tool in the CONNECTED TOOLBAR to move items over the Logistic Network connection. You simply need to be CONNECTED to a receiver structure!
- When you get out of range, you need to get back, open F4 and reconnect manually (there is no automated reconnect at the moment)
- The Portable Constructor has NO Logistic Network at the moment, so if you decide to test volume limits enabled, you currently will not be able to place a large constructor for your base (and other blocks/devices)
Chinese (simplified):
- 无线连接程序块可将物流菜单的使用范围从其所在位置扩展至 100 米！
- 检查左下方的图标行：当无线控制网络符号亮起时，您就处于一个有无线连接设备的结构的范围内 
- 每个结构可以添加一个以上的无线连接设备。
- 无线连接网络符号旁边的数字表示可能有不止一个可用的结构。 
- 你在同一时间只能连接到一个结构/容器组合！ 
- 你不需要在已连接工具栏中拥有任何武器、钻头或工具，就可以通过物流网络连接移动物品。
- 当你离开范围时，你需要返回，打开 F4，然后手动重新连接（目前还没有自动重新连接功能）
- 便携式建筑器目前还没有物流网络，所以如果你决定测试启用的体积限制，你目前将无法为你的基地放置大型建筑器（以及其他区块/设备）。

English: - When mining cooperatively it can happen in rare cases that, although you are connected to a Logistic Network, items might drop to the ground. This can happen as the storage-method cannot move items in  a container in the EXACT same second for several players. If the container is blocked in that very second, a picked up item might get dropped in front of you.\n- There is currently a limit that the Network cannot relay beyond the grid size of 500m AND if you place a wireless network block in "connected mode" only the 1st WiFi Block within 100m from the edge of the base will relay the signals. So the MAX-range is 200m  for connected build
Chinese (simplified): - 当合作采矿时，可能会发生罕见情况，即使您连接到了物流网络，物品仍有可能掉落到地面。这种情况可能发生，因为存储方法无法在完全相同的瞬间为多个玩家将物品移动到容器中。如果容器在那一刻被阻塞，拾起的物品可能会掉落在您面前，而不是被转移。\n- 目前有一个限制，即网络无法超越500米网格大小的传输，并且如果您在“连接模式”下放置一个无线连接模块，只有基地边缘100米范围内的第一个此类模块会转发信号。因此，连接建筑的最大范围是200米。

English:
The items and blocks you put in the connected toolbar will actually be removed from the connected container inventory

When you get out of range (walk away from the base), the connected toolbar will get suspended and the items stored there, will "flow back" to the source container. You need to get back in range, manually reconnect to the container again and move the items to your toolbar once again (This setup is NOT stored and reconnected automatically!)

[u]Cooperative Play[/u]
Another player can connect to the SAME structure/container combination and also drag blocks to his connected toolbar.

While still only ONE player can actually open the container (have its GUI open) at any time, several players can always use these connections for cooperative build that way, as long as everyone has the Logistic Menu closed after having connected!


The CONNECTED TOOLBAR is not a workaround to circumvent volume and weight limits. It is PRIMARILY a toolbar to allow building without having run back and forth between containers due to the volume limits or be able to build at all and will stay in the future iterations, as most of the mid game blocks and devices are too heavy or voluminous for you to carry around in your backpack!
Chinese (simplified):
你放入连接工具栏的物品和方块实际上会从连接的容器库存中移除

当你超出范围（远离基地）时，连接的工具栏将被暂停，存储在那里的物品将“回流”到源容器。你需要回到范围内，手动重新连接到容器，并且再次将物品移动到你的工具栏上（这个设置不会自动存储和重新连接！）

[u]合作游戏[/u]
另一个玩家可以连接到相同的结构/容器组合，并将方块拖到他连接的工具栏上。

尽管仍然只有一个玩家可以在任何时候实际打开容器（拥有它的GUI），但多个玩家总是可以使用这些连接进行合作建造，只要每个人在连接后都关闭了物流菜单！


连接的工具栏不是绕过体积和重量限制的变通方法。它主要是一个工具栏，允许你在不因体积限制而来回跑动于容器之间的情况下建造，或者能够建造，并且在未来迭代中仍然会如此，因为大多数中期游戏的方块和设备太重或体积太大，无法随身携带在你的背包里！

English:
The modular container system allows to create storage space in various custom shapes up to a fixed volume/count per unit.

Each Container module consist of a
- Container Control Unit (CC, max one per container)
- Cargo Expansion Unit (CE)

CE/CC are available for standard containers, ammo and harvesting containers.  

[u]Howto[/u]:
Place the CC and add CEs or place CEs and add a CC - this works either way round.

You can of course assign the modular containers to any Constructors as well. The mechanic is the same as for standalone containers (you need to assign the CC, as the CE will not be visible in any GUI)

Handling notes:
- You cannot add 2 CCs to the same modular container
- Destroying or removing the CC will eject all the items
- Destroying or removing an individual CE will eject all the items of the affected CE volume
- If the available volume drops below the cargo content required, stacks will NOT be split (only full stacks are dropped!). So if there is one stack with 999 items and the only way is to get below the threshold by ejecting most items of this stack, the game will not just take the amount required, but eject the full stack at the moment.  
- If you want to place 2 modular containers side by side you need to leave a gap of 1 block between both (eg. you cannot have 2 Modular containers "touch" each other)
- The CEs have a range of available building shapes. Highlight the CE in your toolbar and hit RMB to open the shape menu
Chinese (simplified):
模块化容器系统允许创建各种自定义形状的大型存储容器，每个单元的体积/数量固定。

每个容器模块由以下部分组成：
- 容器控制单元（CC，每个容器最多一个）
- 货物扩展单元（CE）

CE/CC可用于标准容器、弹药和收割容器。

[u]指南[/u]：
放置CC并添加CE，或者放置CE并添加CC - 这两种方式都可以。

当然，你也可以将生成的模块化容器分配给任何建造机。机制与独立容器相同（你需要分配CC，因为CE在任何图形用户界面中都不会可见）。

操作注意事项：
- 你不能为同一个连续的模块化容器添加2个CC。
- 销毁或移除CC将弹出所有物品。
- 销毁或移除单个CE将弹出受影响CE体积的所有物品。
- 如果可用体积降至货物内容所需以下，堆叠将不会分割（只有完整的堆叠会被弹出！）。所以如果有一个堆叠有999个物品，唯一的方法是通过弹出这个堆叠的大部分物品来低于阈值，游戏不会只取所需数量，而是在那一刻弹出整个堆叠。
- 如果你想将两个模块化容器并排放置，你需要在两者之间留出一个方块的间隙（例如，你不能让两个模块化容器“接触”彼此）。
- CE有一系列可用的建筑形状和纹理。在工具栏中高亮CE并点击鼠标右键打开形状菜单。

English: In case you are trying to fly a vessel which has other vessels undocked inside or very close, the movement will be blocked/slowed down.
Chinese (simplified): 如果你试图驾驶一艘内部或非常靠近有其他飞船未对接的飞船，移动将被阻止/减慢。

English:
There are six distinct stages of faction reputation

- Hostile
- Unfriendly
- Neutral 
- Friendly
- Honored

You can earn or lose Reputations which will improve or worsen your standing with those factions.

Some factions are not visible to you in the beginning. To discover them, find a station or ship of the faction.

Check ESC > Faction window for more information.

[u]Note:[/u]
This NPC Factions system should NOT be confused with the Player-ORIGINS and the Player-Factions. Both are technically different systems, given you need fixed rules to define a standing, you also need to pre-set the factions as the game cannot work with factions it does have no infos about. What means: as Player-Origins and Player-Factions are dynamic, customizable and may or may not exist in the game or on a server and might have different "relationships" given on how the creator designs those, there is currently no real "touchpoint" between those two systems. As a player - or player-faction - you can not join any of the NPC Factions, for example.
Chinese (simplified):
派系声誉有六个不同的阶段

- 敌对

- 不友好

- 中立

- 友好

- 尊敬

你可以获得或失去声誉，这将改善或恶化你与这些派系的立场。

一些派系在开始时对你不可见。要发现它们，找到派系的站点或飞船。

检查ESC > 派系窗口以获取更多信息。

[u]注意:[/u]
这个NPC派系系统不应与玩家-起源和玩家-派系混淆。两者在技术上是不同的系统，因为你需要固定规则来定义立场，你也需要预设派系，因为游戏不能使用它没有信息的派系。这意味着：作为玩家-起源和玩家-派系是动态的，可定制的，可能或可能不存在于游戏或服务器上，并且可能根据创造者如何设计这些，有不同的“关系”，目前这两个系统之间没有真正的“接触点”。作为一个玩家 - 或玩家-派系 - 你不能加入任何NPC派系，例如。
多人 NPC 派系互动

English:
On the HUD in the upper right corner you can see the territory you are currently in - and the Standing towards this faction

On the lower right the info will pop up about Reputation Points gathered or lost

In the upper right message box you will get an info if your Standing changed towards this faction.
Chinese (simplified):
在HUD的右上角，你可以看到你目前所在的领土 - 以及对这个派系的立场

在右下角，关于收集或失去的声誉点的信息将弹出

在右上角的消息框中，如果你对这个派系的立场发生了变化，你将获得信息。

English:
There are 6 dedicated standing levels which are tied to a defined Reputation Points threshold in a 6000-per level interval

0 - 6000 : Hostile
6001 - 12000 : Unfriendly
12001 - 18000: Neutral
18001 - 24000: Friendly
24001 - 30000: Honored

Example: If you see “Hostile: 5800/6000” you just slipped into “hostile” with 200 points. Gain 200 points and the counter will reset to 0 and you will advance to “Unfriendly”. You need 6000 more to get to Neutral then. Same for Neutral: 199/6000 means that you are 199+1 point away from “Unfriendly”
Chinese (simplified):
有 5 个专门的地位等级，这些等级与定义的声望点数阈值挂钩，每级间隔为 6000 点（n/n0 - 6000 : Hostile
6001 - 12000 : Unfriendly
12001 - 18000: Neutral
18001 - 24000: Friendly
24001 - 30000: Honored
Example： 如果你看到 'Hostile: 5800/6000'（敌对：5800/6000），那么你刚刚以 200 点数滑入 '敌对 '状态。获得 200 点积分后，计数器将重置为 0，你将进入 '不友好 '状态。这时您还需要 6000 分才能进入 '中立 '状态。中立 '也是一样：199/6000 表示您距离 '不友好 '还有 199+1 点。

English:
[u]FACTION MENU[/u]
1. Open the NPC Faction tab in the Faction Menu
2. Hover over a faction and find the reputation effects displayed on the right

[u]SPECIAL STANDING ACTIONS [/u]
As noted above, some of the aforementioned actions depend on a given standing level, eg. you can only do an action as long as you are on the correct standing level with the NPC faction member in front of you

On Friendly State: 
> able to trade with a faction trader
> stay in territory (BA or vessel) without RP penalty
> harvest plants without RP penalty
> Use teleporters
> Use their stations as respawn points

On Honored State: 
> get a discount at the faction trader
> mine ore without RP penalty
> spawn structure without RP penalty
> (includes any from Friendly State)

[u]Player outside hostile territory[/u]
When you are on HOSTILE stage with a faction you get RP for staying outside their territory until you dropped to UNFRIENDLY.

[u]Technical notes:[/u]
- No reputation loss if opening container/device in any NPC faction POI that is set to 0000
- Actions with a frequency, like "StrucStayinTerritory" will award the pt each 5 real time minutes (example)
- All other: award “on impact/action/collect” (per hit, for example)
Chinese (simplified):
[u]阵营菜单[/u]
1. 打开阵营菜单中的NPC阵营标签页
2. 将鼠标悬停在一个阵营上，你会在右侧看到声望效果的显示

[u]特殊立场行动[/u]
如上所述，一些上述行动取决于特定的立场等级，例如，只有在你与面前的NPC阵营成员处于正确的立场等级时，你才能执行某个行动。

在友好状态下：
> 能够与阵营商人交易
> 在领土内（基地或飞船）停留，不会产生RP惩罚
> 采集植物，不会产生RP惩罚
> 使用传送装置
> 将他们的站点作为复活点

在尊敬状态下：
> 在阵营商人处获得折扣
> 采矿，不会产生RP惩罚
> 建造结构，不会产生RP惩罚
> （包括所有友好状态下的权益）

[u]玩家在敌对领土外[/u]
当你与一个阵营处于敌对阶段时，只要你不进入他们的领土，直到你的立场降至不友好状态，你就会获得RP。

[u]技术说明[/u]：
- 在任何设置为0000的NPC阵营POI中打开容器/设备，不会损失声望
- 具有频率的行动，如“StrucStayinTerritory”，将每5分钟（例如）实际时间授予积分
- 所有其他：在影响/行动/收集时授予（例如，每次打击）

English:
Factions are not necessarily friends to each other - they might even be rivals. Given the Lore behind those factions, certain actions you as a player (or faction) do in favor or against a faction might lead to your faction standing towards another faction changes.

The faction rivalry info is available in the FACTION window when hovering over the faction entry.

Missions for a faction might rise or drop your faction standing as well.
Chinese (simplified):
派系之间不一定是朋友，他们甚至可能是竞争对手。考虑到这些派系背后的传说，你作为玩家（或派系）对某个派系采取的某些行动可能会影响你的派系对另一个派系的态度。

当你将鼠标悬停在派系条目上时，派系竞争信息可以在“派系”窗口中查看。

为某个派系执行任务也可能会提高或降低你的派系地位。

English:
First: as soon as you join a faction, your RP with a faction are calculated into the factions. There is not "private" standing vs. any NPC Faction anymore, only the factions standing vs. the NPC factions.

Example:
2 Players founding a faction.
Player A has a standing of 30.000 with Zirax (Honored)
Player B has a standing of 0 with Zirax (Hostile)
The Player-Faction that results will have a standing of (30.000+0)/2 = 15000

Player C is joining with a standing of 0 (Hostile)
The Player-Faction Standing will result in (15.000+15000+0)/3 = 7.500

Player D joining wit a standing of 30.000
The Player-Faction Standing will result in (30.000+7500+7500+7500)/4 = 13.125

Player A is then killing a Zirax
The Player Faction will drop to HOSTILE for all players

Player D now leaves the faction.
His private standing will then start again on the standing the faction had with the NPC Factions at this point. (You do not "get back" your initial private NPC Standing you might have had BEFORE joining the faction)
Chinese (simplified):
首先：一旦你加入一个玩家派系，你与各个NPC派系的关系值会被平均到玩家派系的立场中。不再有与任何NPC派系的“私人”立场，只有派系与NPC派系的立场。

例子：
2名玩家创建一个派系。
玩家A与兹瑞克斯的关系值为30,000（尊敬）
玩家B与兹瑞克斯的关系值为0（敌对）
产生的玩家派系的立场将是(30,000+0)/2 = 15,000

玩家C加入，其立场为0（敌对）
玩家派系的立场将变为(15,000+15,000+0)/3 = 7,500

玩家D加入，其立场为30,000
玩家派系的立场将变为(30,000+7,500+7,500+7,500)/4 = 13,125

然后玩家A杀死了一个兹瑞克斯
玩家派系将对所有玩家变为敌对

玩家D现在离开了派系。
他的私人立场将从派系与NPC派系当前的立场重新开始。（你不会“恢复”加入派系之前你可能拥有的最初的私人NPC立场）

English: It does not interact at all. Scenario Creators CAN set up a NPC-Standing for players that join an ORIGIN. This is basically only the "starting point".\n\nThe player in an Origin does NOT collect or contribute to the standing of the Origin to any NPC Faction, as there is no mechanic Player Origin vs. NPC Factions yet.
Chinese (simplified): 它完全不互动。场景创建者可以为加入起源的玩家设置一个NPC站立点。这基本上只是一个“起点”。\n\n在起源的玩家不会收集或对任何NPC派系的贡献，因为目前还没有玩家起源与NPC派系声誉的机制。

English:
When pointing at a structure, NPC or creature you will notice a number in front of its name or HP-bar. This is the level of the Creature or the level of the NPCs in that structure.

[u]What effect does the level have?[/u]

The Level is basically a MULTIPLIER of its attack (Damage of his weapon) and defense (Hitpoint) values.  

The Level is an additional multiplier to your decision if you want to play the whole game on a certain difficulty level!.

Basic Multipliers for GAME Difficulty modes

  - EASY = 0.5
  - MEDIUM = 1
  - HARD = 2

Level multipliers for NPC/Creatures (0.1667-stepping)

  - Level 10 = 2.5
  - Level 9 = 2.33
  - Level 8 = 2.17
  - Level 7 = 2.00
  - Level 6 = 1.83
  - Level 5 = 1.67
  - Level 4 = 1.50
  - Level 3 = 1.33
  - Level 2 = 1.17
  - Level 1 = 1.00

Reads: If you played on MEDIUM before and now run into a Level 10 NPC on the same difficulty level, the NPC is 2.5x stronger than in Alpha 8.

[u]How does this work?[/u]

Example 1: You start the game on EASY and run into an NPC with level 10. His attack/defense values are multiplied with (0.5 x 2.5 ) = 1.25

Example 2: You start a game on HARD and run into an NPC with level 10  = 2 x 2.5 = 5 x attack/defense

Example 3: You start a game on EASY and run into a NPC with level 1 = 0.5 x 1 = 0.5

[u]Why do POIs also have a level and what does this mean?[/u]

The level of a POI tells you which NPC-levels spawn there - with a slight variance: In a POI level 10  you can run into NPCs of level 7-10.

Note: the level does not apply to devices on the structure or vessel, but ONLY to hosted NPCs.

[u]For Creators: where do i define the levels?[/u]

For SSG 
(Randomly created solar systems via Solar System Generator):
  - Levels can be set in the SOLARSYSTEMCONFIG.yaml in the parameter "PlayfieldLevel"
  - The level of a playfield defines the maximum levels of the POIs and Entities (on terrain) that will spawn there.
  - The level of the POI will then define the NPCs spawning inside
You can give a RANGE for the PlayfieldLevel like: PlayfieldLevel: [6, 8]

Example:
  - You set the range for playfield levels to [6, 10] in the SSG / Solarsytemconfig
  - This means you can basically get  playfields between these ranges when the solar system is generated on game start
  - On a playfield level 8 you can see a small variant of POI and Terrain-NPCs UP TO level 8 (like 6-8) but NEVER above 8

For Fixed Systems
The level can also be set DIRECTLY in the playfield.yaml, but WITHOUT a range.

You can give an EXACT maximum Level for an individual playfield like:  PlayfieldLevel: 8

This means you will get POIs and Terrain-Entities up to that level (with the same variance, like 6 or 7 might show up, but never 9 or 10)

You can also increase the Level BY BIOME with a new parameter  added to the biome definition in the playfield.yaml.

"LevelMod: +"

Use any positive Integer value for , like +2 = the level of this biome is +3 higher than the game-start/main definitions have set it.
Chinese (simplified):
当你指向一个结构、NPC或生物时，你会在其名称或生命条前看到一个数字。这是生物的等级或该结构内NPC的等级。

[u]等级有什么影响？[/u]

等级基本上是其攻击力（造成的伤害）和防御力（生命值）值的[i]乘数[/i]。

等级乘数是除了你游戏开始时选择的[i]游戏难度模式[/i]之外的。

- 简单 = 0.5
- 中等 = 1
- 困难 = 2

NPC/生物的等级乘数（0.1667步进）

- 等级10 = 2.5
- 等级9 = 2.33
- 等级8 = 2.17
- 等级7 = 2.00
- 等级6 = 1.83
- 等级5 = 1.67
- 等级4 = 1.50
- 等级3 = 1.33
- 等级2 = 1.17
- 等级1 = 1.00

阅读：如果你之前在中等难度下玩过，现在在同一难度下遇到了等级10的NPC，那么这个NPC比Alpha 8中强大2.5倍。

[u]这是如何工作的？[/u]

示例1：你在简单难度下开始游戏，遇到了一个等级10的NPC。他的攻击/防御值乘以（0.5 x 2.5）= 1.25

示例2：你在困难难度下开始游戏，遇到了一个等级10的NPC = 2 x 2.5 = 5倍的攻击/防御

示例3：你在简单难度下开始游戏，遇到了一个等级1的NPC = 0.5 x 1 = 0.5

[u]为什么POI也有等级，这意味着什么？[/u]

一个POI的等级告诉你那里会生成哪些等级的NPC - 有一定的变化：在等级10的POI中，你会遇到7-10等级的NPC。

注意：等级不适用于结构或飞船上的设备，只适用于托管的NPC。

[u]对于创作者：我在哪里定义等级？[/u]

对于SSG
（通过太阳系生成器随机创建的太阳系）：
- 等级可以在SolarSystemConfig.yaml文件下的'PlayfieldLevel'参数中设置
- 游戏场地的等级定义了那里会生成的POI和实体（在地形上）的最大等级。
- 然后POI的等级将定义内部生成的NPC
你可以为PlayfieldLevel提供一个范围，如PlayfieldLevel：[6, 8]

示例：
- 你将游戏场地等级的范围设置为SSG / SolarSytemConfig中的[6, 10]
- 这意味着当游戏开始生成太阳系时，你基本上可以得到这些范围内的游戏场地
- 在等级8的游戏场地上，你可以看到POI和地形NPC的小变化，最高等级为8（如6-8），但永远不会超过8

对于固定系统
等级也可以直接在playfield.yaml中设置，但[斜体]没有范围[/斜体]。

你可以为个别游戏场地提供一个确切的最大等级，如PlayfieldLevel：8

这意味着你将得到最高等级为该等级的POI和地形实体（同样的变动，比如可能会出现6或7，但永远不会是9或10）

你还可以通过在playfield.yaml中的生物群落定义中添加一个新参数来通过生物群落增加等级。
'LevelMod: +'

使用任何正整数值，如+2 = 这个生物群落的等级比游戏开始/主定义设置的高+3级。

English:
For powering a base you have two options:

1. Conventional
Craft and place a Fuel Tank and a Generator on your base. 
You need to craft Fuel Cells or BioFuel and add it to the Fuel Tank ahead of activating the base!

2. Solar
Craft a Capacitor (Solar) and Solar Panels.
Place the generator and the cells on your base.
Solar is not available for vessels.

3. Activate the base with Y or go to the control panel (P) and flip the POWER switch.

The Control Panel main screen and the STATISTICS page have detail info on your structures or vessels power consumption and production capabilities.

Note: if you drain more power than your structure generates, your generators will explode after short!

[i]For more detail and info, please, in the list on the left, click and open this chapters sub-headlines by [c][80ffff]clicking on their headline[-][/c] and/or by clicking the [c][80ffff]arrow-buttons [-][/c]next to them.[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
为基地供电，您有两个选择：

1. 传统方式
制作并放置一个燃料箱和一个发电机在您的基地上。
在激活基地之前，您需要制作燃料电池或生物燃料，并将其加入燃料箱！

2. 太阳能
制作一个电容器（太阳能）和太阳能板。
将电容器和电池板放置在您的基地上。
太阳能不适用于飞船。

3. 使用Y键激活基地，或者前往控制面板（P），并翻转电源开关。

控制面板的主屏幕和统计页面提供了关于您的结构或飞船的功耗和发电能力的详细信息。

注意：如果您消耗的电量超过您的结构产生的电量，您的发电机将会受损，甚至可能爆炸！

[i]要获取更多细节和信息，请通过[c][80ffff]点击他们的标题[-][/c]和/或点击它们旁边的[c][80ffff]箭头按钮[-][/c]来点击并打开本章节的小标题。[/i]

English:
The Attack and Defense values for COMBAT (artillery battle, large guns) and INFANTRY (troops) will allow to judge how "difficult" or "hard" a dungeon is in general. Or how strong or weak a  base or ship of both players and NPC factions might be considered.

- The values for player stations and vessels can be found in the blueprint window in the blueprint library (F2)
- For NPC factions and vessels check their Empyriopedia entries on the list (if available)

[i]For more detail and info, please, in the list on the left, click and open this chapters sub-headlines by [c][80ffff]clicking on their headline[-][/c] and/or by clicking the [c][80ffff]arrow-buttons [-][/c]next to them.[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
战斗（炮兵战斗、大炮）和步兵（部队）的攻击和防御值将允许你判断一个地牢的“难度”或“困难程度”。或者玩家和NPC派系的基地或飞船可能被认为是强还是弱。

- 玩家站点和飞船的值可以在蓝图库中的蓝图窗口（F2）中找到
- 对于NPC派系和飞船，请查看列表中的Empyriopedia条目（如果有的话）

[i]要获取更多详细信息，请在左侧列表中，通过[c][80ffff]点击他们的标题[-][/c]和/或点击它们旁边的[c][80ffff]箭头按钮[-][/c]来点击并打开本章的小标题。[/i]

English:
The formula is taking into account not only Damage, but also Rate-of-fire, Ammo Capacity and Reload Time!

- Turrets (not including sentries, tool and drill turrets..)
- Fixed weapons (not including tools, drills)
Chinese (simplified):
公式不仅考虑了伤害，还考虑了射速、弹药容量和装弹时间！

- 炮塔（不包括哨兵、工具和钻头炮塔）
- 固定武器（不包括工具、钻头）

English:
Summary of HITPOINTS of usually exposed and combat-relevant blocks/devices; means: if you lose a device, your survivability in battle reduces) + shield HP)

- Turrets (not including sentries, tool and drill turrets..)
- Fixed weapons (not including tools, drills)
- Thrusters
- Cockpit
- Shield Generator (contributes HP of device + Shield HP)
Chinese (simplified):
通常暴露和战斗相关的方块/设备的生命值（HITPOINTS）总结；意味着：如果你失去了某个设备，你在战斗中的存活能力会降低）+ 护盾生命值

- 炮塔（不包括哨兵、工具和钻头炮塔）
- 固定武器（不包括工具、钻头）
- 推进器
- 驾驶舱
- 护盾发生器（贡献设备的生命值 + 护盾生命值）

English:
Summarizes NPCs of all spawners in the station or ship, assuming the worst case.

This means: If a spawner would spawn 5 NPCs either Zirax Soldiers or unarmed Civilians, the attack value will calculate the "spawner value" from 5x Zirax and not 5x Civilians.

- Sentries
- Weapons the NPCs are using as primary weapon
Chinese (simplified):
总结站点或飞船中所有生成器的NPC，假设最坏的情况。

这意味着：如果一个生成器会生成5个NPC，无论是兹瑞克斯士兵还是手无寸铁的平民，攻击值将从5个兹瑞克斯计算'生成器价值'，而不是5个平民。

- 哨兵
- NPC作为主要武器使用的武器

English:
Same as for INFANTRY Attack, but this time summarizing the 'worst case' hitpoints 

- Sentries
- NPCs max health
Chinese (simplified):
与步兵攻击相同，但这次总结的是'最坏情况'的生命值

- 哨兵
- NPC最大健康值

English: Hull blocks help to keep away damage from the interiors, like generators, fuel tanks etc. On the other hand, you cannot fly away without thrusters. So shielding interior the best way possible might give you an edge in a battle, but the AMOUNT of Hullblocks does not give any clue if a lucky shot that went through a window is not just bad piloting skill. \n\nBeyond that, sticking a lot of hull blocks into a large ship does not necessarily mean it is a strong ship, but just a well armored one. Acknowledging this might be a weak signal to be added to the calculation, for the time being we want to have the formula handle distinct values referring to a combat situation regarding the outcome of a "technically comparable stalemate" .
Chinese (simplified): 船体方块有助于保护内部免受损害，如发电机、燃料箱等。另一方面，没有推进器你无法飞走。因此，尽可能最好地保护内部可能会在战斗中给你优势，但是船体方块的数量并不能提供任何线索，如果一个幸运的射击穿过窗户，是否不仅仅是糟糕的驾驶技巧。\n\n除此之外，将大量的船体方块塞进一艘大型飞船并不一定意味着它是一艘强大的飞船，而只是一艘装甲良好的飞船。认识到这一点可能是一个弱信号，需要添加到计算中，所以，目前我们希望公式处理不同的值，这些值指的是关于技术可比僵局的结果的战斗情况。

English:
The names COMBAT and INFANTRY are used in the loca/displaying areas use different internal "working names" and abbreviations:

  - [u]Combat = Artillery Attack Defense[/u] (AAD)
All the big guns and relevant devices that are usually on the outside of a ship or vessel, fighting other ships or vessels or bases = large scale "artillery" combat

  - [u]Infantry = Infantry Attack Defense[/u] (IAD)
Includes NPCs that spawn from a spawner plus Sentries (as they are not defined to combat vessels, but player/creatures/NPC
Chinese (simplified):
在本地/显示区域中使用的名称COMBAT和INFANTRY使用不同的内部“工作名称”和缩写：

- [u]Combat = 炮兵攻击防御[/u]（AAD）
通常位于飞船或舰艇外部，用于对抗其他飞船、舰艇或基地的大型枪械和相关设备 = 大规模“炮兵”战斗

- [u]Infantry = 步兵攻击防御[/u]（IAD）
包括从生成器生成的NPC以及哨兵（因为它们未被定义为战斗舰艇，而是玩家/生物/NPC）

English:
Roaming entities, like drones or any creature spawned in space and on terrain have an Attack/Defense value as well. 

It is called: [u]Entity Attack Defense [/u](EAD)

Basically the same as IAD, but we had to split the NPC that spawn in a POI from those that spawn on terrain or in space (including Drones), because they are handled differently. The EAD values are ONLY visible from the console when using the "ents -full" command.
Chinese (simplified): 漫游实体，如无人机或在太空和地形上生成的任何生物，也具有称为[u]实体攻击防御[/u]（EAD）的攻击/防御值。\n\n基本上，EAD与IAD相同，但我们不得不将出现在兴趣点（POI）的NPC与在地形上或太空中生成的NPC（包括无人机）分开，因为它们被不同地处理。EAD值仅在使用控制台中的'ents -full'命令时可见。

English:
The algorithm calculates the amount of sun-rays that will hit the solar panel for a certain placement during the day. 

The placement affects their efficiency :
- This average efficiency is then displayed with the GREEN LCDs (up to four LED lights)
- The current efficiency is displayed by the YELLOW LED lights (up to four LED lights)

If solar panels produce more electricity than currently needed, the surplus energy is stored in the Capacitor (Solar) block like in a battery.

To display the surplus of energy (or the “energy reserve”), there is now a battery icon in the main page of Control Panel that shows the current content of the battery.
Chinese (simplified):
算法计算了一定放置位置的太阳能板在一天中将接收到的阳光量。

放置位置影响它们的效率：
- 这种平均效率随后通过绿色LCD显示屏（最多四个LED灯）显示
- 当前效率由黄色LED灯（最多四个LED灯）显示

如果太阳能板产生的电力超过了当前所需，多余的能量将像电池一样储存在电容器（太阳能）方块中。

为了显示能量的盈余（或“能量储备”），控制面板的主页面有一个“电池”条目，显示当前太阳能电容器的内容。

English:
- Placement behind an obstacle (tree, stone, base, mountain etc)  leads to a reduced efficiency
- Stronger Light Intensity on the playfield increases efficiency on a global scale (parameter: DayLightIntensity in playfield.yaml).
- Light Intensities overall impact on the efficiency is  influenced by the weather condition in a second step: eg when it is cloudy or raining, light intensity effect decreases and thus also efficiency of panel
- Angle of panel towards sun: best efficiency when sun hits perpendicular on panel (eg on equator a flat solar panel lying on ground will have highest efficiency at noon, while a sloped solar panel close to pole while be better)
- AtmosphereDensity: higher density = less overall efficiency
- AtmosphereDensity is modified by latitude! Example: If the position of the Solar Panel is closer to the poles, it is less efficient for the same AtmosphereDenisty factor, because sun travels through more atmosphere than on equator.
- Ground fog reduces efficiency
Chinese (simplified):
- 将太阳能板放置在障碍物（树木、石头、基地、山脉等）后面会导致效率降低。
- 游戏场地上的更强光强度会增加整体效率（参数：playfield.yaml中的DayLightIntensity）。
- 光强度对效率的整体影响在第二步受天气条件的影响：例如，当天气多云或下雨时，光强度效果会减少，从而也减少了太阳能板的效率。
- 太阳能板面向太阳的角度：当太阳垂直照射到太阳能板上时效率最高（例如，在赤道上，平放的太阳能板在正午时效率最高，而接近极地的倾斜太阳能板会更好）。
- 大气密度：密度越高，整体效率越低。
- 大气密度受纬度影响！例如：如果太阳能板的位置更接近极地，即使大气密度因素相同，效率也会更低，因为太阳穿过的大气层比在赤道上更多。
- 地面雾也会降低太阳能效率。

English: - Angle of panel towards sun: best efficiency when sun hits perpendicular on panel\n- Distance of sun: the further the orbit playfield is away from sun, the lower the efficiency (eg lower efficiency in Ningues orbit than Aestus orbit)
Chinese (simplified): - 面板朝向太阳的角度：当太阳垂直照射在面板上时效率最高（n）- 太阳的距离：轨道游戏场离太阳越远，效率越低（例如，Ningues 轨道的效率比 Aestus 轨道低）。

English:
The fuel driven, conventional power does not rely on any planetary or orbital efficiency factors.

You simply have to build a generator (different models) that has enough output for running your base and enough fuel tanks (different sizes) to store fuel to run them.

Note: conventional power generation does NOT store excess power in the BATTERY!
Chinese (simplified):
燃料驱动的常规电力不依赖于任何行星或轨道效率因素。

你只需要建造一个发电机（不同型号）来为你的基地提供足够的输出，以及足够的燃料箱（不同大小）来储存运行它们的燃料。

注意：常规电力发电不会在BATTERY中储存多余的电力！

English:
- Generators
- Fuel Tanks

You can fill all fuel tanks with either fuel cells or fusion cells!
Chinese (simplified):
- 发电机
- 燃料箱

你可以用燃料电池或聚变电池填充所有燃料箱！

English:
You can cycle through different flight modes with the I button.
- All thruster on (autobrake)
- Aerodynamic flight (see Aerodynamic Lift)
- Coasting/Interia off ( suitable for space; momentum will be kept)
Chinese (simplified):
你可以使用I键在不同的飞行模式之间切换。
- 所有推进器开启（自动刹车）
- 空气动力学飞行（参见空气动力学升力）
- 滑翔/惯性关闭（适合太空；将保持动量）

English: Use the O button to align the vessel to the horizon.\nWorks on planets and in space.
Chinese (simplified): 使用 O 键将飞船对齐至地平线。\n在行星和太空中均有效。

English: In case you turned your vessel upside down, use SHIFT to upright it.
Chinese (simplified): 如果你的飞船翻倒了，请使用SHIFT键将其正过来。

English:
For a HV you can go two ways.

1. Adding REPULSOR engines
Repulsors include thrust, torque and hovering in one device. They cannot go over water and they are slow. They are mostly suitable for small HVs like the "Hoverbikes" offered in the BP Library.

2. Adding HOVER ENGINES
You need at least 2-3 Hover Engines spread out evenly to stabilize the hover vessel. You can use SHIFT to increase and C to lower the hover height. You also need thrusters pointing back, forth, left and right.

Note: you can go with fewer thrusters or add RCS devices. See Thruster Torque for more info.
Chinese (simplified):
对于悬浮飞船（HV），你可以选择两种方式：

1. 添加排斥引擎
排斥引擎集推力、扭矩和悬浮功能于一身。它们不能在水上行驶，速度较慢。它们主要适用于小型高悬飞行器，如BP图书馆提供的“悬浮摩托车”。

2. 添加悬浮引擎
你需要至少2-3个悬浮引擎均匀分布以稳定悬浮飞船。你可以使用SHIFT键增加和C键降低悬浮高度。你还需要指向后、前、左和右的推进器。

注意：你可以使用更少的推进器或添加RCS装置。更多信息请参见推进器扭矩。

English:
You need 6 thrusters, one pointing in each direction.
You need at least one RCS.

[i]Note: You can use less thrusters in case you design for Aerodynamic lift and you can theoretically get rid of  RCS in case you spread your thrusters for getting most out of the thrusters-torque. Check the info chapters on that topic further below.[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
你需要6个推进器，每个方向一个。

你至少需要一个RCS。

[i]注意：如果你设计为空气动力学升力，你可以使用更少的推进器，并且理论上你可以在分散你的推进器以获得最大推力扭矩的情况下摆脱RCS。检查下面进一步的主题信息章节。[/i]

English: Note that, in case you are on a high-gravity planet or just loaded your vessel up to its maximum, the vessel might lack the thrust power to take off.\n\nCheck the STATISTICS page in the Control Panel for info if your thrust is high enough to escape the planet.
Chinese (simplified): 请注意，如果您在一个高重力行星上，或者只是将您的飞船装载到了最大容量，飞船可能缺乏足够的推力来起飞。\n\n请检查控制面板中的“统计”页面，看看您的推力是否足够逃离这个星球。

English:
There are two types of detectors
- Handheld Detector
- Handheld Scanner
- Vessel-bases Detectors

[u]Handheld Detector[/u]
Equip the Detector on your toolbar and perform scans with LMB periodically, to reveal POIs and underground-stone and voxel deposits within the Detector range.

Moving the crosshair on the scanned object within detection range (~300m for the handheld Detector) will reveal more info.

Handheld Ore Scanner (Passive)
Only works when carried either in inventory or toolbar. Select a handheld drill and the Ore Scanner will reveal the individual rocks of the underground stone deposits with a faint blue sphere around them. It will not work on the voxel-deposits, though.

Vessel-based Detectors
There work the same as the handheld detector, but have a much greater range.
Chinese (simplified):
有三种类型的探测器：

- 手持探测器
- 手持扫描仪
- 基于飞船的探测器

[u]手持探测器[/u]
将探测器装备到你的工具栏上，并定期使用鼠标左键进行扫描，这将揭示探测器范围内的兴趣点（POIs）和地下石头及体素矿床，用<?>或<资源>标记表示。

将准星移动到探测范围内扫描对象上（手持探测器约为300米）将显示更多信息。

[u]手持矿石扫描仪（被动）[/u]
只有在背包或工具栏中携带时才有效。选择一个手持钻头，矿石扫描仪将揭示地下石头矿床中的单个岩石，并在它们周围显示一个淡蓝色球体。不过，它不会对体素矿床起作用。

[u]基于飞船的探测器[/u]
它们的工作原理与手持探测器相同，但探测范围要大得多。

English:
Each item and device has a mass and a volume.

[u]Volume[/u]
Containers usually have a limit on volume. Build more or use the Container Controller system explained below to work around this limitation. For your suit, there are SUIT BOOSTERS available that can extend the volume limit.  You can also work around that limitation with the LOGISTICS NETWORK!

[u]Mass[/u]
Mass primarily affects the flying behavior of vessels. You might lose the vessel's capability to take off from a planet (check STATISTICS page in the Control Panel) or you are going a lot slower than you could in case you overload your vessel.  Docked vessels also count towards the mass of the carrier. For players the mass currently has no penalty.
Chinese (simplified):
每个物品和设备都有质量和体积。

[u]体积[/u]
容器通常有体积限制。建造更多或使用下面解释的容器控制器系统来解决这个限制。对于你的宇航服，有宇航服助推器可用，可以扩展体积限制。你也可以使用物流网络来解决这个限制！

[u]质量[/u]
质量主要影响飞船的飞行行为。你可能失去飞船从行星起飞的能力（检查控制面板中的STATISTICS页面），或者如果你超载飞船，你会比你能飞得慢得多。对接的飞船也会计入载体的质量。目前对玩家来说，质量没有惩罚。

English: [c][7c99b3]This is the constructor build in your suit (use TAB). [-][/c]\n[c][7c99b3]It only can craft basic items, like food and a few basic devices to help recover from difficult situations.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][7c99b3]这是你宇航服内置的建造机（使用TAB）。[-][/c]\n[c][7c99b3]它只能制造基本物品，比如食物和一些基本设备，以帮助从困难情况中恢复。[-][/c]

English: [c][7c99b3]This is a terrain-placeable constructor which has more capabilities. It can be crafted in the Survival Constructor.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][7c99b3]这是一个可放置在地形中的构造器，具有更多的功能。它可以在生存构造器中制作[-][/c]。

English: [c][7c99b3]Allows to create food, medical items and sprouts on Capital Vessels and Bases.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][7c99b3]允许在主力舰和基地上制造食物、医疗物品和芽苗。[-][/c]

English: [c][7c99b3]Works reverse than the constructors, available for Capital Vessels and Bases. Deconstructors split devices into their base components. Deconstructors do not return ingots or ores! [-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][7c99b3]与其他构造器的工作原理相反，适用于首都船只和基地。解构器将设备拆分成基本组件。解构器不会返回钢锭或矿石！[-][/c]

English: [c][7c99b3]Automated smelting device for making ores into ingots, available for Bases.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][7c99b3]用于将矿石转化为锭的自动化熔炼设备，适用于基地。[-][/c]

English: Basic constructor for starting a base or small vessels.\nAvailable for bases and capital vessels.
Chinese (simplified): 基础建造机，用于开始建立基地或小型飞船。适用于基地和主力舰。

English: Creates more advanced devices and items for capital vessels and bases.\nAvailable for bases and capital vessels.
Chinese (simplified): 创造更先进的设备，包括用于主力舰和基地的物品。\n可用于基地和主力舰。

English: Creates the most advanced devices for all vessel types and bases. \nAvailable for bases and capital vessels.
Chinese (simplified): 为所有类型的飞船和基地创建最先进设备。\n适用于基地和主力舰。

English: Mobile variant of a constructor with limited templates.
Chinese (simplified): 具有有限模板的建造机的移动变体。

English: Mobile variant of a constructor with limited templates.
Chinese (simplified): 具有有限模板的建造机的移动变体。

English: Stones on the ground. All the different resources available as surface rocks have specific colors or models. They can be mined manually and with vessels.\n\nThere is no tool to discover them. You need to spot them by your eyes.
Chinese (simplified): 地面上的石头。所有不同的资源作为地表岩石都有特定的颜色或模型。它们可以手工开采，也可以使用飞船开采。\n\n没有工具可以发现它们。你需要用你的眼睛去发现它们。

English:
For underground deposits there are two variants:
a) underground (voxel) deposits that resemble a vein of ore you can mine
b)  sub-surface ore rocks (SSOR) as groups of rocks placed underground.  

For SSOR you might need an ORE SCANNER in your inventory to reveal their position, as the DETECTORS only reveal the position of the deposit itself (center point on terrain) but not the individual ore rocks (which might not happen to be located in the center area!)
Chinese (simplified):
对于地下矿藏，有两种变体：
a) 地下（体素）矿藏，类似于你可以开采的矿脉
b) 地下矿石岩石（SSOR），作为放置在地下的岩石群组。

对于SSOR，你可以使用库存中的矿石扫描器来揭示它们的位置，因为探测器只揭示矿藏本身的位置（地形中心点），而不是单个矿石岩石的位置（这些岩石可能不恰好位于中心区域！）。

English: On most planets, meteoroites will rain from the sky, either per default or when a particular ore deposit is depleted. A meteoroid warning is issued to your screen. Check the map (M) to spot where it has landed.\n\nNote: Resource meteoroids are not to be confused with weather phenomena like 'meteor rain'. The latter is not bearing any resources.
Chinese (simplified): 在大多数星球上，陨石会从天而降，这可能是默认情况，或者是当特定矿藏被耗尽时。屏幕上会发出陨石警告。检查地图（M键）以确定它降落的位置。\n\n注意：资源陨石不应与“流星雨”等天气现象混淆。后者不携带任何资源，但可能会伤害到你。

English:
Resource Asteroids are found floating in space, either in planet orbits or in sectors of the solar system, for example in asteroid fields.

Resource Asteroids can be detected with a detector device. 
Resource Asteroids are always voxel deposits.
You cannot place Autominers on them.
Chinese (simplified):
资源小行星在太空中漂浮，它们可能位于行星轨道上或太阳系的星区中，例如在小行星带中。

资源小行星可以通过探测器设备探测到。
资源小行星总是以体素形式存在。
你不能在它们上面放置自动采矿机。

English:
[i]Applies to SSOR, voxel deposits and resource asteroids[/i]

To find an underground deposit or asteroid:
- Use your manual or vessel-based Detector to ping the area. Check for < Resource > markers and go closer than 300m or ping again to 'discover' it permanently
- Each vessel has a small default scanning range as well. You do not need to ping a detector in this range.
- Same applies to handheld drills and the survival tool.
Chinese (simplified):
[i]适用于 SSOR、体素矿床和资源陨石[/i]

要找到一个地下矿床或陨石：
- 使用你的手动或基于飞船的探测器来探测该区域。检查 <资源> 标记并靠近 300 米以内或再次探测以永久 '发现' 它
- 每艘飞船都有一个小的默认扫描范围。在这个范围内，你不需要使用探测器。
- 手持钻和生存工具也适用。

English:
Get any manual drill or use the survival tool. Hit RMB and switch to the appropriate mining mode.

Point at the ground (you'll see the drilling sphere as a blue outline) and start drilling down.

Tips: 
- Use your Personal Drone (F5) for handheld Drill mining. This avoids being trapped in a mined out hole. The drone has a range of 60m and will teleport the ores directly into your inventory.
- Park a vessel nearby and use the Logistics Network to connect to a container. The ores will go right there then.
Chinese (simplified):
获取任何手动钻头或使用生存工具。点击右键并切换到适当的采矿模式。

指向地面（你会看到一个蓝色的钻探轮廓），然后开始向下钻探。

提示：
- 使用你的个人无人机（F5）进行手持钻头采矿。这样可以避免被困在一个挖空的洞里。无人机的射程为60米，并且会将矿石直接传送到你的库存中。
- 将飞船停放在附近，并使用物流网络连接到一个容器，挖掘出的矿石和岩石会直接进入其中。

English:
Vessel-drills work the same as handheld drills, except they are fired from the pilot seat.
You can also equip drill turrets for vessels. 

Note:
For vessel-based mining make sure you have your vessel equipped with a 'Container Controller (Ore and Wood)' and an appropriate amount of 'Container Extensions' to hold the ores - otherwise the drilled materials will drop on the ground or float away into deep space.
Chinese (simplified):
飞船钻头的工作方式与手持钻头相同，只是它们是从驾驶座位上发射的。
您还可以为飞船装备钻头炮塔。

注意：
对于基于飞船的采矿，请确保您的飞船装备了“集装箱控制器（矿石和木材）”以及适当数量的“集装箱扩展”，以存放矿石——否则钻取的材料会掉落在地面上或被喷射到太空中并飘走。

English: Autominers can be placed on SSOR and voxel deposits. They need to be powered and you need to pick up the ores from their internal containers.  \n\nTip: Use the connected toolbar for transferring large quantities of heavy/voluminous ores to a nearby vessel.
Chinese (simplified): 自动矿机可以放置在SSOR或体素矿床上。它们需要供电，并且你需要从它们的内部容器中拾取矿石。\n\n提示：使用连接的工具栏将大量重/体积大的矿石转移到附近的飞船上。

English:
There are lots and lots of items and devices that can be traded, either with players (in MP) or with NPCs (SP and MP).
[u][/u]
[u]Player-2-Player[/u]
Search for a marketplace station and make your offers or buy stuff

[u]Player-2-NPC[/u]
Find a NPC trader or a console that wants to speak with you. Look for yellow markers floating above the NPC or console and access/talk with F.

[u]Money & ATM[/u]
Both methods require either you have
- Money Cards in your inventory or
- Money on your Bank account

Find an ATM device to move either GOLD COINS and MONEYCARDS to your bank account. You can also withdraw money cards from your account the same way.

[u]Commodity Items[/u]
Besides items and devices that you can actually use, there are a lot of Commodity items that can be found, bought and sold. 
Commodity traders are found in nearly all stations, not only in trading stations. Checking the needs and offers of different factions and their crews might open up a good way to make a lot of money.
Chinese (simplified):
有许多物品和设备可以交易，无论是与玩家（在多人游戏中）还是与非玩家角色（单人游戏和多人游戏）。
[u][/u]
[u]玩家-玩家[/u]
寻找市场空间站并提出你的报价或购买物品

[u]玩家-非玩家角色[/u]
找到一个非玩家角色交易者或一个想要与你交谈的控制台。寻找漂浮在非玩家角色或控制台上方的黄色标记，并使用 F 访问/交谈。

[u]金钱 & ATM[/u]
两种方法都需要你拥有
- 你的库存中有金钱卡
- 或者你的银行账户上有钱

找到一个 ATM 设备，将金币和金钱卡转移到你的银行账户。你也可以以同样的方式从你的账户中提取金钱卡。

[u]商品物品[/u]
除了你可以实际使用的物品和设备外，还有许多商品物品可以找到、购买和出售。
商品交易者几乎在所有空间站都能找到，不仅在交易空间站。检查不同派系及其船员的需求和报价可能会开辟一条赚取大量金钱的好途径。

English:
The Galaxy is made of several distinct layers.

1. Planets
2. Sectors
3. Solar System
4. Galaxy

This chapter explains how to move between these with the help of maps and bookmarks.
[i][/i]
[i]For more detail and info, please, in the list on the left, click and open this chapters sub-headlines by [c][80ffff]clicking on their headline[-][/c] and/or by clicking the [c][80ffff]arrow-buttons [-][/c]next to them.[/i]
Chinese (simplified):
银河由几个不同的层次构成。

1. 行星
2. 星区
3. 太阳系
4. 银河

本章解释了如何借助地图和书签在这些层次之间移动。

[i]要获取更多详细信息，请在左侧列表中，通过[c][80ffff]点击他们的标题[-][/c]和/或点击它们旁边的[c][80ffff]箭头按钮[-][/c]来点击并打开本章的小标题。[/i]

English: The planetary playfield is the lowest layer of the galactic  structures. It harbors all biological life and a lot of interesting biomes.\n\nDistances are measured in meters (or miles)
Chinese (simplified): 行星游戏场地是银河结构中的最底层。它拥有所有生物生命和许多有趣的生物群落。\n\n距离以米（或英里）为单位测量

English: A sector encompasses not only the planet and its immediate orbit, but can also host (several) moons.  The space sectors are about 200x200x200km in size. Measured in meter/miles.\n\nNote: Currently you cannot fly directly from one sector into an adjacent sector. You need to have a warp-capable vessel.
Chinese (simplified): 一个星区不仅包括行星及其直接轨道，还可以拥有一个或多个卫星。太空星区的大小约为200x200x200公里，以米/英里来测量。\n\n注意：目前您不能直接从一个星区飞到相邻的星区。您需要拥有一艘能够翘曲的飞船。

English:
Solar systems always have a sun .. even if it is a black hole.
A solar system can host planets, gas giants, asteroid fields and stations. A solar system can also be empty, though.

The distance in a solar system is measured in AU (Astronomical Units).
Chinese (simplified):
太阳系总是有一个太阳。。。即使是黑洞。
一个太阳系可以拥有行星、气体巨星、小行星带和空间站。不过，太阳系也可能是空的。

太阳系内的距离以天文单位（AU）来测量。

English: The galaxy encompasses all the solar systems. Sometimes galaxies can have smaller satellite galaxies. You might need specific equipment to get there.\n\nDistances between solar systems are measured in LY (Light Years).
Chinese (simplified): 银河包含了所有的太阳系。有时银河可以拥有更小的卫星星系，您可能需要特定的设备才能到达那里。\n\n太阳系之间的距离以光年（LY）来测量。

English: For intrasolar warping between sectors, you need at least a Small Vessel with a warpdrive and a warpdrive tank. You need to fill the warpdrive tank with refined pentaxid .. which can be harvested from crystals or found in deposits (often to be found on moons and on asteroids)
Chinese (simplified): 进行太阳系内翘曲，你需要至少一艘小型飞船，带有翘曲引擎和翘曲引擎油箱。你需要用精炼的翘曲水晶（原料）填充翘曲引擎油箱... 它可以从晶体中采集或在矿床中找到（通常可以在卫星和陨石上找到）

English: For intergalactic travel between solar systems, you need a capital vessel with a warpdrive (T1) and a warpdrive tank.  Pentaxid is required as fuel as well.
Chinese (simplified): 进行星际旅行，你需要一艘带有翘曲引擎（T1）和翘曲引擎油箱的主力舰。还需要翘曲水晶（原料）作为燃料。

English: Each layer has its own map. Hit M to access it. Use the buttons on the top row to switch to the SECTOR or GALAXY level.\n\nNote: each map has an INFO button. Click to learn more about the map you are currently using.
Chinese (simplified): 每一层都有自己的地图。点击 M 进入。注意：每张地图都有一个 '信息 '按钮。点击它可以了解更多关于当前使用的地图的信息。

English:
For warping, select a sector or a solar system and use LOCK TARGET or click on your destination with CTRL + Left Mouse Button.  

This adds an orange rectangle to your pilot screen. 
Point the crosshair towards it (you do not need to aim at it 100% exactly!) and accelerate to at least 30m/s.  Hit K to warp.
Shields need to be switched off ( X button)

Note: Bookmarks can also work as WARP destinations!

Example: A bookmark in the orbit of Planet A shows up in your HUD when it is in the same system. Simply point towards the yellow marker and warp (You do not need to set a warp destination in that case!)
Chinese (simplified):
翘曲时，选择一个星区或太阳系，并使用锁定目标或使用 CTRL + 左键点击你的目标。

这会在你飞行员屏幕上添加一个橙色矩形。
将准星指向它（你不需要完全精确地瞄准！）并加速至至少 30m/s。 按 K 键翘曲。
需要关闭护盾（X 键）

注意：书签也可以作为翘曲目的地！

例如：在 A 行星轨道上的书签显示在你的 HUD 上，当它在同一个系统时。只需指向黄色标记并翘曲（在这种情况下，你不需要设置翘曲目的地！）

English:
On the planetary and orbital map, you can also set other markers that can be used as bookmarks.

Left-Click on a position will bring up a menu. Make the appropriate selections (f.ex. remove on approach) and a YELLOW marker will be added to the map, your radar and your (pilot) hud.

Note: 
- Markers can be seen BEYOND the playfield they are in! (For example the marker for a base on the planet can be seen from the orbit)
- The REGISTRY is keeping track of all of your markers as well!
- You can share bookmarks with your friends in MP.
Chinese (simplified):
在行星和轨道地图上，你还可以设置其他标记，可以用作书签。

左键点击一个位置将弹出一个菜单。做出适当的选择（例如接近时移除）并添加一个黄色标记到地图、你的雷达和你（飞行员）hud 上。

注意：
